translated: the joy of glorious Vajrasattva.

original: de nyid phul du byung ba'i 'dod pa ni kun mchog so sor rtog pa'i mtshan nyid can gyi rdo rje sems dpa' 'dod pa gang la yod pa de ni mchog tu dga' ba phul du byung ba'i 'dod pa can no //
analyzed: de nyid phul du byung ba'i 'dod pa ni kun mchog so sor rtog pa'i mtshan nyid can gyi rdo rje sems dpa' 'dod pa gang la yod pa de ni mchog tu dga' ba phul du byung ba'i 'dod pa can no //
translated: He who has the desire of that is the one who has the desire of the supreme delight of the supreme.

original: yang na mchog tu dga' bas bskyed pa'i phul du byung ba'i 'dod pa ni kun mchog so sor rtog pa'i rang bzhin can gyi rdo rje sems dpa'i 'dod pa gang la yod pa de ni mchog tu dga' ba phul du byung ba'i 'dod pa can te /
analyzed: yang na mchog tu dga' bas bskyed pa'i phul du byung ba'i 'dod pa ni kun mchog so sor rtog pa'i rang bzhin can gyi rdo rje sems dpa'i 'dod pa gang la yod pa de ni mchog tu dga' ba phul du byung ba'i 'dod pa can te /
translated: Or else, the desire of the supreme is the desire of Vajrasattva, which has the nature of the discrimination of the supreme of all. He who has that desire is the one who has the desire of the supreme delight of the supreme.

original: de ston par byed pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: de ston par byed pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: This is because he is the one who reveals that.

original: mchog ni chos kyi dbyings dang / sems can yongs su smin pa la chags pas na mchog la chags pa ste /
analyzed: mchog ni chos kyi dbyings dang / sems can yongs su smin pa la chags pas na mchog la chags pa ste /
translated: He is the one who is attached to the supreme, because he is attached to the realm of phenomena and to the maturation of sentient beings.

original: k'i li k'i la'i rang bzhin can gyi dpal rdo rje sems dpa'o //
analyzed: k'i li k'i la'i rang bzhin can gyi dpal rdo rje sems dpa'o //
translated: He is the glorious Vajrasattva, who has the nature of the Kali Kali.

original: de'i dga' ba mchog ni bag chags dang bcas pa'i nyon mongs pa'i dri ma bsal ba'o //
analyzed: de'i dga' ba mchog ni bag chags dang bcas pa'i nyon mongs pa'i dri ma bsal ba'o //
translated: His supreme delight is the removal of the stain of the afflictions, together with their traces.

original: de'i dngos grub ni rdzogs pa ste /
analyzed: de'i dngos grub ni rdzogs pa ste /
translated: Its perfection is the perfection of the accomplishment.

original: des grub pa ni rdzogs par gyur pa'o //
analyzed: des grub pa ni rdzogs par gyur pa'o //
translated: The one who is accomplished is the one who has become perfected.üîΩThe disciples of the supreme accomplishment of the nature of Kali Kali Sri Vajrasattva are perfected. This is the meaning.

original: k'i li k'i la'i rang bzhin gyi dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i dga' ba mchog gi dngos grub kyi gdul bya rnams la rdzogs pa'o zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: k'i li k'i la'i rang bzhin gyi dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i dga' ba mchog gi dngos grub kyi gdul bya rnams la rdzogs pa'o zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: The one who is clear and victorious is the one who has the great painting of Vajra Amrita, who is victorious over the afflictions such as desire and so forth, and who is victorious over the demon of death, by being free from the clinging to all things as real.üîΩThe one who has this painting is the one who has the great painting of Vajra Amrita, who is victorious over the afflictions such as desire and so forth, and who is victorious over the demon of death, by being free from the clinging to all things as real.üîΩThe one who has this painting is the one who has the great painting of Vajra Amrita, who is victorious over the afflictions such as desire and so forth, and who is victorious over the demon of death, by being free from the clinging to all things as real.üîΩThe one who has this painting is the one who has the great painting of Vajra Amrita, who is victorious over the afflictions such as desire and so forth, and who is victorious over the demon of death, by being free from the clinging to all things as real.üîΩThe one who has this painting is the one who has the great painting of Vajra Amrita, who is victorious over the afflictions such as desire and so forth, and who is victorious over the demon of death, by being free from the clinging to all things as real.üîΩThe one who has this painting is the one who has the great painting of Vajra Amrita, who is victorious over the afflictions such as desire and so forth, and who is victorious over the demon of death, by being free from the clinging to all things as real.üîΩThe one who has this painting is the one who has the great painting of Vajra Amrita, who is victorious over the afflictions such as desire and so forth, and who is victorious over the demon of death, by being free from the clinging to all things as real.

original: gsal bar ni dngos po thams cad 'dzin pa'i mngon par zhen pa dang bral bas 'dod chags la sogs @17b pa'i nyon mongs pa las rnam par rgyal ba dang / 'chi bdag gi bdud las rnam par rgyal ba rdo rje dran pa ma'i rang bzhin gyi ras ris chen po gang la yod pa de ni gsal zhing rnam par rgyal ba'i ras ris chen po'o //
analyzed: gsal bar ni dngos po thams cad 'dzin pa'i mngon par zhen pa dang bral bas 'dod chags la sogs @17b pa'i nyon mongs pa las rnam par rgyal ba dang / 'chi bdag gi bdud las rnam par rgyal ba rdo rje dran pa ma'i rang bzhin gyi ras ris chen po gang la yod pa de ni gsal zhing rnam par rgyal ba'i ras ris chen po'o //
translated: The one who has this painting is the one who has the great painting of Vajra Amrita, who is victorious over the afflictions such as desire and so forth, and who is victorious over the demon of death, by being free from the clinging to all things as real.

original: ras ris 'dis zhes bya ba 'das ma thag tu bshad pa'i mtshan nyid can gyi ras ris gtso bor gzung ba nyid kyis bstan pa yin te /
analyzed: ras ris 'dis zhes bya ba 'das ma thag tu bshad pa'i mtshan nyid can gyi ras ris gtso bor gzung ba nyid kyis bstan pa yin te /
translated: The one who has this painting

original: ras ris 'di kho nas rol bar byed pa yin te gzhan ni ma yin no //
analyzed: ras ris 'di kho nas rol bar byed pa yin te gzhan ni ma yin no //
translated: This very painting is the one that is enjoyed, not any other.

original: thams cad gzigs pa'i mchod pa chen po'i dpal //
analyzed: thams cad gzigs pa'i mchod pa chen po'i dpal //
translated: The glory of the great worship of the all-seer,

original: zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la /
translated: in this,

original: thams cad gzigs pas na thams cad gzigs pa ste /
analyzed: thams cad gzigs pas na thams cad gzigs pa ste /
translated: the all-seer is the one who sees everything,

original: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams so //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams so //
translated: the Tathagatas.

original: de dag rang gi ras ris 'di rol bar byed pa ni sgrub par byed pa'o //
analyzed: de dag rang gi ras ris 'di rol bar byed pa ni sgrub par byed pa'o //
translated: Their enjoyment of this very painting is the accomplishment.

original: ci sgrub par byed ce na /
analyzed: ci sgrub par byed ce na /
translated: What is accomplished?

original: mchod pa chen po'i dpal zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: mchod pa chen po'i dpal zhes bya ba la /
translated: The glory of the great worship.

original: mchod pa yang yin la chen po yang de nyid yin pas na mchod ba chen po ste /
analyzed: mchod pa yang yin la chen po yang de nyid yin pas na mchod ba chen po ste /
translated: Worship is great, and it is itself, thus it is the great worship,

original: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa so sor rtog pa'i rang bzhin can 'dod pa'i dbang phyug ma'i ngo bo bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang ngo //
analyzed: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa so sor rtog pa'i rang bzhin can 'dod pa'i dbang phyug ma'i ngo bo bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang ngo //
translated: the perfection of effort, which has the nature of discernment, the essence of Kamadhatvisvari, the Blessed One Vajradhara.

original: de'i dpal ni de rnams te phun sum tshogs pa gang yin pa de dag sgrub par byed pa'o //
analyzed: de'i dpal ni de rnams te phun sum tshogs pa gang yin pa de dag sgrub par byed pa'o //
translated: Their glory is that, their perfection, which is accomplished.

original: lha mo bzhi dang 'dus pa'i sbyor bas bcom ldan 'das gnas gang du ras ris la bri bar bya zhe na /
analyzed: lha mo bzhi dang 'dus pa'i sbyor bas bcom ldan 'das gnas gang du ras ris la bri bar bya zhe na /
translated: By the union with the four goddesses, in which place should the Blessed One be painted in the cloth-picture?

original: 'khor lo de ni brtags byas nas //
analyzed: 'khor lo de ni brtags byas nas //
translated: Having examined that wheel,

original: zhes bya ba la bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa'i lha mo'i dkyil 'khor gang bshad pa de nyid ji lta ba bzhin du thig gdab pa yang dag par bris la /üîΩskye bo thams cad kyi thun mong ma yin pa'i gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor mchog tu phul du byung ba gang yin pa de brtags nas bcom ldan 'das 'di dbus kyi dkyil 'khor gyi phyogs su lha mo bzhi dang yang dag par 'dus pa'i sbyor pas ras ris la
analyzed: zhes bya ba la bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa'i lha mo'i dkyil 'khor gang bshad pa de nyid ji lta ba bzhin du thig gdab pa yang dag par bris la / skye bo thams cad kyi thun mong ma yin pa'i gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor mchog tu phul du byung ba gang yin pa de brtags nas bcom ldan 'das 'di dbus kyi dkyil 'khor gyi phyogs su lha mo bzhi dang yang dag par 'dus pa'i sbyor pas ras ris la
translated: it is said. Having examined that very mandala of the goddesses of Blessed Vajrasattva, just as it was explained, having drawn the right measurements,

original: bri bar bya'o //
analyzed: bri bar bya'o //
translated: in the center of the mandala, by the union with the four goddesses, one should paint the Blessed One in the cloth-picture.

original: 'khor lo de yang gnas gang du brtag par bya zhe na /
analyzed: 'khor lo de yang gnas gang du brtag par bya zhe na /
translated: In which place should that wheel be examined?

original: rnam par dben pa'i khang pa'am //
analyzed: rnam par dben pa'i khang pa'am //
translated: In a secluded house,üîΩ it is said.

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la dam tshig mi shes pa la sogs pa'i sems can dang bral ba ni rnam par dben pa sta /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la dam tshig mi shes pa la sogs pa'i sems can dang bral ba ni rnam par dben pa sta /
translated: In the verse that begins in a secluded place, secluded means free from sentient beings who do not know the commitments, etc.

original: khang pa sum brtsegs kyi khang bzangs der ro //
analyzed: khang pa sum brtsegs kyi khang bzangs der ro //
translated: In a three-storied mansion, or in a house.

original: yang na skyed mos tshal la sogs su zhes bya ba la skyed mos tshal thog mar gang la yod pa de ni skyed mos tshal la sogs pa'o //üîΩskyed mos tshal la sogs @18a * //
analyzed: yang na skyed mos tshal la sogs su zhes bya ba la skyed mos tshal thog mar gang la yod pa de ni skyed mos tshal la sogs pa'o // skyed mos tshal la sogs @18a * //
translated: Or, in a pleasure grove, etc. A pleasure grove, etc. means a place where a pleasure grove is foremost.

original: pa dang bcas pa'i sa phyogs gang yin pa de ni skyed mos tshal dang bcas pa'i phyogs so //
analyzed: pa dang bcas pa'i sa phyogs gang yin pa de ni skyed mos tshal dang bcas pa'i phyogs so //
translated: A place with a pleasure grove is a place that has a pleasure grove, etc.

original: sogs pa'i sgras ni gtsug lag khang dang / kun dga' ra ba dang / ri bo dang / chu'i 'gram dang / rgya mtsho dang / rgyal bo'i nags tshal la sogs pa khang ba med ba rnams gzung bar bya'o //
analyzed: sogs pa'i sgras ni gtsug lag khang dang / kun dga' ra ba dang / ri bo dang / chu'i 'gram dang / rgya mtsho dang / rgyal bo'i nags tshal la sogs pa khang ba med ba rnams gzung bar bya'o //
translated: The word etc. includes a temple, a monastery, a mountain, a riverbank, an ocean, a royal forest, etc.

original: yang gi sgras ni snga ma las khyad par du bstan pa'i don du'o //
analyzed: yang gi sgras ni snga ma las khyad par du bstan pa'i don du'o //
translated: The word also indicates that these are different from the previous ones.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa ni bshad zin to //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa ni bshad zin to //
translated: The Tathagata, etc. have been explained.

original: rdo rje glu zhes bya ba la sogs ba ni de la /
analyzed: rdo rje glu zhes bya ba la sogs ba ni de la /
translated: The vajra song and so on.

original: thams cad rjes su chags pa'i bde pa dam pa'i thugs //
analyzed: thams cad rjes su chags pa'i bde pa dam pa'i thugs //
translated: The mind of the supreme bliss of passion for all,

original: rdo rje sems dpa' khyod ni rab tu byung ba yin //
analyzed: rdo rje sems dpa' khyod ni rab tu byung ba yin //
translated: you are the renunciate Vajrasattva.

original: rab tu dga' ba 'gro ba 'gro ba kun gyi bde chen po //
analyzed: rab tu dga' ba 'gro ba 'gro ba kun gyi bde chen po //
translated: The great bliss of all migrating beings, the migrator of great joy,

original: brtan mtho de ring bdag la myur grub mngon phyogs mdzod //
analyzed: brtan mtho de ring bdag la myur grub mngon phyogs mdzod //
translated: the exalted one, today quickly grant me manifest accomplishment.

original: ces bya ba'i rdo rje'i glu rgyud 'di nyid las gsungs pa dang / sangs rgyas thams cad 'dus ba'i rgyud las kyang gsungs pa yin te /
analyzed: ces bya ba'i rdo rje'i glu rgyud 'di nyid las gsungs pa dang / sangs rgyas thams cad 'dus ba'i rgyud las kyang gsungs pa yin te /
translated: This vajra song is stated in this very tantra and also in the Tantra of the Assembly of All Buddhas.

original: de dag gis mchod par bya'o //
analyzed: de dag gis mchod par bya'o //
translated: One should make offerings with those.

original: glu ni 'jig rten pa'i glu'o //
analyzed: glu ni 'jig rten pa'i glu'o //
translated: Song is worldly song.

original: rol mo ni pi wang la sogs pa'i rol mo'o //
analyzed: rol mo ni pi wang la sogs pa'i rol mo'o //
translated: Music is the music of the veena and so on.

original: rnam 'phrul ni gar te /üîΩrnam 'phrul gar du rab tu bshad //
analyzed: rnam 'phrul ni gar te / rnam 'phrul gar du rab tu bshad //
translated: Emanation is dance.

original: ces bya ba gsungs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: ces bya ba gsungs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: It is well explained as the dance of emanation.

original: glu dang rol mo dang rnam par 'phrul pa ni glu dang rol mo rnams bar 'phrul pa rnams so //
analyzed: glu dang rol mo dang rnam par 'phrul pa ni glu dang rol mo rnams bar 'phrul pa rnams so //
translated: Song, music, and dance are song, music, and dance.

original: rdo rje glu'i mchod pa la sogs pa dang / glu dang rol mo dang rnam par 'phrul pa ni rdo rje'i glu'i mchod sogs dang / glu dang rol mo rnam par 'phrul pa rnams so //
analyzed: rdo rje glu'i mchod pa la sogs pa dang / glu dang rol mo dang rnam par 'phrul pa ni rdo rje'i glu'i mchod sogs dang / glu dang rol mo rnam par 'phrul pa rnams so //
translated: The worship of vajra song and so on, and the song, music, and emanation are the worship of vajra song and so on, and the song, music, and emanation.

original: de dag khang bzangs gang la yod pa de la de skad ces bya'o //
analyzed: de dag khang bzangs gang la yod pa de la de skad ces bya'o //
translated: That which has those in a palace is so called.

original: me tog dang spos dag gis phul du byung ba'i sbyor ba ni rab tu sbyor ba'o //
analyzed: me tog dang spos dag gis phul du byung ba'i sbyor ba ni rab tu sbyor ba'o //
translated: The application of flowers and incense is the application.üîΩThe worship of those applications of flowers and incense is the worship of flowers and incense.

original: me tog dang spos kyi rab tu sbyor ba de dag gi mchod pa thog mar gang la yong ba de ni me tog dang spos dang // rab tu sbyor ba la sogs pa mar me'i sbyor ba'o //
analyzed: me tog dang spos kyi rab tu sbyor ba de dag gi mchod pa thog mar gang la yong ba de ni me tog dang spos dang // rab tu sbyor ba la sogs pa mar me'i sbyor ba'o //
translated: The application of lamps is the application of lamps.

original: de yis yang dag par mchod pa gang yin pa de ni //
analyzed: de yis yang dag par mchod pa gang yin pa de ni //
translated: That which is perfectly worshipped by that is

original: me tog spos dang rab sbyar sogs //
analyzed: me tog spos dang rab sbyar sogs //
translated: The application of flowers, incense, and so on.

original: mar me'i sbyor bas yang dag mchod de /
analyzed: mar me'i sbyor bas yang dag mchod de /
translated: The application of lamps is the perfect worship.

original: de lta bu'i dkyil 'khor gyi khang pa sum brtsegs der /
analyzed: de lta bu'i dkyil 'khor gyi khang pa sum brtsegs der /
translated: In that way, in the three-storied temple of the mandala,

original: mchog ste phul du byung ba'i gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor mdun du bri bar byas la mtshan thog thag sgom pa'i sbyor bas rab tu bsgrub par bya ba ni rang la rag las par bya'o //
analyzed: mchog ste phul du byung ba'i gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor mdun du bri bar byas la mtshan thog thag sgom pa'i sbyor bas rab tu bsgrub par bya ba ni rang la rag las par bya'o //
translated: The supreme, that is, the best, secret mandala should be drawn in front, and one should accomplish it well by the yoga of meditating all night.

original: yang na bdag @18b nyid mchog gyur pas //
analyzed: yang na bdag @18b nyid mchog gyur pas //
translated: Or, having become supreme oneself,

original: rang gi lha nyid bsgom bya zhing //
analyzed: rang gi lha nyid bsgom bya zhing //
translated: one should meditate on one's own deity.

original: zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la /
translated: Here,

original: yang na zhes bya ba phyogs gzhan bstan pa yin no //
analyzed: yang na zhes bya ba phyogs gzhan bstan pa yin no //
translated: or indicates another position.

original: bdag nyid mchog ni phul du byung ba ste dpal rdo rje sems dpa'o //
analyzed: bdag nyid mchog ni phul du byung ba ste dpal rdo rje sems dpa'o //
translated: Supreme means best, that is, glorious Vajrasattva.

original: de nyid rang gi lha de 'dod pa'i lha bsgom zhing ji lta ba bzhin du bshad pa'i mtshan nyid can gyi khang pa sum brtsegs su gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor rab tu bsgrub par bya'o //
analyzed: de nyid rang gi lha de 'dod pa'i lha bsgom zhing ji lta ba bzhin du bshad pa'i mtshan nyid can gyi khang pa sum brtsegs su gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor rab tu bsgrub par bya'o //
translated: That very one is one's own deity. Meditating on the deity one desires, one should accomplish the secret mandala in the three-storied house having the characteristics as explained.

original: 'dis ni 'di ltar bshad par 'gyur te /
analyzed: 'dis ni 'di ltar bshad par 'gyur te /
translated: This is explained as follows:

original: dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i rnal 'byor byas la tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi rab tu sbyor bas sngon du bsnyen pa bya ste /
analyzed: dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i rnal 'byor byas la tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi rab tu sbyor bas sngon du bsnyen pa bya ste /
translated: Having performed the yoga of glorious Vajrasattva, one should perform the preliminary practice by the application of the ga·πáa-ma·πá·∏çala.

original: mtshan ma thob pa'i rnal 'byor pas ji ltar bshad pa'i mtshan nyid can gyi khang pa sum brtsegs su gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor bris nas rang nyid kyis lha mo bzhi dang / yang dag par 'dus pa'i sbyor pas rab tu bsgrub pa'i rab myos ma rnams dang lhan cig tu dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su zhugs te /üîΩdus kyi mchod pa la sogs pa'i sbyor ba dang ldan pa'i gzungs ma rnams sam /
analyzed: mtshan ma thob pa'i rnal 'byor pas ji ltar bshad pa'i mtshan nyid can gyi khang pa sum brtsegs su gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor bris nas rang nyid kyis lha mo bzhi dang / yang dag par 'dus pa'i sbyor pas rab tu bsgrub pa'i rab myos ma rnams dang lhan cig tu dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su zhugs te / dus kyi mchod pa la sogs pa'i sbyor ba dang ldan pa'i gzungs ma rnams sam /
translated: The yogi who has attained the signs, having drawn the secret mandala in a three-storied house having the characteristics as explained, together with the four goddesses and the four intoxicated goddesses who are accomplished by the yoga of union with the utterly pure, should enter into the middle of the mandala.

original: slob ma'i tshogs rang rang gi gnas su bkod la cho ga thams cad rjes su spyad par bya'o //
analyzed: slob ma'i tshogs rang rang gi gnas su bkod la cho ga thams cad rjes su spyad par bya'o //
translated: Endowed with the yoga of the timely worship and so forth, the consorts or the assembly of disciples should be arranged in their own places and all the rites should be performed.

original: 'jug pa'i dus ni rang gi slob dpon rdo rje sems dpa'i gnas su bkod la /
analyzed: 'jug pa'i dus ni rang gi slob dpon rdo rje sems dpa'i gnas su bkod la /
translated: The time of entry is when one's master is arranged in the place of Vajrasattva.

original: bdag nyid 'jug pa la sogs pa'i cho ga rdzogs par byas te /
analyzed: bdag nyid 'jug pa la sogs pa'i cho ga rdzogs par byas te /
translated: Having completed the rite of one's own entry and so forth,

original: phyi nas der 'dug la bsgom par bya ba yin no //
analyzed: phyi nas der 'dug la bsgom par bya ba yin no //
translated: one should then sit there and meditate.

original: de nas 'khor lo ma zhugs kyang //
analyzed: de nas 'khor lo ma zhugs kyang //
translated: Then, even though one has not entered the wheel,

original: rang nyid kyis ni rab zhugs nas //
analyzed: rang nyid kyis ni rab zhugs nas //
translated: having entered oneself,

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni bshad zin to //
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni bshad zin to //
translated: The rest has been explained.

original: mchog tu gsang ba dam pa zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: mchog tu gsang ba dam pa zhes bya ba la /
translated: The supreme secret pledge means

original: mchog ni thog ma med pa'i sangs rgyas 'byung ba dam pa la bzhugs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: mchog ni thog ma med pa'i sangs rgyas 'byung ba dam pa la bzhugs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: supreme because of abiding in the excellent emergence of the beginningless Buddha,

original: gsang ba ni rdo rje lha mo'i tshogs nang bzhugs pa'i bcom ldan 'das kyi sku'o //
analyzed: gsang ba ni rdo rje lha mo'i tshogs nang bzhugs pa'i bcom ldan 'das kyi sku'o //
translated: secret because of the body of the BhagavƒÅn abiding in the assembly of the vajra goddesses,

original: mchog kyang yin la gsang ba yang de nyid yin pas na mchog tu gsang ba ste /
analyzed: mchog kyang yin la gsang ba yang de nyid yin pas na mchog tu gsang ba ste /
translated: and supreme secret because of being both supreme and secret.

original: de'i dam pa ni dpal dam tshig gsum gyi gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor te /
analyzed: de'i dam pa ni dpal dam tshig gsum gyi gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor te /
translated: The pledge of the supreme secret is the secret ma·πá·∏çala of the three pledges of ≈örƒ´ Samaya.

original: der bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' lha mo bzhi'i dbus na bzhugs pa'o //
analyzed: der bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' lha mo bzhi'i dbus na bzhugs pa'o //
translated: There, the BhagavƒÅn Vajrasattva abides in the center of the four goddesses.

original: de nyid kyi sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje rnams ni dam tshig ste /
analyzed: de nyid kyi sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje rnams ni dam tshig ste /
translated: His vajra body, speech, and mind are the pledges.

original: des nye bar mtshon pa'i gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor ni mchog tu gsang ba dam pa'i dam tshig gsum mo //
analyzed: des nye bar mtshon pa'i gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor ni mchog tu gsang ba dam pa'i dam tshig gsum mo //
translated: The secret ma·πá·∏çala illustrated by that is the three pledges of the supreme secret.

original: der zhugs pa'i @19a * //
analyzed: der zhugs pa'i @19a * //
translated: The one who enters there is the one who has entered the supreme secret pledge.

original: phyir mchog tu gsang ba ston par byed pa'i rdo rje'i glu'i mchod pa'o //
analyzed: phyir mchog tu gsang ba ston par byed pa'i rdo rje'i glu'i mchod pa'o //
translated: The offering of the vajra song that reveals the supreme secret.

original: de khyad par ji lta bu dang ldan zhe na /
analyzed: de khyad par ji lta bu dang ldan zhe na /
translated: What is the special quality of that?

original: mchog tu grub pa zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: mchog tu grub pa zhes bya ba la /
translated: It is said, supreme attainment.

original: ji lta ba bzhin du rdo rje bsnyems pas glu len cing 'jug pa'i phyag rgyas me tog rnams blangs la gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor du 'jug par bya'o //
analyzed: ji lta ba bzhin du rdo rje bsnyems pas glu len cing 'jug pa'i phyag rgyas me tog rnams blangs la gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor du 'jug par bya'o //
translated: One should take the flowers with the gesture of engaging in singing the song with the pride of being Vajradhara just as it is, and enter the secret mandala.üîΩYou, O Bhagavat of great bliss, are entering,

original: bcom ldan bde chen khyod ni rab tu 'jug / ces bya ba la rdo rje sems dpar byas pa'i rang gi rgyud bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa'i bdag nyid la bod pa yin te /
analyzed: bcom ldan bde chen khyod ni rab tu 'jug / ces bya ba la rdo rje sems dpar byas pa'i rang gi rgyud bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa'i bdag nyid la bod pa yin te /
translated: means that one is invited to enter the mandala of glorious Vajrasattva, the Bhagavat, with one's continuum made into Vajrasattva.

original: thar pa'i grong khyer gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor du zhugs shig pa'o //
analyzed: thar pa'i grong khyer gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor du zhugs shig pa'o //
translated: One should enter the secret mandala, the city of liberation.

original: thar pa'i grong khyer de nyid kyi khyad par bstan par bya ba'i phyir /üîΩdngos grub kun gyi bde ba nyams dga' ba //
analyzed: thar pa'i grong khyer de nyid kyi khyad par bstan par bya ba'i phyir / dngos grub kun gyi bde ba nyams dga' ba //
translated: In order to teach the special quality of that city of liberation,

original: zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la /
translated: it is said, the delight of the bliss of all attainments.

original: dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje rtogs pa ni dngos grub yin no //
analyzed: dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje rtogs pa ni dngos grub yin no //
translated: The realization of the Vajra of Body, Speech, and Mind of glorious Vajrasattva, etc. , is the power.

original: de las byung ba'i bde ba ni dngos grub kun gyi bde ba'o //
analyzed: de las byung ba'i bde ba ni dngos grub kun gyi bde ba'o //
translated: The bliss that arises from that is the bliss of all powers.

original: des dga' bar byed pas na nyams dga' ba ste yid dang rjes su mthun pa'o //
analyzed: des dga' bar byed pas na nyams dga' ba ste yid dang rjes su mthun pa'o //
translated: Since that delights, it is delightful, i.e., pleasing to the mind.üîΩBy the power of the highest bliss

original: mchog tu bde ba dam pa'i dngos grub kyis //
analyzed: mchog tu bde ba dam pa'i dngos grub kyis //
translated: And the supreme attainment of the holy bliss.üîΩ

original: zhes bya ba la phyi ma'i mtha' bar du skad cig ma re re la sprul pa'i sprin rnams kyis dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i sku gsung thugs de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi don du bya ba nan tan sgrub pa'i ye shes mchog tu bde ba dam pa'i dngos grub bsgrub bo //
analyzed: zhes bya ba la phyi ma'i mtha' bar du skad cig ma re re la sprul pa'i sprin rnams kyis dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i sku gsung thugs de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi don du bya ba nan tan sgrub pa'i ye shes mchog tu bde ba dam pa'i dngos grub bsgrub bo //
translated: Up to the end of time, moment by moment, by means of the clouds of emanations, he should accomplish the power of the highest bliss, which is the wisdom of the practice of worship of all the Tathagatas with the Vajra of Body, Speech, and Mind of glorious Vajrasattva, etc. , and the practice of the aims of all sentient beings.

original: de nyid rgyur gyur pas der bzhugs shig ces bya'o //
analyzed: de nyid rgyur gyur pas der bzhugs shig ces bya'o //
translated: Since that is the cause, he should remain in that.

original: kun gyi mchog so sor rtog pa'i rang bzhin nyid kyis dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje rnams mngon du byas na rigs pa yin no //
analyzed: kun gyi mchog so sor rtog pa'i rang bzhin nyid kyis dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje rnams mngon du byas na rigs pa yin no //
translated: The supreme of all is the nature of discernment, which is the nature of Vajrasattva and so forth, the vajra body, speech, and mind.

original: k'i li k'i la'i rang bzhin bde ba chen po'o //
analyzed: k'i li k'i la'i rang bzhin bde ba chen po'o //
translated: The nature of Kali Kali is great bliss.

original: rdo rje dran pa ma'i rang bzhin gyi dngos grub kun bde ba nyams dga' ba'o //
analyzed: rdo rje dran pa ma'i rang bzhin gyi dngos grub kun bde ba nyams dga' ba'o //
translated: The nature of Vajrasmrti is the bliss of all powers.

original: rdo rje bsnyems ma'i rang bzhin gyi mchog tu bde ba dam pa'i dngos grub bo //
analyzed: rdo rje bsnyems ma'i rang bzhin gyi mchog tu bde ba dam pa'i dngos grub bo //
translated: The nature of VajrarƒÅga is the supreme power of sublime bliss.

original: dza: h'um bam ham:khyed kyis rab bsgrub mdzod //
analyzed: dza: h'um bam ham:khyed kyis rab bsgrub mdzod //
translated: JAH HUM BAM HOH

original: ces bya ba la 'dod chags rdo rje ma dang / k'i li k'i la dang / rdo rje dran ma dang / rdo rje 'dod pa'i dbang phyug ma'i rang bzhin rnams kyis dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i sku @19b gsung thugs rdo rje rnams dgug cing bcug la bcings nas dbang du bya ste /
analyzed: ces bya ba la 'dod chags rdo rje ma dang / k'i li k'i la dang / rdo rje dran ma dang / rdo rje 'dod pa'i dbang phyug ma'i rang bzhin rnams kyis dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i sku @19b gsung thugs rdo rje rnams dgug cing bcug la bcings nas dbang du bya ste /
translated: By the nature of RƒÅgavajrƒÅ, Kali Kali, Sm·πõtivajra, and KƒÅmavajrƒ´, the vajra body, speech, and mind of glorious Vajrasattva and so forth are summoned, caused to enter, bound, and controlled.

original: dza: h'um pam ho: rnams kyis mchog tu grub par gyur pa ni rab tu grub pa rdzod cig ces bya'o //
analyzed: dza: h'um pam ho: rnams kyis mchog tu grub par gyur pa ni rab tu grub pa rdzod cig ces bya'o //
translated: The supreme accomplishment is the supreme accomplishment, which is the supreme accomplishment of the mantra Jambhala, Jambhala, and so on.

original: zhugs te zhes bya pa la sogs pa la der 'das ma thag tu bshad pa'i cho ga ste mgon po rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag bya'o //
analyzed: zhugs te zhes bya pa la sogs pa la der 'das ma thag tu bshad pa'i cho ga ste mgon po rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag bya'o //
translated: Having entered, and so on. There, having just entered, one should pay homage to Lord Vajrasattva with the previously explained ritual.

original: g-yon pa'i mig gi rdo rjes so //üîΩzhes bya ba la /
analyzed: g-yon pa'i mig gi rdo rjes so // zhes bya ba la /
translated: With the vajra of the left eye.

original: g-yon pa'i rdo rje lta bas so //
analyzed: g-yon pa'i rdo rje lta bas so //
translated: With the gaze of the left vajra.

original: de khyad par ji lta bu dang ldan pa zhe na /
analyzed: de khyad par ji lta bu dang ldan pa zhe na /
translated: What is the special quality of that?

original: g-yon pa bsnyems pas zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: g-yon pa bsnyems pas zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: With the haughtiness of the left, and so on.

original: g-yon bsnyems pa ni go sla ste de dang bcas pa'i cung zad bzhad pa gang yin pa de dang ldan par bstod cing mdzes pa ste /üîΩsgeg pa dang bcas pa'i mig btsums pa gang la yod pa de ni /üîΩg-yon pa bsnyems pas cung zad bzhad //
analyzed: g-yon bsnyems pa ni go sla ste de dang bcas pa'i cung zad bzhad pa gang yin pa de dang ldan par bstod cing mdzes pa ste / sgeg pa dang bcas pa'i mig btsums pa gang la yod pa de ni / g-yon pa bsnyems pas cung zad bzhad //
translated: The haughtiness of the left is easy to understand. It is the haughtiness of the left, which is the slight smile that is endowed with it. üîΩ With the haughtiness of the left, there is a slight smile.

original: bstod cing mdzes pa'i mig btsums pa'o //
analyzed: bstod cing mdzes pa'i mig btsums pa'o //
translated: With the haughtiness of the left, there is a slight smile.

original: de dag gang yin zhe na /
analyzed: de dag gang yin zhe na /
translated: What is that?

original: g-yon pa'i mig gi rdo rje ste /
analyzed: g-yon pa'i mig gi rdo rje ste /
translated: The vajra of the left eye

original: lta ba de dang ldan pa'i rnal 'byor pas bcom ldan 'das la phyag bya'o //
analyzed: lta ba de dang ldan pa'i rnal 'byor pas bcom ldan 'das la phyag bya'o //
translated: is the yoga of the yogin who possesses that view.

original: ci brjod cing bya ba yin zhe na /
analyzed: ci brjod cing bya ba yin zhe na /
translated: What is to be said and done?

original: de la 'di zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: de la 'di zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: In that regard, this is what is said, etc.

original: phyag de la bar mchod par 'og nas 'chad par 'gyur ba 'di yin te /
analyzed: phyag de la bar mchod par 'og nas 'chad par 'gyur ba 'di yin te /
translated: That homage is the worship below, which will be explained.

original: mchog tu gsang ba dam pa'i dpal dam tshig gsum ni gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi phyag rgya'o //
analyzed: mchog tu gsang ba dam pa'i dpal dam tshig gsum ni gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi phyag rgya'o //
translated: The glory of the supreme secret pledge is the seal of the secret mandala of the three secrets.

original: de nyid du me tog gi sil ma gtor ma ni ma brgyus pa'i me tog dor ba'o //
analyzed: de nyid du me tog gi sil ma gtor ma ni ma brgyus pa'i me tog dor ba'o //
translated: Scattering flower petals there is throwing unstrung flowers.

original: phyag bya ba dang me tog sil ma dor ba de dag gi mchog ni thog ma dang tha ma med pa'i gsang ba ste /
analyzed: phyag bya ba dang me tog sil ma dor ba de dag gi mchog ni thog ma dang tha ma med pa'i gsang ba ste /
translated: The supreme of those homage and flower petal scattering is the secret without beginning or end.

original: skye bo gzhan gyi mngon du ma gyur pas rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa ston par byed pa dang / mi phyed pa'i glu'i mchod pa'o //
analyzed: skye bo gzhan gyi mngon du ma gyur pas rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa ston par byed pa dang / mi phyed pa'i glu'i mchod pa'o //
translated: It is the one who reveals Vajrasattva, etc. , and the worship of the indestructible song.

original: mchog tu grub pa ni thog ma dang tha ma med pa nyid du rdzogs pa yin no zhes bya ba ni tshig gi lhag ma'o zhes bya ba'i sgras ni yongs su bcad pa'o //
analyzed: mchog tu grub pa ni thog ma dang tha ma med pa nyid du rdzogs pa yin no zhes bya ba ni tshig gi lhag ma'o zhes bya ba'i sgras ni yongs su bcad pa'o //
translated: The supreme accomplishment is the perfection of the state of no beginning and no end.

original: mchog tu bde ba ni byang chub chen po'i mtshan nyid can rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i gnyis su med pa'i sems dang sems las byung ba rnams dang / de dang rgyu mthun pa'i rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i sku gsung thugs kyi phyag rgya rnams te /
analyzed: mchog tu bde ba ni byang chub chen po'i mtshan nyid can rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i gnyis su med pa'i sems dang sems las byung ba rnams dang / de dang rgyu mthun pa'i rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i sku gsung thugs kyi phyag rgya rnams te /
translated: The supreme bliss is the nondual mind and mental factors characterized by great enlightenment, such as Vajrasattva, and the mudras of body, speech, and mind of Vajrasattva, etc., which are concordant with that.

original: de la sems dpa' ni thob pa'i 'dun pa'o //üîΩmchog tu bde ba'i bsam des mdzes pa @20a * //
analyzed: de la sems dpa' ni thob pa'i 'dun pa'o // mchog tu bde ba'i bsam des mdzes pa @20a * //
translated: Here, sattva is the aspiration for attainment.

original: dang bcas sgeg pa dang bcas pa'i gar las byung ba'i phyag bya ba de dag gis bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag bya'o //
analyzed: dang bcas sgeg pa dang bcas pa'i gar las byung ba'i phyag bya ba de dag gis bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag bya'o //
translated: With that supreme bliss, one should worship the Blessed One, glorious Vajrasattva, with the homage that arises from the dance of beauty and grace.

original: dza: h'um bam ho: zhes bya ba ni bshad zin to //
analyzed: dza: h'um bam ho: zhes bya ba ni bshad zin to //
translated: Ja·∏• h≈´·πÉ va·πÉ ho·∏• has been explained.

original: hi hi hi hi he zhes bya ba ni yi ge hi bzhi pos brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin can gyi bcom ldan 'das bstan pa yin no //
analyzed: hi hi hi hi he zhes bya ba ni yi ge hi bzhi pos brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin can gyi bcom ldan 'das bstan pa yin no //
translated: The hi hi hi hi he indicates the four hi syllables, which show the Bhagavat who has the nature of the perfection of effort.

original: he zhes bya ba rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'i rnam par thar pa'i sgo'i rang bzhin can bdud bzhi las rnam par rgyal ba de nyid bstan pa'o //
analyzed: he zhes bya ba rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'i rnam par thar pa'i sgo'i rang bzhin can bdud bzhi las rnam par rgyal ba de nyid bstan pa'o //
translated: The he indicates the very same one who is victorious over the four demons, who has the nature of the door of liberation that is natural luminosity.

original: mgon po snyim pa'i me tog bzhes //
analyzed: mgon po snyim pa'i me tog bzhes //
translated: Accept the flower of the folded hands, O Lord!

original: zhes bya ba la 'dir snyim pa'i me tog ni phyag bya ba'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba la 'dir snyim pa'i me tog ni phyag bya ba'o //
translated: Here, the flower of the folded hands is the salutation.

original: me tog dor ba'i dbus ni snyim pa'i me tog kho na me tog gi snyim pa ste /
analyzed: me tog dor ba'i dbus ni snyim pa'i me tog kho na me tog gi snyim pa ste /
translated: The middle of the flower-throwing is the very flower of the folded hands, the flower-folded hands.

original: de bzhes pa ni blang bar mdzod cig pa'o //
analyzed: de bzhes pa ni blang bar mdzod cig pa'o //
translated: Accept it, take it!

original: sems can thams cad skyob par mdzad pa rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i dngos grub stsol bas na mgon po'o //
analyzed: sems can thams cad skyob par mdzad pa rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i dngos grub stsol bas na mgon po'o //
translated: The Lord is the one who grants the spiritual power of Vajrasattva and so forth, the protectors of all sentient beings.üîΩ The supreme bliss is the nature of the ka, li, and la.

original: de la mchog tu bde ba dang h'um zhes bya ba 'dis k'i li k'i la'i rang bzhin can no //
analyzed: de la mchog tu bde ba dang h'um zhes bya ba 'dis k'i li k'i la'i rang bzhin can no //
translated: The hum is the nature of the ha.

original: sems dpa' zhes bya ba dang dza: zhes bya bas 'dod chags rdo rje ma'i rang bzhin bstan to //
analyzed: sems dpa' zhes bya ba dang dza: zhes bya bas 'dod chags rdo rje ma'i rang bzhin bstan to //
translated: The words hero and jha indicate the nature of RƒÅgavajrƒÅ.

original: mdzes pa dang bam zhes bya bas rdo rje dran ma'i rang bzhin bstan to //
analyzed: mdzes pa dang bam zhes bya bas rdo rje dran ma'i rang bzhin bstan to //
translated: The words beautiful and bam indicate the nature of VajrƒÅm·πõtƒÅ.

original: rnam par rol pa'i phyag gis phyag bya'o zhes bstan pa 'di dang / hi hi hi hi he zhes bya bas rdo rje 'dod pa'i dbang phyug ma'i rang bzhin nyid du bcom ldan 'das tshig gi zur gyis bstan to //
analyzed: rnam par rol pa'i phyag gis phyag bya'o zhes bstan pa 'di dang / hi hi hi hi he zhes bya bas rdo rje 'dod pa'i dbang phyug ma'i rang bzhin nyid du bcom ldan 'das tshig gi zur gyis bstan to //
translated: The words bow to with a playful gesture and hi hi hi hi he indicate the nature of VajrarƒÅga, as taught by the Blessed One in the words.

original: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa la de ltar sgeg mo dga' ba'i rdo rje mas phyag byas la /
analyzed: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa la de ltar sgeg mo dga' ba'i rdo rje mas phyag byas la /
translated: Then, etc. Thus, having bowed to Lalitapremasambhavacakravartin,

original: de nyid phyag byas pa'i glu'i mchod pa brjod cing me tog dor bar bya'o //
analyzed: de nyid phyag byas pa'i glu'i mchod pa brjod cing me tog dor bar bya'o //
translated: one should recite the song of praise of the offering of flowers, and cast the flowers.

original: de nas de dag blangs te rang gi mgo la ji lta ba bzhin du bcings te /
analyzed: de nas de dag blangs te rang gi mgo la ji lta ba bzhin du bcings te /
translated: Then, having taken them, one should tie them on one's head as one wishes,

original: dkyil 'khor bltas la 'jug pa'i phyag rgya rang gi snying gar dgrol bar bya'o //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor bltas la 'jug pa'i phyag rgya rang gi snying gar dgrol bar bya'o //
translated: and having seen the ma·πá·∏çala, one should untie the entrance seal at one's heart.

original: de nas chu dang / phyag rgya dang / cod pan dang / rdo rje dang / bdag po dang / ming gi dbang bskur ba blang bar bya ba'i phyir dngos grub kyi rdo rje brtul zhugs blang bar bya'o //
analyzed: de nas chu dang / phyag rgya dang / cod pan dang / rdo rje dang / bdag po dang / ming gi dbang bskur ba blang bar bya ba'i phyir dngos grub kyi rdo rje brtul zhugs blang bar bya'o //
translated: Then, in order to take the empowerments of water, crown, vajra, lord, and name, one should take the spiritual powers and the vajra conduct.

original: de nas me tog la sogs pa dang / rdo rje mtshon cha ma la sogs pa'i mchod pa'i phyag rgya rnam pa bcu gnyis kyis bdag nyid yang dag par mchod la /
analyzed: de nas me tog la sogs pa dang / rdo rje mtshon cha ma la sogs pa'i mchod pa'i phyag rgya rnam pa bcu gnyis kyis bdag nyid yang dag par mchod la /
translated: Then, with the twelve types of offering goddesses beginning with the flower goddess and ending with the vajra weapon goddess, one should make offerings to oneself.

original: de kho na nyid dang / chos dang / dam @20b tshig rnams blangs la /
analyzed: de kho na nyid dang / chos dang / dam @20b tshig rnams blangs la /
translated: One should take the reality, doctrine, and pledge.

original: rang gi snying gar lan gsum bskor bar bya'o //
analyzed: rang gi snying gar lan gsum bskor bar bya'o //
translated: One should circle three times at one's heart.

original: de kho na nyid la sogs pa gsum po ni 'og nas gsungs pa yin no //
analyzed: de kho na nyid la sogs pa gsum po ni 'og nas gsungs pa yin no //
translated: The three, reality and so forth, are stated below.

original: rdo rje la sogs thob pa bzung //
analyzed: rdo rje la sogs thob pa bzung //
translated: One should take up the attainment of the vajra and so forth.

original: zhes bya ba la rdo rje thob pa ni rnyed pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba la rdo rje thob pa ni rnyed pa'o //
translated: The attainment of the vajra is the acquisition.

original: sogs pa'i sgras ni dri 'khu dang phyag rgya bshad pa yin no //
analyzed: sogs pa'i sgras ni dri 'khu dang phyag rgya bshad pa yin no //
translated: The word and so forth explains the smell and the seal.

original: rdo rje la sogs pa thob pa nyid gzung ba yin no //
analyzed: rdo rje la sogs pa thob pa nyid gzung ba yin no //
translated: One should take up the attainment of the vajra and so forth.

original: rdo rje la sogs pa'i gzung ba des cir 'gyur zhe na /üîΩrdo rje sems dpa' gnyis pa 'dra //
analyzed: rdo rje la sogs pa'i gzung ba des cir 'gyur zhe na / rdo rje sems dpa' gnyis pa 'dra //
translated: What is the result of holding the vajra, etc.?üîΩOne becomes like a second Vajrasattva.

original: zhes bya ba ni rnal 'byor pa rdo rje sems dpa' gnyis pa dang 'dra bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni rnal 'byor pa rdo rje sems dpa' gnyis pa dang 'dra bar 'gyur ro //
translated: The yogin becomes like a second Vajrasattva.

original: rdo rje thams cad 'dzin pa ni dang po'i rdo rje 'dzin pa'o //
analyzed: rdo rje thams cad 'dzin pa ni dang po'i rdo rje 'dzin pa'o //
translated: Vajra-holder means the first Vajra-holder.

original: rgyal po zhes bya ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi 'khor los sgyur ba dang rigs thams cad kyi 'khor los sgyur ba'o //
