analyzed: da ni brta dang / be sha khi la la mkhas pa'i rjes su sgrub pa bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
translated: now, in order to teach the practice that follows the expert, the one who is skilled in the practice of the hero,

original: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: [the BhagavƒÅn] declares, ‚ÄúThen,‚Äù and so on.

original: de nas kyi sgra ni skabs su bab pa'o //
analyzed: de nas kyi sgra ni skabs su bab pa'o //
translated: The word ‚Äúthen‚Äù is in the proper sequence.

original: gsang ba dam pa'i mchog gi dpal dam tshig gsum ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje brtan par byed pa'i gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor der mchog gi dngos grub thams cad kyi dbang phyug ni khams gsum pa'i chos kyi rgyal srid thob
analyzed: gsang ba dam pa'i mchog gi dpal dam tshig gsum ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje brtan par byed pa'i gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor der mchog gi dngos grub thams cad kyi dbang phyug ni khams gsum pa'i chos kyi rgyal srid thob
translated: The lord of all supreme powers is the attainment of the sovereignty of the Dharma of the three realms.

original: pa'o // de nyid bdag po nyid dngos grub thams cad kyi las kyi tshogs pa'i gang gi dang por yod pa de la de skad ces bya'o //
analyzed: pa'o // de nyid bdag po nyid dngos grub thams cad kyi las kyi tshogs pa'i gang gi dang por yod pa de la de skad ces bya'o //
translated: That very [lord] is the first of the collection of activities of all powers, and thus is so called.

original: dngos grub kyang yin la thams cad kyang de nyid yin pas na dngos grub thams cad de phyag rgya chen po dang / dam tshig dang chos dang las kyi phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor gyi dngos grub rnams so //
analyzed: dngos grub kyang yin la thams cad kyang de nyid yin pas na dngos grub thams cad de phyag rgya chen po dang / dam tshig dang chos dang las kyi phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor gyi dngos grub rnams so //
translated: Since it is a power and it is all, it is all powers, that is, the powers of the mandalas of the great seal, pledge seal, doctrine seal, and action seal.

original: las rnams kyi tshogs ni las kyi tshogs te gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor dang 'brel ba'i 'og nas 'chad par 'gyur ba'i las rgya'i rgyun no //
analyzed: las rnams kyi tshogs ni las kyi tshogs te gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor dang 'brel ba'i 'og nas 'chad par 'gyur ba'i las rgya'i rgyun no //
translated: The collection of activities is the collection of activities, that is, the continuous activities of the seal of the secret mandala that will be explained below.

original: mi 'gyur ba yang yin la mchog kyang de nyid yin pas na mi 'gyur mchog ste /
analyzed: mi 'gyur ba yang yin la mchog kyang de nyid yin pas na mi 'gyur mchog ste /
translated: It is unchanging and supreme, thus it is unchanging and supreme.

original: thog ma dang tha ma med pa'o //
analyzed: thog ma dang tha ma med pa'o //
translated: It is without beginning and end.

original: de nyid kyi phyir dam pa ni phul du byung ba'o //
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir dam pa ni phul du byung ba'o //
translated: It is the highest, the most excellent.

original: 'di la gong na med pas bla na med pa'o //
analyzed: 'di la gong na med pas bla na med pa'o //
translated: It is unsurpassed, since there is nothing higher than it.

original: dga' ba dang rab tu dga' ba zhes bya ba la dga' ba ni yid bde ba'o //
analyzed: dga' ba dang rab tu dga' ba zhes bya ba la dga' ba ni yid bde ba'o //
translated: Joy and supreme joy. Joy is mental satisfaction.

original: rab tu dga' ba ni dga' ba'o //
analyzed: rab tu dga' ba ni dga' ba'o //
translated: Supreme joy is joy.

original: bde ba thams cad ni 'jig rten las 'das pa'i'o //
analyzed: bde ba thams cad ni 'jig rten las 'das pa'i'o //

original: de yang dam pa dang / bar ma dang / mchog gi dbye bas phye ba yin no //
analyzed: de yang dam pa dang / bar ma dang / mchog gi dbye bas phye ba yin no //

original: yid bde ba yang de bzhin du shes par bya'o //
analyzed: yid bde ba yang de bzhin du shes par bya'o //
translated: Mental satisfaction should be understood in the same way.

original: bla na med pa'i dga' ba dang rab tu dga' ba las khyad par ci yod ce na /
analyzed: bla na med pa'i dga' ba dang rab tu dga' ba las khyad par ci yod ce na /
translated: What is the difference between unsurpassed joy and supreme joy?

original: 'di ni dman pa dang / bar ma dang / mchog gi dbye ba rnam pa gsum ste /

original: de ltar thams cad dgug pa dang / mchod pa chen po dang / bdag la byin gyis brlab pa dang / sgrub pa chen po dang / rjes su bsgrub pa rnams kyis bdag nyid dang dkyil 'khor rdzogs par byas la /üîΩnyin re de srid du bsgom par bya ste /
analyzed: de ltar thams cad dgug pa dang / mchod pa chen po dang / bdag la byin gyis brlab pa dang / sgrub pa chen po dang / rjes su bsgrub pa rnams kyis bdag nyid dang dkyil 'khor rdzogs par byas la / nyin re de srid du bsgom par bya ste /
translated: Thus, having perfected oneself and the mandala with the summoning of all, the great worship, the consecration of oneself, the great accomplishment, and the subsequent accomplishment,üîΩone should meditate on that for as long as one wishes.

original: ji srid mngon du gyur pa lta bur nyin re sgom pa'i dus su mthong bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: ji srid mngon du gyur pa lta bur nyin re sgom pa'i dus su mthong bar 'gyur ro //
translated: One should meditate for as long as one wishes, until one sees it as if it were manifest.

original: de nas dkyil 'khor 'di bri bar bya'o zhes bya pa'i cho ga 'di rab tu bstan par bya ba'i phyir de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: de nas dkyil 'khor 'di bri bar bya'o zhes bya pa'i cho ga 'di rab tu bstan par bya ba'i phyir de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: In order to teach this rite, he says, ‚ÄúThen, ‚Äù and so forth.

original: de nas zhes bya ba ni mtshan ma thob ma thag pa kho na'o //
analyzed: de nas zhes bya ba ni mtshan ma thob ma thag pa kho na'o //
translated: ‚Äú Then‚Äù means immediately upon obtaining the signs.

original: de zhes bya ba ni ji srid ma thob pa'i gong du ma yin pa'o //
analyzed: de zhes bya ba ni ji srid ma thob pa'i gong du ma yin pa'o //
translated: ‚Äú That‚Äù means not before obtaining them.

original: gsang ba mchog gi dgyes pa na //
analyzed: gsang ba mchog gi dgyes pa na //
translated: In the supreme secret‚Äôs place of joy,

original: sangs rgyas kun gyis rjes bsten pa'i//
analyzed: sangs rgyas kun gyis rjes bsten pa'i//
translated: all buddhas are attended by

original: rdo rje sems dpa'i rang gnas su //
analyzed: rdo rje sems dpa'i rang gnas su //
translated: Vajrasattva‚Äôs own place,

original: thams cad bdag nyid rtag tu bzhugs //
analyzed: thams cad bdag nyid rtag tu bzhugs //
translated: where he always resides in his own nature.

original: zhes bya ba'i gnas 'di 'og nas 'chad par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: zhes bya ba'i gnas 'di 'og nas 'chad par 'gyur ro //
translated: This place will be explained below.

original: de lta bu ji bzhin pa'i gnas su ji snyed pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni bshad zin to //
analyzed: de lta bu ji bzhin pa'i gnas su ji snyed pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni bshad zin to //
translated: ‚Äú In that way, ‚Äù ‚Äúas many as there are, ‚Äù and so forth have been explained.

original: bdag nyid ces bya ba la sogs pa la dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i rgyan rnams kyis bdag nyid yang dag par brgyan la /
analyzed: bdag nyid ces bya ba la sogs pa la dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i rgyan rnams kyis bdag nyid yang dag par brgyan la /
translated: ‚Äú One should adorn oneself‚Äù and so forth: having adorned oneself with the ornaments of glorious Vajrasattva,

original: ji ltar 'dod pa'am ji ltar thob pa'i sna tshogs pa'i gos gyon pa dang / me tog gi phreng ba dang ldan zhing kha dri zhim po bsgos pas lugs ma'am /
analyzed: ji ltar 'dod pa'am ji ltar thob pa'i sna tshogs pa'i gos gyon pa dang / me tog gi phreng ba dang ldan zhing kha dri zhim po bsgos pas lugs ma'am /
translated: and one should be adorned with flower garlands and anointed with fragrant ointments.üîΩOne should draw the mandala in the three-storied palace as explained,

original: brdungs ma la sogs pa'i rang bzhin can gyi bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' 'khor dang bcas pa ji skad bshad pa'i khang pa sum brtsegs su dkyil 'khor bris le de'i dbus su rdo rje bzhag nas de nyid kyi mdun du ji lta ba bzhin bshad pa'i
analyzed: brdungs ma la sogs pa'i rang bzhin can gyi bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' 'khor dang bcas pa ji skad bshad pa'i khang pa sum brtsegs su dkyil 'khor bris le de'i dbus su rdo rje bzhag nas de nyid kyi mdun du ji lta ba bzhin bshad pa'i
translated: with the BhagavƒÅn Vajrasattva and his retinue, and one should place the vajra in the center of that.

original: sgrub pa'i cho gas dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i sbyor bas rnal 'byor chen po byas la /
analyzed: sgrub pa'i cho gas dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i sbyor bas rnal 'byor chen po byas la /
translated: In front of that, one should perform the great yoga with the glorious Vajrasattva‚Äôs yoga by the rite of practice as explained.üîΩOne should ring the bell on one‚Äôs two thighs,

original: brla gnyis la @31b dril bu ste brla gnyis po dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje 'bebs ba skyed par byed pa'i dril bu'i sgra sgrogs par byed cing /
analyzed: brla gnyis la @31b dril bu ste brla gnyis po dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje 'bebs ba skyed par byed pa'i dril bu'i sgra sgrogs par byed cing /
translated: and one should ring the bell that proclaims the sound of the vajra of body, speech, and mind of the glorious Vajrasattva, which is generated on one‚Äôs two thighs.

original: thams cad dgug pa dang / mchod pa chen po dang / bdag la byin gyis brlab pa la sogs pa sngar bshad pa'i mtshan nyid can bsgrub par bya'o //
analyzed: thams cad dgug pa dang / mchod pa chen po dang / bdag la byin gyis brlab pa la sogs pa sngar bshad pa'i mtshan nyid can bsgrub par bya'o //
translated: One should accomplish the previously explained characteristics of the great worship, the consecration of oneself, and so forth.

original: sngon du zhes bya ba la sogs pa de ltar 'das ma thag tu bshad pa'i tshul gyis bdag nyid dang dkyil 'khor dang por lhan cig tu sgrub pa byas nas bsgoms pas la la de'i rjes la khrus la sogs par rang gi lha'i nga rgyal gyis rdzogs par
analyzed: sngon du zhes bya ba la sogs pa de ltar 'das ma thag tu bshad pa'i tshul gyis bdag nyid dang dkyil 'khor dang por lhan cig tu sgrub pa byas nas bsgoms pas la la de'i rjes la khrus la sogs par rang gi lha'i nga rgyal gyis rdzogs par
translated: Having thus performed the preliminary practice and so forth in the manner just explained, having performed the sƒÅdhana of oneself and the ma·πá·∏çala together, having meditated, some, after that, having completed the bathing and so forth with the pride of one‚Äôs deity,

original: byas nas / slar yang zhugs te nyin re bzhin du mchod pa thams cad kyis dkyil 'khor yang dag par mchod la de srid du bsgom par bya ste /
analyzed: byas nas / slar yang zhugs te nyin re bzhin du mchod pa thams cad kyis dkyil 'khor yang dag par mchod la de srid du bsgom par bya ste /
translated: again entering, having perfectly worshipped the ma·πá·∏çala with all offerings every day, one should meditate for that long.

original: ji srid zla ba gcig gi bar du'o //
analyzed: ji srid zla ba gcig gi bar du'o //
translated: For as long as one month.

original: mthar nya la mtshan thog thag bsgom par bya ste /
analyzed: mthar nya la mtshan thog thag bsgom par bya ste /
translated: In the end, one should meditate throughout the night on the full moon.

original: nyi ma 'char ka'i dus su rdo rje 'chang chen po nyid thob par 'gyur ro//
analyzed: nyi ma 'char ka'i dus su rdo rje 'chang chen po nyid thob par 'gyur ro//
translated: At the time of sunrise, one will attain the state of Great Vajradhara.

original: don de nyid bstan par bya ba'i phyir //üîΩ'dis ni 'dod pa kun dbang phyug /'gro dang 'ong dang 'dod na 'phur //
analyzed: don de nyid bstan par bya ba'i phyir // 'dis ni 'dod pa kun dbang phyug /'gro dang 'ong dang 'dod na 'phur //
translated: In order to teach just that meaning,

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
translated: he says, ‚ÄúHe is the lord of all desires, going and coming, flying when he wishes, ‚Äù and so forth.

original: de ltar zhes bya ba la sogs pa la 'das ma thag tu bshad pa'i sgrub pa'i cho gas /
analyzed: de ltar zhes bya ba la sogs pa la 'das ma thag tu bshad pa'i sgrub pa'i cho gas /
translated: Thus, and so forth. By the rite of practice just explained,

original: de ltar mchog tu rjes chags dga' ba padma'i ra ba che //
analyzed: de ltar mchog tu rjes chags dga' ba padma'i ra ba che //
translated: thus, the supreme one, the one who is passionately in love with the great lotus garden,

original: mchog gi rgyal mtshan bsgreng bas gang zhig rjes su bsten pa ste //
analyzed: mchog gi rgyal mtshan bsgreng bas gang zhig rjes su bsten pa ste //
translated: the one who is attended by the one who raises the supreme victory banner,

original: mchog gi dngos grub dbang phyug chen po nyid des nyams myong ba //
analyzed: mchog gi dngos grub dbang phyug chen po nyid des nyams myong ba //
translated: the one who experiences the supreme attainment, the state of Mahe≈õvara.

original: zhes bya ba dang sbyar ro //
analyzed: zhes bya ba dang sbyar ro //
translated: This is the connection.

original: mchog kyang yin la rjes su chags pa yang de nyid yin pas na mchog tu rjes su chags pa ste /
analyzed: mchog kyang yin la rjes su chags pa yang de nyid yin pas na mchog tu rjes su chags pa ste /
translated: The supreme one is also passionately in love with that, thus it is the supreme passion.

original: dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor bsgom pa'o //
analyzed: dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor bsgom pa'o //
translated: It is the meditation on the secret ma·πá·∏çala of glorious Vajrasattva.

original: 'dis ni 'dod chags rdo rje ma'i rang bzhin can gyi dpal rdo rje sems dpa' bstan pa ste /
analyzed: 'dis ni 'dod chags rdo rje ma'i rang bzhin can gyi dpal rdo rje sems dpa' bstan pa ste /
translated: This teaches that glorious Vajrasattva has the nature of RƒÅgavajrƒ´.

original: des bskyed pa'i dga' ba ni mchog tu rjes su chags pa'i dga' ba'o //
analyzed: des bskyed pa'i dga' ba ni mchog tu rjes su chags pa'i dga' ba'o //
translated: The joy produced by that is the joy of supreme passion.

original: de nyid bag chags dang bcas pa'i nyon mongs pa thams cad kyi dri ma dang bral bas padma lta bu yin pas na padma'o //
analyzed: de nyid bag chags dang bcas pa'i nyon mongs pa thams cad kyi dri ma dang bral bas padma lta bu yin pas na padma'o //
translated: That itself is like a lotus because it is free from the stain of all the afflictions together with their traces.

original: des nam mkha'i khams thams cad khyab par byed pa'i nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i ye shes kyi rin po che'i sa gzhi khyab pas na dga' ba'i padma'i ra ba chen po'o //üîΩdga' ba'i padma'i ra ba chen po ni dga' ba'i @32a * //
analyzed: des nam mkha'i khams thams cad khyab par byed pa'i nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i ye shes kyi rin po che'i sa gzhi khyab pas na dga' ba'i padma'i ra ba chen po'o // dga' ba'i padma'i ra ba chen po ni dga' ba'i @32a * //
translated: It is the great garden of the lotus of joy because it pervades the ground of the precious sky-like gnosis that pervades the entire realm of space.

original: padma'i ra ba chen po'o //
analyzed: padma'i ra ba chen po'o //
translated: The great garden of the lotus of joy is the great garden of the lotus of joy.

original: de nyid mchog tu gsang ba grub pa'i bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi dngos grub la chags pas na bla na med pa'i dngos grub la chags pa ste /
analyzed: de nyid mchog tu gsang ba grub pa'i bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi dngos grub la chags pas na bla na med pa'i dngos grub la chags pa ste /
translated: That itself is the attachment to the unsurpassed attainment of the supreme secret, the unsurpassed, perfect, complete enlightenment.

original: k'i li k'i la'i rang bzhin can gyis rdo rje sems dpa' bstan to //
analyzed: k'i li k'i la'i rang bzhin can gyis rdo rje sems dpa' bstan to //
translated: The nature of the kilikili is the teaching of Vajrasattva.

original: mchog gi rgyal mtshan bsgreng bas gang zhig rjes su bstan pa ste //
analyzed: mchog gi rgyal mtshan bsgreng bas gang zhig rjes su bstan pa ste //
translated: The supreme victory banner is raised, and so it is taught.

original: zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la /
translated: The one who raises the supreme victory banner is the one who is taught.

original: de lta bu'i yon tan gyi khyad par dang ldan pa'i sgrub pa rnal 'byor pa gang gis phyin ci ma log par brten pa ni sgom par byed pas te /
analyzed: de lta bu'i yon tan gyi khyad par dang ldan pa'i sgrub pa rnal 'byor pa gang gis phyin ci ma log par brten pa ni sgom par byed pas te /
translated: The one who is endowed with such special qualities of practice, the yogi, who relies on it without error, is the one who meditates.

original: mchog kyang yin la rgyal mtshan yang de nyid yin pas na mchog gi rgyal mtshan te dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i sku'o //
analyzed: mchog kyang yin la rgyal mtshan yang de nyid yin pas na mchog gi rgyal mtshan te dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i sku'o //
translated: It is the supreme and it is the victory banner, thus it is the supreme victory banner, the body of glorious Vajrasattva.

original: de nyid de'i rnal 'byor gyis bsgreng bas te /
analyzed: de nyid de'i rnal 'byor gyis bsgreng bas te /
translated: That is raised by his yoga,

original: mthon pa'i sku gang la yod pa de ni mchog gi rgyal mtshan bsgreng ba rnams te /
analyzed: mthon pa'i sku gang la yod pa de ni mchog gi rgyal mtshan bsgreng ba rnams te /
translated: the one who has that exalted body is the one who raises the supreme victory banner.

original: 'dis rdo rje dran ma'i rang bzhin can gyi rdo rje sems dpa' tshig gi zur gyis bstan pa yin no //
analyzed: 'dis rdo rje dran ma'i rang bzhin can gyi rdo rje sems dpa' tshig gi zur gyis bstan pa yin no //
translated: This indicates Vajrasattva, who is of the nature of Vajra Am·πõta, by implication.

original: rdo rje sems dpa'i rnal 'byor gyis ji lta ba bzhin du bshad pa'i sgrub pa mngon du byed pa de rnams cir 'gyur zhe na /
analyzed: rdo rje sems dpa'i rnal 'byor gyis ji lta ba bzhin du bshad pa'i sgrub pa mngon du byed pa de rnams cir 'gyur zhe na /
translated: What happens to those who actualize the practice as it is explained by the yoga of Vajrasattva?

original: mchog gi dngos grub dbang phyug chen po nyid des nyams myong ba //
analyzed: mchog gi dngos grub dbang phyug chen po nyid des nyams myong ba //
translated: The supreme attainment is the experience of that very Great Lord.

original: zhes bya ba la so so rang rig pa'i ye shes kyis nyams su myong ba'i rnal 'byor pa rnams kyis rig pa yin no //
analyzed: zhes bya ba la so so rang rig pa'i ye shes kyis nyams su myong ba'i rnal 'byor pa rnams kyis rig pa yin no //
translated: Here, the yogis who experience by means of the intuition of individual intuitive wisdom have knowledge.

original: mchog kyang yin la dngos grub kyang de nyid yin pas na mchog gi dngos grub ste rdo rje 'chang chen po'i rang bzhin gyi gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi dngos grub po //
analyzed: mchog kyang yin la dngos grub kyang de nyid yin pas na mchog gi dngos grub ste rdo rje 'chang chen po'i rang bzhin gyi gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi dngos grub po //
translated: And since it is supreme and also an attainment, it is the supreme attainment, the attainment of the secret mandala whose nature is Great Vajradhara.

original: des dbang phyug chen po ni mchog gi dngos grub kyi dbang phyug chen po'o //
analyzed: des dbang phyug chen po ni mchog gi dngos grub kyi dbang phyug chen po'o //
translated: The Great Lord is the Great Lord of the supreme attainment.

original: des dngos po ni dbang phyug chen po de nyid de de dag gis nyams su myong ba yin no //
analyzed: des dngos po ni dbang phyug chen po de nyid de de dag gis nyams su myong ba yin no //
translated: The thing is that very Great Lord, and they experience it.

original: bya ba nan tan grub pa'i ye shes kyis sangs rgyas sprul pa dang sems can gyi don byed pa yin no zhes bya ba'i don te /
analyzed: bya ba nan tan grub pa'i ye shes kyis sangs rgyas sprul pa dang sems can gyi don byed pa yin no zhes bya ba'i don te /
translated: The meaning is that by means of the intuition of successful action, one acts for the benefit of Buddhas and sentient beings.

original: 'dis rdo rje 'dod pa'i dbang phyug ma'i rang bzhin can gyi rdo rje sems dpa' bstan to //
analyzed: 'dis rdo rje 'dod pa'i dbang phyug ma'i rang bzhin can gyi rdo rje sems dpa' bstan to //
translated: This shows Vajrasattva, who has the nature of Vajra Lord of Desire.

original: dpal mchog dang po zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni go sla'o //üîΩgnas gang du gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor bri na rnal 'byor pas dngos grub bsgrub pa de bstan pa'i phyir /
analyzed: dpal mchog dang po zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni go sla'o // gnas gang du gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor bri na rnal 'byor pas dngos grub bsgrub pa de bstan pa'i phyir /
translated: The Glorious Supreme Original and so forth are easy to understand.

original: gsang ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: gsang ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: In order to show the place where the yogin should accomplish feats by drawing the secret mandala, [the BhagavƒÅn] declares, the secret and so forth.

original: 'dod chags rdo rje ma la sogs pa'i dpal gyi tshogs dang ldan @32b pas na gsang ba ste bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' rang nyid kyis bzhugs so //
analyzed: 'dod chags rdo rje ma la sogs pa'i dpal gyi tshogs dang ldan @32b pas na gsang ba ste bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' rang nyid kyis bzhugs so //
translated: The secret is the BhagavƒÅn Vajrasattva himself, who is endowed with the host of glories of VajrarƒÅga and so forth.

original: mchog ni phul du byung ba'o //
analyzed: mchog ni phul du byung ba'o //
translated: Supreme is excellent.

original: yid dang rjes su mthun par spyad na dgyes pa'o //
analyzed: yid dang rjes su mthun par spyad na dgyes pa'o //
translated: If one practices in accordance with his mind, he is pleased.

original: 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul phra rab dang mnyam pa'i rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis bsten pas na sangs rgyas kun gyis bsten pa'o //
analyzed: 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul phra rab dang mnyam pa'i rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis bsten pas na sangs rgyas kun gyis bsten pa'o //
translated: Since he is attended by the TathƒÅgatas Vairocana and so forth, equal to the subtle particles of all world systems, he is attended by all buddhas.

original: rdo rje sems dpa'i rang gi ye shes las byung ba'i zhugs pa ni rdo rje sems dpa'i rang gi gnas so //
analyzed: rdo rje sems dpa'i rang gi ye shes las byung ba'i zhugs pa ni rdo rje sems dpa'i rang gi gnas so //
translated: The abode of Vajrasattva is the place of Vajrasattva, which arises from his own pristine wisdom.

original: thams cad ni rigs lnga'i lha rnams kyi bdag nyid ni thams cad kyi bdag nyid de /
analyzed: thams cad ni rigs lnga'i lha rnams kyi bdag nyid ni thams cad kyi bdag nyid de /
translated: The nature of all is the nature of all the deities of the five families.

original: byang chub chen po'i sems la sogs pa las byung ba nyid kyis byang chub chen po'i sems la sogs pa'i ngo bo nyid 'di yin no zhes bstan par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: byang chub chen po'i sems la sogs pa las byung ba nyid kyis byang chub chen po'i sems la sogs pa'i ngo bo nyid 'di yin no zhes bstan par 'gyur ro //
translated: This is the essence of the great thought of enlightenment, etc., because it arises from the great thought of enlightenment, etc.

original: thams cad bdag nyid der da ltar byung ba'i ngo bos rtag tu ste dus thams cad du bzhugs pas na rtag tu bzhugs pa yin no //
analyzed: thams cad bdag nyid der da ltar byung ba'i ngo bos rtag tu ste dus thams cad du bzhugs pas na rtag tu bzhugs pa yin no //
translated: It is always present, because it is always present in the nature of the present, at all times.

original: thog mtha' med pa zhes bya ba ni bshad zin to //
analyzed: thog mtha' med pa zhes bya ba ni bshad zin to //
translated: The beginningless and endless has been explained.

original: 'di zhes bya ba ni ji lta ba bzhin du bshad pa'i mtshan nyid can no //
analyzed: 'di zhes bya ba ni ji lta ba bzhin du bshad pa'i mtshan nyid can no //
translated: This is just as it has been explained, having the nature of suchness.

original: rang byung zhes bya ba ni bsgom pa las rang nyid kho na byung ba yin gyi gzhan las ma skyes pa na rang byung ngo //
analyzed: rang byung zhes bya ba ni bsgom pa las rang nyid kho na byung ba yin gyi gzhan las ma skyes pa na rang byung ngo //
translated: Self-arisen means that it arises by itself from meditation, not born from another, and so is self-arisen.

original: bdud bzhi bcom pas na bcom ldan 'das so //
analyzed: bdud bzhi bcom pas na bcom ldan 'das so //
translated: Since he has conquered the four demons, he is the Blessed One.

original: lhag pa'i lha ni gcig pu nyid //
analyzed: lhag pa'i lha ni gcig pu nyid //
translated: The supreme deity is the one.

original: ces bya ba la 'di las mchog tu gyur pa gzhan med pas na lhag pa'i lha'o //
analyzed: ces bya ba la 'di las mchog tu gyur pa gzhan med pas na lhag pa'i lha'o //
translated: Since there is nothing higher than this, it is the supreme deity.

original: de bzhin nyid dang ro gcig pa'i sems dang sems las byung ba'i rang bzhin nyid kyis rgyud tha mi dad pas na gcig pu nyid yin no //
analyzed: de bzhin nyid dang ro gcig pa'i sems dang sems las byung ba'i rang bzhin nyid kyis rgyud tha mi dad pas na gcig pu nyid yin no //
translated: Since it is of the same taste as reality, and since it is of the same continuum as the mind and mental factors, it is the one.

original: 'di ltar 'chad par 'gyur te /üîΩgang gi phyir bcom ldan 'das 'di ji ltar bshad pa'i yon tan dang ldan pa ji lta ba bzhin du bshad pa'i gsang ba dang / thams cad kyi bdag nyid rdo rje sems dpa'i rang gi gnas su rtag tu zhugs pa grub par 'gyur ba de'i phyir ji skad du bshad pa'i khang pa sum brtsegs su gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor bris la /
analyzed: 'di ltar 'chad par 'gyur te / gang gi phyir bcom ldan 'das 'di ji ltar bshad pa'i yon tan dang ldan pa ji lta ba bzhin du bshad pa'i gsang ba dang / thams cad kyi bdag nyid rdo rje sems dpa'i rang gi gnas su rtag tu zhugs pa grub par 'gyur ba de'i phyir ji skad du bshad pa'i khang pa sum brtsegs su gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor bris la /
translated: This is how it is explained:

original: rnal 'byor pas bcom ldan 'das bsgrub par bya ste gzhan du ma yin no zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: rnal 'byor pas bcom ldan 'das bsgrub par bya ste gzhan du ma yin no zhes bya ba'o //
translated: Since this Blessed One is endowed with the qualities as explained, and since he is the secret as explained, and since he is the nature of all, and since he is always present in the abode of Vajrasattva, he is accomplished. Therefore, the secret mandala should be drawn in the three-storied palace as explained, and the yogi should accomplish the Blessed One there, not elsewhere.

original: rab tu de ltar mchog tu rjes chags dga' ba padma'i ra ba che //
analyzed: rab tu de ltar mchog tu rjes chags dga' ba padma'i ra ba che //
translated: Thus, the supreme one is the great lotus grove of supreme passion and joy.

original: mchog tu gsang ba sgrub pa zhes bya ba ni bshad zin to //üîΩsgrub pa de nyid bla na med pa yang dag par @33a * //
analyzed: mchog tu gsang ba sgrub pa zhes bya ba ni bshad zin to // sgrub pa de nyid bla na med pa yang dag par @33a * //
translated: The supreme secret is the accomplishment, as explained.üîΩThat very accomplishment is the supreme attainment, because it is the cause of the complete enlightenment of perfect buddhahood.

original: rdzogs pa'i byang chub rdzogs pa'i rgyu nyid yin pa'i phyir bla na med pa'i dngos grub ste de nyi bde ba'o //
analyzed: rdzogs pa'i byang chub rdzogs pa'i rgyu nyid yin pa'i phyir bla na med pa'i dngos grub ste de nyi bde ba'o //
translated: That is bliss.

original: gang zhig rjes su brten pa zhes bya ba ni snga ma bzhin no //
analyzed: gang zhig rjes su brten pa zhes bya ba ni snga ma bzhin no //
translated: The one who is supported is as before.

original: rab tu dga' ba ni rdo rje sems dpa' ste lha mo bzhi phreng gi dbus na bzhugs pa'o //
analyzed: rab tu dga' ba ni rdo rje sems dpa' ste lha mo bzhi phreng gi dbus na bzhugs pa'o //
translated: The supreme one is Vajrasattva, who resides in the middle of the garland of four goddesses.

original: de nyid 'dod chags kyis 'dod chags spong ba'i phyir rnal 'byor pa rnams kyi rtags su gyur pas na rgyal mtshan te /
analyzed: de nyid 'dod chags kyis 'dod chags spong ba'i phyir rnal 'byor pa rnams kyi rtags su gyur pas na rgyal mtshan te /
translated: He is the banner of yogins, because he is the sign of yogins who abandon passion through passion.

original: de bsgreng ba ni de'i sku gang la yod pa de ni rab tu dga' ba'i rgyal mtshan bsgreng ba'i rnal 'byor pa rnams so //
analyzed: de bsgreng ba ni de'i sku gang la yod pa de ni rab tu dga' ba'i rgyal mtshan bsgreng ba'i rnal 'byor pa rnams so //
translated: The one who has that raised is the yogin who has raised the banner of supreme joy.

original: dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i lha mo bzhi yang dag par 'dus pa'i rnal 'byor las byung ba'i bde ba ni dngos grub mchog gi bde ba chen po ste /
analyzed: dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i lha mo bzhi yang dag par 'dus pa'i rnal 'byor las byung ba'i bde ba ni dngos grub mchog gi bde ba chen po ste /
translated: The bliss that arises from the yoga of the complete union of the four goddesses of glorious Vajrasattva is the great bliss of the supreme attainment.

original: de'i dngos po ni bde ba chen po de nyid do //
analyzed: de'i dngos po ni bde ba chen po de nyid do //
translated: The reality of that is the reality of that great bliss.

original: dngos grub mchog gi bde ba chen po de nyid rnal 'byor pa de rnams kyis nyams su myong ba yin no //
analyzed: dngos grub mchog gi bde ba chen po de nyid rnal 'byor pa de rnams kyis nyams su myong ba yin no //
translated: That supreme attainment, the reality of great bliss, is experienced by those yogis.

original: 'di ltar 'chad par 'gyur te ji lta ba bzhin du bshad pa'i khang pa sum brtsegs su gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor bris la /
analyzed: 'di ltar 'chad par 'gyur te ji lta ba bzhin du bshad pa'i khang pa sum brtsegs su gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor bris la /
translated: This is explained as follows: Having drawn the secret mandala in the three-storied palace as explained,

original: cho ga thams cad rjes su spyad nas lha mo bzhi dang kun nas 'dus pa'i rnal 'byor gyis mdun du bcom ldan 'das bzhugs su gsol la /
analyzed: cho ga thams cad rjes su spyad nas lha mo bzhi dang kun nas 'dus pa'i rnal 'byor gyis mdun du bcom ldan 'das bzhugs su gsol la /
translated: and having performed all the rites, one should request the BhagavƒÅn to remain in front through the yoga of the complete union with the four goddesses.

original: gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus su de'i rnal 'byor gyis de'i rang bzhin can gyi bdag nyid gang gis bsgom pa de ni de'i rang bzhin can du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus su de'i rnal 'byor gyis de'i rang bzhin can gyi bdag nyid gang gis bsgom pa de ni de'i rang bzhin can du 'gyur ro //
translated: In the center of the secret mandala, by meditating on oneself as having the nature of that through the yoga of that, one becomes of the nature of that.

original: dga' ba chen po yang yin la rdo rje dang yod pa yang de nyid yin pas na dga' ba chen po rdo rje don yod pa ste /
analyzed: dga' ba chen po yang yin la rdo rje dang yod pa yang de nyid yin pas na dga' ba chen po rdo rje don yod pa ste /
translated: It is the great joy, and it is the vajra and the existent, and it is the great joy, vajra, and existent.

original: gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi dbus na bzhugs pa'i dpal rdo rje sems dpa'o //
analyzed: gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi dbus na bzhugs pa'i dpal rdo rje sems dpa'o //
translated: It is glorious Vajrasattva, who resides in the center of the secret mandala.

original: de'i dga' ba gang yin pa des dam tshig can ni rigs la skyed pa'i rgyu'o //
analyzed: de'i dga' ba gang yin pa des dam tshig can ni rigs la skyed pa'i rgyu'o //
translated: The one who is bound by his great joy is the cause of generation in the family.

original: rnal 'byor yang yin la thams cad kyang de nyid yin pa rnal 'byor thams cad de /
analyzed: rnal 'byor yang yin la thams cad kyang de nyid yin pa rnal 'byor thams cad de /
translated: It is the yoga, and it is all, and it is the yoga of all.

original: rnal 'byor dang rjes su rnal 'byor dang shin tu rnal 'byor ni rnal 'byor thams cad do //
analyzed: rnal 'byor dang rjes su rnal 'byor dang shin tu rnal 'byor ni rnal 'byor thams cad do //
translated: The yoga, the subsequent yoga, and the great yoga are the yoga of all.

original: de rnams kyi dbang phyug ni gtso bos te de skyed par byed pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de rnams kyi dbang phyug ni gtso bos te de skyed par byed pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The lord of all of them is the principal one, because he generates them.

original: dga' ba chen po rdo rje don yod pa'i dga' ba'i dam tshig thams cad kyang de yin la rnal 'byor thams cad kyi dbang phyug kyang de yin pas na dga' ba chen po'o //
analyzed: dga' ba chen po rdo rje don yod pa'i dga' ba'i dam tshig thams cad kyang de yin la rnal 'byor thams cad kyi dbang phyug kyang de yin pas na dga' ba chen po'o //
translated: It is the great joy, vajra, Amoghasiddhi, and it is the pledge of all joys, and it is the lord of all yogas.

original: rdo rje don yod pa'i dga' ba'i dam tshig dang / rnal 'byor @33b thams cad kyi dbang phyug go //
analyzed: rdo rje don yod pa'i dga' ba'i dam tshig dang / rnal 'byor @33b thams cad kyi dbang phyug go //
translated: the commitment of Vajra Amoghasiddhi's joy, and the lord of all yogins.

original: de gang zhe na /
analyzed: de gang zhe na /
translated: What is that?

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dpal rang gi dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dpal rang gi dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba la /
translated: The mandala called The Glory of All Ones Gone Thus, the Commitment Mandala of Oneself.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dpal ni lha mo bzhi phreng gi dbus na bzhugs pa lha mo thams cad kyi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba'i rdo rje sems dpa'i sku'o //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dpal ni lha mo bzhi phreng gi dbus na bzhugs pa lha mo thams cad kyi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba'i rdo rje sems dpa'i sku'o //
translated: The glory of all Ones Gone Thus is the body of Vajrasattva, residing in the center of the garland of four goddesses, surrounded by the assembly of all goddesses.

original: de nyid kyi rang gi dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor mchog tu gsang ba yin no //
analyzed: de nyid kyi rang gi dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor mchog tu gsang ba yin no //
translated: That itself is the supreme secret commitment mandala of oneself.

original: de ltar slob dpon gyi las kyi cho ga bstan nas /
analyzed: de ltar slob dpon gyi las kyi cho ga bstan nas /
translated: Having thus taught the ritual of the master's acts,

original: da ni slob ma gzhug pa la sogs pa'i cho ga rgyas par bshad par bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: da ni slob ma gzhug pa la sogs pa'i cho ga rgyas par bshad par bya ba'i phyir /
translated: now, in order to explain in detail the ritual of inducting the disciples, etc.,

original: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: [the BhagavƒÅn] declares thereupon, and so on.

original: de nas kyi sgra ni de ma thag pa'o //
analyzed: de nas kyi sgra ni de ma thag pa'o //
translated: The word thereupon means immediately after.

original: 'dir yang don 'di bshad pa yin te /
analyzed: 'dir yang don 'di bshad pa yin te /
translated: Here, this is the explanation of the meaning:

original: gal te slob ma gzhug pa'i don du rnal 'byor bas dkyil 'khor brtags pa yin la /
analyzed: gal te slob ma gzhug pa'i don du rnal 'byor bas dkyil 'khor brtags pa yin la /
translated: If the yogi/nƒ´ has visualized the ma·πá·∏çala for the sake of inducting the disciples,

original: dngos grub kyi don du ni ma yin na /
analyzed: dngos grub kyi don du ni ma yin na /
translated: but not for the sake of spiritual powers,

original: de'i tsho chog pa 'dis rnal 'byor pas slob ma gzhug par bya'o zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: de'i tsho chog pa 'dis rnal 'byor pas slob ma gzhug par bya'o zhes bya ba'o //
translated: then at that time the yogi/nƒ´ should induct the disciples with this rite.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig chen po ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig chen po ste /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig chen po ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig chen po ste /
translated: The great pledge of all Ones Gone Thus is the great pledge of all Ones Gone Thus.

original: gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor 'di byang chub chen po'i sems kyi rang bzhin nyid kyi phyir dam tshig chen po dang shin tu rnal 'byor ro //
analyzed: gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor 'di byang chub chen po'i sems kyi rang bzhin nyid kyi phyir dam tshig chen po dang shin tu rnal 'byor ro //
translated: This secret ma·πá·∏çala is the great pledge and the great yoga because it is the nature of the mind of enlightenment.

original: de ltar slob ma rnams gzhug pa la sogs pa'i cho ga ste /
analyzed: de ltar slob ma rnams gzhug pa la sogs pa'i cho ga ste /
translated: Thus, the rite of inducting the disciples and so forth

original: de rgyas pa ni byang chub chen po'i sems bskyed pa la sogs pa'i rgyun te /
analyzed: de rgyas pa ni byang chub chen po'i sems bskyed pa la sogs pa'i rgyun te /
translated: is its extensive rite, which is the continuum of generating the mind of enlightenment and so forth.üîΩThat should be explained.

original: de bshad par bya'o zhes bya ba ni bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs pa yin no //
analyzed: de bshad par bya'o zhes bya ba ni bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs pa yin no //
translated: This is what the Blessed One, Vajrasattva, said.

original: de la dang po kho na zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni go sla'o //
analyzed: de la dang po kho na zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni go sla'o //
translated: The first of these is easy to understand.

original: rigs lnga'i mtshan ma rnams ni 'dod pa kun te 'dod pa de rnams la byang chub kyi mtshan can gyi rdo rje grub pa yin te /
analyzed: rigs lnga'i mtshan ma rnams ni 'dod pa kun te 'dod pa de rnams la byang chub kyi mtshan can gyi rdo rje grub pa yin te /
translated: The signs of the five clans are all desires, and in those desires the vajra marked with enlightenment is accomplished.

original: dang po'i rdo rje la sogs pa'i rang bzhin gyi rigs kyi slob ma thams cad kyi snying ga'i zla ba'i rnam par bya ba yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: dang po'i rdo rje la sogs pa'i rang bzhin gyi rigs kyi slob ma thams cad kyi snying ga'i zla ba'i rnam par bya ba yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that the vajra marked with enlightenment is the nature of the vajra of the first stage, and so on, and is the moon in the heart of all disciples of the clan.

original: rdo rje sems dpa' nyid du 'gyur//
analyzed: rdo rje sems dpa' nyid du 'gyur//
translated: One becomes Vajrasattva itself.

original: zhes bya ba la dang po'i rdo rje dang de bzhin gshegs pa dang / khro bo'i rdo rje dang / padma'i rdo rje dang / rin po che'i rang bzhin du 'dzin pa yin no //
analyzed: zhes bya ba la dang po'i rdo rje dang de bzhin gshegs pa dang / khro bo'i rdo rje dang / padma'i rdo rje dang / rin po che'i rang bzhin du 'dzin pa yin no //
translated: The vajra of the first stage, the vajra of the Tathagata, the vajra of the wrathful one, the vajra of the lotus, and the vajra of the jewel are held.

original: gar zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: gar zhes bya ba ni /
translated: The dance is

original: ba dan gsum mchog sbyor ba yis //
analyzed: ba dan gsum mchog sbyor ba yis //
translated: the supreme union of the three banners,

original: sgeg bcas mtha' ma la sogs bkrol //
analyzed: sgeg bcas mtha' ma la sogs bkrol //
translated: with the end of the flirtatious one unraveled.

original: glog 'gyur mchog tu bskor ba ni /
analyzed: glog 'gyur mchog tu bskor ba ni /
translated: The supreme turning of the lightning

original: @34a * // rdo rje gar zhes de bshad do //
analyzed: @34a * // rdo rje gar zhes de bshad do //
translated: is explained as the vajra dance.

original: zhes bya ba 'dis rang gi lus la bskor ba'i gar phyogs bzhir phyag bya ba'i thal mo de gang la yod pa de ni gar gyi thal mo rnams so //
analyzed: zhes bya ba 'dis rang gi lus la bskor ba'i gar phyogs bzhir phyag bya ba'i thal mo de gang la yod pa de ni gar gyi thal mo rnams so //
translated: This is the mudra of the dance that circles one's body and bows in the four directions.

original: de gan gang du bya zhe na /
analyzed: de gan gang du bya zhe na /
translated: Where is it done?

original: spyi bo zhes bya ste /
analyzed: spyi bo zhes bya ste /
translated: In the head.

original: gar gyi thal mo sbyar ba de dag rang gi spyi bor bcing ba'i rdo rje gar las byung ba'i phyag bya ba'i thal mo rnams so zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //üîΩgos kyis gdong ni g-yogs pa rnams //
analyzed: gar gyi thal mo sbyar ba de dag rang gi spyi bor bcing ba'i rdo rje gar las byung ba'i phyag bya ba'i thal mo rnams so zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go // gos kyis gdong ni g-yogs pa rnams //
translated: The mudra of the dance is bound in one's head. The mudra of the bow that arises from the dance of the vajra is the meaning of the words.üîΩThose whose faces are covered with cloth

original: zhes bya ba la ji lta ba bzhin du bshad pa'i ras kyis gdong g-yogs pa ste /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la ji lta ba bzhin du bshad pa'i ras kyis gdong g-yogs pa ste /
translated: are those whose faces are covered with cloth as explained.

original: de ltar gyur pa de rnams dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i rigs lnga'i dngos grub 'dod pa ji ltar 'dod pa'i dngos grub 'dod pas te /
analyzed: de ltar gyur pa de rnams dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i rigs lnga'i dngos grub 'dod pa ji ltar 'dod pa'i dngos grub 'dod pas te /
translated: Those who are like that, desiring the siddhi of the five families such as glorious Vajrasattva, desiring the siddhi as desired,

original: slob ma de rnams thams cad rang gi cho gas gzhug par bya'o //
analyzed: slob ma de rnams thams cad rang gi cho gas gzhug par bya'o //
translated: all those disciples should be caused to enter by one's own rite.

original: gang gis dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i dngos grub gang 'dod pa ni 'dir ci 'dod pa ste /üîΩde lta bu'i 'dod pa'i dngos grub slob ma'i tshogs la bsam zhing /
analyzed: gang gis dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i dngos grub gang 'dod pa ni 'dir ci 'dod pa ste / de lta bu'i 'dod pa'i dngos grub slob ma'i tshogs la bsam zhing /
translated: Whatever powers are desired here, such as the glorious Vajrasattva, etc., are whatever is desired.

original: slob dpon gyis slob ma rnams me tog dor du gzhug par bya'o //
analyzed: slob dpon gyis slob ma rnams me tog dor du gzhug par bya'o //
translated: Thus, the master should think of the assembly of disciples as having the desired powers, and should cause the disciples to cast their flower.

original: sangs rgyas rin chen dbang bskur gyis //
analyzed: sangs rgyas rin chen dbang bskur gyis //
translated: The consecration of the Buddha jewel

original: dam tshig gsum ni gsal bar sbyin //üîΩzhes bya ba la sangs rgyas nyid ni rin po che ste sangs rgyas rin chen no //
analyzed: dam tshig gsum ni gsal bar sbyin // zhes bya ba la sangs rgyas nyid ni rin po che ste sangs rgyas rin chen no //
translated: is the clear bestowal of the three pledges.

original: de dag gis dbang bskur ba ni sangs rgyas rin chen dbang bskur ba'o //
analyzed: de dag gis dbang bskur ba ni sangs rgyas rin chen dbang bskur ba'o //
translated: Buddhahood is the jewel, and the consecration of the Buddha jewel is the consecration by the jewel of buddhahood.

original: sangs rgyas lnga'i phyag rgya'i dbang bskur ba dang / cod pan la sogs pa'i dbang bskur bas sangs rgyas rin chen dbang bskur bas te de dang bcas pa'i de kho na nyid dang / chos dang / dam tshig sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje ston par byed pa rnams thog mtha' med pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa 'og nas 'chad par 'gyur ba'i dam tshig gsum gyi bshad pa'i gzhung gis de dag sbyin par bya'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas lnga'i phyag rgya'i dbang bskur ba dang / cod pan la sogs pa'i dbang bskur bas sangs rgyas rin chen dbang bskur bas te de dang bcas pa'i de kho na nyid dang / chos dang / dam tshig sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje ston par byed pa rnams thog mtha' med pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa 'og nas 'chad par 'gyur ba'i dam tshig gsum gyi bshad pa'i gzhung gis de dag sbyin par bya'o //
translated: The three pledges are to be given by the text of the explanation of the three pledges, which will be explained below, beginning with ‚Äúwithout beginning or end,‚Äù and so on.

original: de ltar dam tshig gsum ni gsal bar sbyin par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de ltar dam tshig gsum ni gsal bar sbyin par 'gyur ro //
translated: Thus, the three pledges are clearly given.

original: 'di zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: 'di zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: ‚ÄúThis‚Äù and so on.

original: 'di ni dmyal ba'i chu yin te //
analyzed: 'di ni dmyal ba'i chu yin te //
translated: This is the water of hell.

original: khyod dam tshig las 'das pa'i rgyus dmyal ba khyod la sreg par byed do //
analyzed: khyod dam tshig las 'das pa'i rgyus dmyal ba khyod la sreg par byed do //
translated: If you transgress your pledge, it will burn you in hell.

original: de yang zangs 'bar zhing zhu ba'i chur 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de yang zangs 'bar zhing zhu ba'i chur 'gyur ro //
translated: It will become the water of burning and melting copper.

original: dam tshig bsrungs na zhes bya ba la dam tshig dang mi shes pa rnams la rdo rje la sogs pa ma bstan pas sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje dngos @34b grub rdzogs pa'i phyir dngos grub rdo rje'i bdud rtsi'i chu ni thar pa chen po'i bdud rtsi'i chu
analyzed: dam tshig bsrungs na zhes bya ba la dam tshig dang mi shes pa rnams la rdo rje la sogs pa ma bstan pas sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje dngos @34b grub rdzogs pa'i phyir dngos grub rdo rje'i bdud rtsi'i chu ni thar pa chen po'i bdud rtsi'i chu
translated: the vajra water of the spiritual powers of the vajra body, speech, and mind is the water of the nectar of great liberation,

original: ste / dam tshig bsrungs na khyod la 'grub pa yin no //
analyzed: ste / dam tshig bsrungs na khyod la 'grub pa yin no //
translated: and if you guard the commitments, you will attain the spiritual powers.

original: dam tshig de gang zhig las 'das pas bdag la skyon cir 'gyur zhe na /
analyzed: dam tshig de gang zhig las 'das pas bdag la skyon cir 'gyur zhe na /
translated: What fault will there be for me if I transgress those commitments?

original: rdo rje zhes bya ba la sogs pa la lha thams cad kyi rdo rje phyag mtshan rnams ni rdo rje'o //
analyzed: rdo rje zhes bya ba la sogs pa la lha thams cad kyi rdo rje phyag mtshan rnams ni rdo rje'o //
translated: The vajra, etc., refers to the vajra, which is the hand implement of all the deities.

original: rigs thams cad kyi mtshan mas mtshan pa ni dril bu'o //
analyzed: rigs thams cad kyi mtshan mas mtshan pa ni dril bu'o //
translated: The bell is marked with the sign of all the clans.

original: chos dang las dang dam tshig dang phyag rgya chen po rnams te /
analyzed: chos dang las dang dam tshig dang phyag rgya chen po rnams te /
translated: The Dharma, action, and pledge seals, and the great seal,

original: dam tshig de gang zhig las 'das pas bdag la skyon cir 'gyur zhe na /üîΩphyag rgya la sogs pa rnam pa gsum po 'di dag gal te dkyil 'khor du ma zhugs pa la khyod kyis smras sam /

original: ji skad du /
analyzed: ji skad du /

analyzed: rtag tu dri med thugs rje'i shugs las byung //

analyzed: de'i bdag po ni chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin gyi dpal rdo rje sems dpa'o //

original: bdag ces bya ba ni bdag po'o//

analyzed: mchod dan po'i skyes bu bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba la /
translated: The person who is the supreme worship is the BhagavƒÅn.

analyzed: rdo rje zhes bya ba la dang po'i rdo rje brjod do zhes bya ba dang sbyar ro //

original: gang gis brjod par bya zhe na /

original: mchog gi de kho na nyid kyis zhes bya ba la gang zhig thog mtha' med pa zhes bya ba nas brtsams te ;
analyzed: mchog gi de kho na nyid kyis zhes bya ba la gang zhig thog mtha' med pa zhes bya ba nas brtsams te ;

analyzed: ji srid mchog dang po'i skyes bu bcom ldan 'das so zhes bya ba'i bar gyis bstan pa 'di ni mchog gi de kho na nyid de /
translated: ends with ‚Äúthe supreme first-born person, the BhagavƒÅn‚Äù is the supreme reality.

original: des slob ma rnams la rdo rje sbyin par bya'o //
analyzed: des slob ma rnams la rdo rje sbyin par bya'o //
translated: He should give the vajra to the disciples.

original: ci byas nas she na /
analyzed: ci byas nas she na /

translated: Having explained the reality of the five secrets, the great reality of the five secrets, which has the nature of Vajrasattva, RƒÅgavajrƒ´, VajrakailƒÅsa, Vajrasm·πõti, and VajraratiprabhƒÅ, should be taught to the disciples by the words that will be explained below.

analyzed: de nas mchog gi de kho na nyid kyis rdo rje sbyin par bya'o //

analyzed: de ltar mchog gi de kho na nyid kyis rdo rje byin nas /

original: mchog gi thog ma dang tha ma med pa'o //
analyzed: mchog gi thog ma dang tha ma med pa'o //

analyzed: thams cad las phul du byung ba thams cad kyi mchog go //

original: de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya ba la /

analyzed: phyin ci log gi chos ci'i phyir gsung ba ma yin zhe na /
