original: rang bzhin dag pa zhes bya ba la chos kyi ser sna la sogs pa'i bag chags dang bcas pa'i nyon mongs pa dang bral bas na rang bzhin gyis dag pa'o //
analyzed: rang bzhin dag pa zhes bya ba la chos kyi ser sna la sogs pa'i bag chags dang bcas pa'i nyon mongs pa dang bral bas na rang bzhin gyis dag pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúPure by nature‚Äù means pure by nature because it is free from the afflictions together with their traces, such as the stinginess about the Dharma, etc.

original: ni'i sgra ni gang gi phyir gyi don to //
analyzed: ni'i sgra ni gang gi phyir gyi don to //
translated: The word ‚Äúhi‚Äù has the meaning of ‚Äúbecause.‚Äù

original: srid pa ni /
analyzed: srid pa ni /
translated: Existence

original: ngo bo nyid kyis srid bral byas //
analyzed: ngo bo nyid kyis srid bral byas //
translated: is made free from existence by its very essence.

original: zhes bya ba la 'dod pa dang gzugs dang gzugs med pa'i srid pa ni srid pa rnams so //
analyzed: zhes bya ba la 'dod pa dang gzugs dang gzugs med pa'i srid pa ni srid pa rnams so //
translated: The existences are the existences of the desire realm, the form realm, and the formless realm.

original: de dag gi ngo bo nyid rnams ni yang dag pa ma yin pa'i kun du rtog pa'i rang bzhin can gyi sems dang sems las byung bas te /
analyzed: de dag gi ngo bo nyid rnams ni yang dag pa ma yin pa'i kun du rtog pa'i rang bzhin can gyi sems dang sems las byung bas te /
translated: Their essences are the mind and mental factors that have the nature of unreal imagination.

original: de dag dang bral ba'o //
analyzed: de dag dang bral ba'o //
translated: It is free from them.

original: de ltar 'chad par 'gyur te /
analyzed: de ltar 'chad par 'gyur te /
translated: This is how it will be explained.

original: gang gi phyir mchog dang po'i skyes bu bcom ldan 'das de rang bzhin gyis dag pa dang / srid pa'i rang bzhin rnams dang bral ba de'i phyir mchog gi chos bka' stsal pa yin no //
analyzed: gang gi phyir mchog dang po'i skyes bu bcom ldan 'das de rang bzhin gyis dag pa dang / srid pa'i rang bzhin rnams dang bral ba de'i phyir mchog gi chos bka' stsal pa yin no //
translated: Because the Blessed One, the Supreme Firstborn, is pure by nature and free from the essences of existence, therefore he has proclaimed the supreme Dharma.

original: skyon zad pa ni brdzun gyi tshig brjod pa'i rgyu med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: skyon zad pa ni brdzun gyi tshig brjod pa'i rgyu med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The exhaustion of faults is because there is no cause for speaking false words.

original: mchog dang po'i skyes bu bcom ldan 'das yon tan de lta bu dang ldan pa gang gis srid pa mchog mdzad pa yin zhe na /
analyzed: mchog dang po'i skyes bu bcom ldan 'das yon tan de lta bu dang ldan pa gang gis srid pa mchog mdzad pa yin zhe na /
translated: What is the supreme person, the BhagavƒÅn, who has such qualities and makes existence supreme?

original: rang bzhin dag pa'i sems dpa' mchog //
analyzed: rang bzhin dag pa'i sems dpa' mchog //
translated: The supreme beings, whose nature is pure,

original: srid pa mchog ni mdzad pa yin //
analyzed: srid pa mchog ni mdzad pa yin //
translated: make existence supreme.

original: zhes bya ba la don dam par yang dag pa ma yin pa'i kun du rtog pa dang bral ba'i phyir rang bzhin gyis dag pa'i sems dpa' mchog ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams so //
analyzed: zhes bya ba la don dam par yang dag pa ma yin pa'i kun du rtog pa dang bral ba'i phyir rang bzhin gyis dag pa'i sems dpa' mchog ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams so //
translated: Here, the supreme beings, the bodhisattvas, whose nature is pure in the ultimate sense, are free from unreal imagination.

original: sems dpa' mchog de dag gis srid pa mchog tu zad pa yin zhes bya'o//
analyzed: sems dpa' mchog de dag gis srid pa mchog tu zad pa yin zhes bya'o//
translated: Those supreme beings make existence supreme.

original: @36b srid pa ni mchog dang po'i skyes bu mi gnas pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i rang bzhin du mdzad pa ni rtogs par mdzad pa yin te /
analyzed: @36b srid pa ni mchog dang po'i skyes bu mi gnas pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i rang bzhin du mdzad pa ni rtogs par mdzad pa yin te /
translated: Existence is made supreme, realized, as having the nature of non-abiding nirvƒÅ·πáa by the supreme person.

original: dngos po la mngon par zhen pa'i nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas rnams kyis ni ma yin no //
analyzed: dngos po la mngon par zhen pa'i nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas rnams kyis ni ma yin no //
translated: But not by the ≈õrƒÅvakas and pratyekabuddhas who are attached to real things.

original: mchog tu gsang ba'i chos nyid 'bebs pa zhes bya ba gang yin zhe na dril bu ste /
analyzed: mchog tu gsang ba'i chos nyid 'bebs pa zhes bya ba gang yin zhe na dril bu ste /
translated: What is the ‚Äúsupremely secret Dharma-nature consecration‚Äù called? It is the bell.

original: sgra'i rjes su 'gro ba'i shes rab ston par byed pa'i rdo rje dril bu'o //
analyzed: sgra'i rjes su 'gro ba'i shes rab ston par byed pa'i rdo rje dril bu'o //
translated: The bell of the vajra-bell is taught to be the wisdom that follows sound.

original: ji skad du /
analyzed: ji skad du /
translated: As it is said:

original: rdo rje des rtogs shes rab ni //
analyzed: rdo rje des rtogs shes rab ni //
translated: The vajra is the wisdom of realization,

original: dril bu dbyangs kyi rjes 'gror bshad //
analyzed: dril bu dbyangs kyi rjes 'gror bshad //
translated: The bell is said to follow the sound.

original: bdag gzhan don ni rab bsgrub pa'i //
analyzed: bdag gzhan don ni rab bsgrub pa'i //
translated: For the sake of accomplishing the aims of self and other,

original: sangs rgyas mchog nyid 'di yin no //
analyzed: sangs rgyas mchog nyid 'di yin no //
translated: This is the supreme state of buddhahood.

original: zhes gsungs so// de dus gang gi tshe dkrol bar bya zhe na /
analyzed: zhes gsungs so// de dus gang gi tshe dkrol bar bya zhe na /
translated: When should it be rung?

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ces bya ba la sogs pa rigs lnga'i lha rnams ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad de /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ces bya ba la sogs pa rigs lnga'i lha rnams ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad de /
translated: All the tathƒÅgatas and so forth refer to the deities of the five families.

original: de rnams la me tog la sogs pa dang / rdo rje mtshon cha ma la sogs pa phyag rgya bcu gnyis kyis mchod pa rnams kyis yang dag par mchod pa'am /
analyzed: de rnams la me tog la sogs pa dang / rdo rje mtshon cha ma la sogs pa phyag rgya bcu gnyis kyis mchod pa rnams kyis yang dag par mchod pa'am /
translated: Those are the offerings of the twelve seals, such as the flower, and so on, and the vajra weapon, and so on.

original: rjes su rnal 'byor gyi sbyor bas rang gi lus la ye shes sems dpa' bcug la dam tshig gi phyag rgyas rab tu bsgrubs te /
analyzed: rjes su rnal 'byor gyi sbyor bas rang gi lus la ye shes sems dpa' bcug la dam tshig gi phyag rgyas rab tu bsgrubs te /
translated: Or, having inserted the gnosis being into one‚Äôs body by the yoga of subsequent yoga, one should accomplish it with the pledge seal.

original: ji skad bshad pa'i dbyangs kyi rjes su 'gro ba'i shes rab kyi mtshan nyid can gyi chos kyi dril bu dkrol bar bya ste ;
analyzed: ji skad bshad pa'i dbyangs kyi rjes su 'gro ba'i shes rab kyi mtshan nyid can gyi chos kyi dril bu dkrol bar bya ste ;
translated: One should ring the Dharma bell, which has the characteristic of wisdom, following the melody as explained.

original: slob ma rnams la bstan par bya'o //
analyzed: slob ma rnams la bstan par bya'o //
translated: One should show it to the disciples.

original: de ltar chos kyi dril bu dkrol bas ci byed ce na /
analyzed: de ltar chos kyi dril bu dkrol bas ci byed ce na /
translated: What is the purpose of ringing the Dharma bell in that way?

original: chos thams cad kyi de kho na nyid sad pa'i 'bebs pa rnams kyis dril bu des rnal 'byor pa'i sgrib pa thams cad rnam par dag par byed pa yin no //
analyzed: chos thams cad kyi de kho na nyid sad pa'i 'bebs pa rnams kyis dril bu des rnal 'byor pa'i sgrib pa thams cad rnam par dag par byed pa yin no //
translated: By the descent of awakening that awakens the suchness of all phenomena, that bell purifies all the obscurations of the yogin.

original: chos kyang yin la thams cad kyang yin pas na chos thams cad de /
analyzed: chos kyang yin la thams cad kyang yin pas na chos thams cad de /
translated: Since it is Dharma and also all, it is all Dharmas.

original: rigs thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje rnams so //
analyzed: rigs thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje rnams so //
translated: The vajras of body, speech, and mind of all the clans.

original: de dag gi de kho na nyid ni gsang ba lnga'i de kho na nyid chen po ste /
analyzed: de dag gi de kho na nyid ni gsang ba lnga'i de kho na nyid chen po ste /
translated: Their reality is the great reality of the five secrets.

original: de thog ma med pa la zhes bya ba la sogs pa 'og nas gsungs pa yin no //
analyzed: de thog ma med pa la zhes bya ba la sogs pa 'og nas gsungs pa yin no //
translated: That is stated below with ‚ÄúThat is beginningless, etc.‚Äù

original: gdul bya'i skye bo'i rgyud la de bzhin nyid du phul du byung bas rab tu sad pa ni gdul bya rnams kyi de'i rang bzhin mngon du byed pa'i phyir 'bebs pa ni ye shes bskyed pa'o //üîΩbyed par 'gyur ba'i 'bebs pa rnams kyi de kho na nyid rtogs pa'i gegs byed pa'i sgrib pa thams cad rnam par dag pa ni dril bu de'i @37a * //
analyzed: gdul bya'i skye bo'i rgyud la de bzhin nyid du phul du byung bas rab tu sad pa ni gdul bya rnams kyi de'i rang bzhin mngon du byed pa'i phyir 'bebs pa ni ye shes bskyed pa'o // byed par 'gyur ba'i 'bebs pa rnams kyi de kho na nyid rtogs pa'i gegs byed pa'i sgrib pa thams cad rnam par dag pa ni dril bu de'i @37a * //
translated: The complete arousal of the continua of the disciples‚Äô beings in suchness is the descent of the gnosis that generates gnosis in the disciples by means of their realization of its nature.

original: sgrub pa po'i sgrib pa spong bar byed pa yin no //
analyzed: sgrub pa po'i sgrib pa spong bar byed pa yin no //
translated: The purification of all the obscurations that obstruct the realization of the reality of those descents that cause the generation of gnosis is the purification of the obscurations of the practitioner.

original: 'di yang ji ltar 'gyur zhe na /
analyzed: 'di yang ji ltar 'gyur zhe na /
translated: How is that?

original: thams cad ces bya ba la sogs pa gang gi phyir de dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i sku gsung thugs kyi rang bzhin can gyi rdo rje thams cad rnal 'byor pa'i rgyud la 'bebs par byed pa'i phyir de nyid du rdo rje thams cad rab tu
analyzed: thams cad ces bya ba la sogs pa gang gi phyir de dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i sku gsung thugs kyi rang bzhin can gyi rdo rje thams cad rnal 'byor pa'i rgyud la 'bebs par byed pa'i phyir de nyid du rdo rje thams cad rab tu
translated: In that very place, all vajras are

original: sgrub par byed pa'o //
analyzed: sgrub par byed pa'o //
translated: accomplished.

original: dbang du byed pa ni rang la rag las par byed pa'o //
analyzed: dbang du byed pa ni rang la rag las par byed pa'o //
translated: Subjugation means bringing under one‚Äôs control.üîΩPurifying means that the field of experience of all vajras is the mind of the practitioner, which is purified.

original: rab tu dang bar byed pa ni rdo rje thams cad kyi spyod yul de rnal 'byor pa'i sems dang bar byed pa de nyid yin no zhes bya ba ni sgra ni nges pa la de ltar nges par bskyed nas sgrub pa po grub par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rab tu dang bar byed pa ni rdo rje thams cad kyi spyod yul de rnal 'byor pa'i sems dang bar byed pa de nyid yin no zhes bya ba ni sgra ni nges pa la de ltar nges par bskyed nas sgrub pa po grub par 'gyur ro //
translated: Having generated certainty in that way, the practitioner will be successful.

original: de ltar chos kyi dril bu dkrol ba bstan nas /
analyzed: de ltar chos kyi dril bu dkrol ba bstan nas /
translated: Having thus explained the ringing of the Dharma bell,üîΩnow, in order to explain the vajra dance, he says, ‚ÄúThe vajra dance‚Äù and so on.

original: dam tshig gi phyag rgya chen po byin gyis brlab pa bstan par bya ba'i phyir zhes bya ba'i cho ga 'di rab tu bstan par bya ba'i phyir de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: dam tshig gi phyag rgya chen po byin gyis brlab pa bstan par bya ba'i phyir zhes bya ba'i cho ga 'di rab tu bstan par bya ba'i phyir de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: In order to teach the consecration of the great pledge seal,

original: chos kyi dril bu gcig ces bya ba bstan nas /
analyzed: chos kyi dril bu gcig ces bya ba bstan nas /
translated: having taught the single Dharma bell,

original: de'i rjes thogs nyid du srid pa rnam par dag pa mi gnas pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i mchog gi thabs zhes bya ba ni mchog kyang yin la thabs kyang de nyid yin pas na mchog gi thabs so //
analyzed: de'i rjes thogs nyid du srid pa rnam par dag pa mi gnas pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i mchog gi thabs zhes bya ba ni mchog kyang yin la thabs kyang de nyid yin pas na mchog gi thabs so //
translated: immediately after that, the supreme method of the pure existence of non-abiding nirvana is called the supreme method, because it is supreme and it is a method.

original: de ji lta bu zhe na /
analyzed: de ji lta bu zhe na /
translated: What is it like?

original: rtog pa thams cad ces bya ba ni dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba chen po'i dam tshig ni /
analyzed: rtog pa thams cad ces bya ba ni dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba chen po'i dam tshig ni /
translated: All concepts is the great secret pledge of all glorious Vajrasattva and so forth.

original: gsang ba chen po yang yin la dam tshig kyang yin pas na gsang ba'i chen po'i dam tshig go //
analyzed: gsang ba chen po yang yin la dam tshig kyang yin pas na gsang ba'i chen po'i dam tshig go //
translated: It is a great secret and it is a pledge, thus it is the great secret pledge.

original: rtog pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i dam tshig ni rtog pa thams cad kyi gsang ba chen po'i dam tshig ste /
analyzed: rtog pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i dam tshig ni rtog pa thams cad kyi gsang ba chen po'i dam tshig ste /
translated: The pledge of the secret of all concepts is the pledge of the great secret of all concepts.

original: dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i sku'i gsang ba'i rang bzhin can no //
analyzed: dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i sku'i gsang ba'i rang bzhin can no //
translated: It is the nature of the secret of the body of glorious Vajrasattva and so forth.

original: de nyid rtag tu rnal 'byor gyi bsgom pas bar mchod par bsten par bya ste /
analyzed: de nyid rtag tu rnal 'byor gyi bsgom pas bar mchod par bsten par bya ste /
translated: One should always rely on it as the supreme worship through the yoga of meditation.

original: shin tu mnyam par bzhag pa dang mnyam par ma bzhag pa'i rnal 'byor dag gis mngon du bya'o zhes bya ba slob tu gzhug go ;
analyzed: shin tu mnyam par bzhag pa dang mnyam par ma bzhag pa'i rnal 'byor dag gis mngon du bya'o zhes bya ba slob tu gzhug go ;
translated: One should cause the disciple to aspire to realize it through the yoga of meditative equipoise and the yoga of subsequent attainment.

original: /'di la 'di zhes bya ba ni snga ma bzhin no //
analyzed: /'di la 'di zhes bya ba ni snga ma bzhin no //
translated: Here, ‚Äúthis‚Äù is as above.

original: khyod la zhes bya ba ni khyod kyi dam tshig go zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: khyod la zhes bya ba ni khyod kyi dam tshig go zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: ‚ÄúYours‚Äù means ‚Äúyour pledge,‚Äù is the meaning.

original: de gang yin zhe na /
analyzed: de gang yin zhe na /
translated: What is that?

original: srid pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa 'byung bas na srid pas te mi gnas pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i mtshan nyid can gyi sku'i gsang ba'i rang @37b bzhin no //
analyzed: srid pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa 'byung bas na srid pas te mi gnas pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i mtshan nyid can gyi sku'i gsang ba'i rang @37b bzhin no //
translated: It is ‚Äúexistence,‚Äù and so forth. Existence is the nature of the secret of the body, which has the characteristic of non-abiding nirvana.

original: shin tu myur ba ni myur ba kho nar dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i bde ba'i rgyu yin pas na shin tu myur bar bde ba'o //
analyzed: shin tu myur ba ni myur ba kho nar dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i bde ba'i rgyu yin pas na shin tu myur bar bde ba'o //
translated: Very quickly means that it is the cause of bliss, such as the glorious Vajrasattva, and so on, and so it is very quickly blissful.

original: ni'i sgra ni nges par gzung ba ste myur ba kho nar bde ba'o //
analyzed: ni'i sgra ni nges par gzung ba ste myur ba kho nar bde ba'o //
translated: The word only means quickly blissful.

original: sdug bsngal chen po dag par bya ba'i phyir zhes bya ba la sogs pa la gong nas gong du rnam pa bcu'i sdug bsngal thog ma med pa'i 'jig rten las byung ba gang yin pa de sgrub pa po'i rgyud la spong ba'i phyir rnam par dag pa'o //
analyzed: sdug bsngal chen po dag par bya ba'i phyir zhes bya ba la sogs pa la gong nas gong du rnam pa bcu'i sdug bsngal thog ma med pa'i 'jig rten las byung ba gang yin pa de sgrub pa po'i rgyud la spong ba'i phyir rnam par dag pa'o //
translated: In order to purify great suffering and so on means that whatever suffering arises in the world without beginning, which is of ten kinds, is purified in the continuum of the practitioner in order to abandon it.

original: gang gi phyir shin tu bde ba dam pa ni gnyis su med pa'i ye shes kyi thabs ni rgyu'o //
analyzed: gang gi phyir shin tu bde ba dam pa ni gnyis su med pa'i ye shes kyi thabs ni rgyu'o //
translated: Because of that, the supreme bliss is the method of nondual gnosis, which is the cause.

original: de yang dam tshig 'di zhes bya ba ni mi gnas ba'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i rang bzhin can gyi srid pa 'di yin te /
analyzed: de yang dam tshig 'di zhes bya ba ni mi gnas ba'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i rang bzhin can gyi srid pa 'di yin te /
translated: And that is this samaya, which is this existence that has the nature of nonabiding nirvana.

original: de yi phyir 'di rtag tu gzung //
analyzed: de yi phyir 'di rtag tu gzung //
translated: Therefore, it is always to be held.üîΩ üîΩThe supreme bliss is the supreme bliss of the great seal, which is the result.

original: zhes bya ba ni rtag tu rnal 'byor gyi bar mchod ba nyid du sgoms shig pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni rtag tu rnal 'byor gyi bar mchod ba nyid du sgoms shig pa'o //
translated: Thus, always imagine the interval of yoga as worship.

original: de ji ltar zhe na /
analyzed: de ji ltar zhe na /
translated: How is that?

original: 'dod pa'i longs spyod thams cad ni //
analyzed: 'dod pa'i longs spyod thams cad ni //
translated: All enjoyments of desire

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la 'dod pa'i longs spyod kyang yin la thams cad kyang de nyid yin pas na 'dod pa thams cad la longs spyod pa ste /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la 'dod pa'i longs spyod kyang yin la thams cad kyang de nyid yin pas na 'dod pa thams cad la longs spyod pa ste /
translated: and so on. They are enjoyments of desire and they are all of that, thus they are enjoyments of all desires.

original: 'dod chags rdo rje ma la sogs pa'i mchod pa'i lha mo bcu gnyis dang / dpal rdo rje sems dpa' sgrub pa dang rjes su mthun pa'i rgyan dang / dbyibs dang / me tog dang / spos dang / dri la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: 'dod chags rdo rje ma la sogs pa'i mchod pa'i lha mo bcu gnyis dang / dpal rdo rje sems dpa' sgrub pa dang rjes su mthun pa'i rgyan dang / dbyibs dang / me tog dang / spos dang / dri la sogs pa'o //
translated: They are the twelve goddesses of worship such as Attachment Vajri, and the ornaments, shapes, flowers, incense, scents, and so on that are in accord with the accomplishment of glorious Vajrasattva.

original: de la 'dod pa ni rdo rje sems dpa' ste /
analyzed: de la 'dod pa ni rdo rje sems dpa' ste /
translated: Therein, desire is Vajrasattva.

original: mngon par 'dod par bya bas na 'dod pa'o //
analyzed: mngon par 'dod par bya bas na 'dod pa'o //
translated: He is desired, thus he is desire.

original: ji skad du /
analyzed: ji skad du /
translated: As it is said:

original: sems dpa' 'dod pa bcom ldan 'das //üîΩzhes gsungs so //
analyzed: sems dpa' 'dod pa bcom ldan 'das // zhes gsungs so //
translated: The Bodhisattva is the Bhagavat.üîΩAnd further:

original: gzhan yang / khams gsum pa ni ma lus pa//
analyzed: gzhan yang / khams gsum pa ni ma lus pa//
translated: The entire triple world

original: thams cad de yi longs spyod yin //
analyzed: thams cad de yi longs spyod yin //
translated: is all his enjoyment.

original: zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: zhes gsungs so //
translated: Thus he spoke.

original: ci'i 'dod pa ni brten bzhin du //
analyzed: ci'i 'dod pa ni brten bzhin du //
translated: What is desired is to be attended to,

original: zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la /
translated: as stated.

original: de la dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i rgyan rnams kyis bdag nyid brgyan cing /
analyzed: de la dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i rgyan rnams kyis bdag nyid brgyan cing /
translated: Therein, one should ornament oneself with the ornaments of glorious Vajrasattva,

original: rnal 'byor dang rjes su mthun pa'i gos la sogs pa la longs spyod pa dang / rang gi lha mo'i tshogs la yang shin tu rnal 'byor gyi bsgom pas rol cing bstan pa'o //
analyzed: rnal 'byor dang rjes su mthun pa'i gos la sogs pa la longs spyod pa dang / rang gi lha mo'i tshogs la yang shin tu rnal 'byor gyi bsgom pas rol cing bstan pa'o //
translated: and enjoy the garments, etc. that are in accord with the yoga, and also enjoy the assembly of one's goddesses by means of the meditation of the great yoga.

original: de yang ji ltar bsten par bya zhe na /
analyzed: de yang ji ltar bsten par bya zhe na /
translated: Moreover, how should one attend to them?

original: ci 'dod pa zhes bya ba la 'dod ba ma lus pa'i longs spyod thams cad bsten pa'am /
analyzed: ci 'dod pa zhes bya ba la 'dod ba ma lus pa'i longs spyod thams cad bsten pa'am /
translated: As stated, whatever is desired, one should attend to all the enjoyments of all desires,

original: phyogs gcig gi nus pa dang rjes su mthun bar byed par gyur pa de @38a * //
analyzed: phyogs gcig gi nus pa dang rjes su mthun bar byed par gyur pa de @38a * //
translated: or one should make them accord with the power of one part.

original: rnams kyis mchod par bya'o zhes bya ba dang sbyar ro //
analyzed: rnams kyis mchod par bya'o zhes bya ba dang sbyar ro //
translated: One should worship with those.

original: rnal 'byor gang gis de rnams la bsten pas /üîΩrang gi lha yi sbyor ba yis //
analyzed: rnal 'byor gang gis de rnams la bsten pas / rang gi lha yi sbyor ba yis //
translated: By means of which yoga one should attend to them,üîΩas stated, by the application of one's deity, the application of one's deity is the great yoga,

original: zhes bya ba la rang gi lha'i sbyor ba ni rnal 'byor chen po'am /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la rang gi lha'i sbyor ba ni rnal 'byor chen po'am /
translated: or the yoga of the hero.

original: rnal 'byor gcig gis byas nas de'i rjes la rang gi bdag nyid dam gzhan rnams sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' dang slob ma'i tshogs de dag gis mchod par bya'o //
analyzed: rnal 'byor gcig gis byas nas de'i rjes la rang gi bdag nyid dam gzhan rnams sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' dang slob ma'i tshogs de dag gis mchod par bya'o //
translated: Having performed the yoga, one should then make offerings to oneself, or to others, to those Buddhas and Bodhisattvas and to the assembly of disciples.

original: 'di ltar 'chad par 'gyur te /
analyzed: 'di ltar 'chad par 'gyur te /
translated: This is explained as follows.

original: rang gi lha'i rnal 'byor gyis ye shes sems dpa' gcig pu rang gi lus la gzhug pa'am /
analyzed: rang gi lha'i rnal 'byor gyis ye shes sems dpa' gcig pu rang gi lus la gzhug pa'am /
translated: Having performed the yoga of one‚Äôs deity, one should cause the wisdom-being to enter into one‚Äôs body alone,

original: rnal 'byor chen po byas la rang gi rigs kyi dkyil 'khor pa thams cad spyan drangs nas cho ga thams cad rjes su spyad la /
analyzed: rnal 'byor chen po byas la rang gi rigs kyi dkyil 'khor pa thams cad spyan drangs nas cho ga thams cad rjes su spyad la /
translated: or having performed the great yoga, one should invite all the ma·πá·∏çala deities of one‚Äôs own family, and having performed all the rites,

original: mchod pa thams cad kyis yang dag par mchod de phyag byas nas rang gi lha mo'i tshogs thams cad dang / bdag nyid gzugs brnyan dang mnyam par bsams la de dang rang lhan cig tu yang dag par sbyor bar bsgom zhing bdag nyid dang de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa rnams so sor rtog pa'i mchod pas mchod par bya'o //
analyzed: mchod pa thams cad kyis yang dag par mchod de phyag byas nas rang gi lha mo'i tshogs thams cad dang / bdag nyid gzugs brnyan dang mnyam par bsams la de dang rang lhan cig tu yang dag par sbyor bar bsgom zhing bdag nyid dang de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa rnams so sor rtog pa'i mchod pas mchod par bya'o //
translated: One should make offerings to oneself and to the Tathagatas, etc., with the offerings of discrimination.

original: dam tshig gang gis rang dang gzhan gyi mchod pa bdag gi bya ba'i dam tshig de gang yin zhe na /
analyzed: dam tshig gang gis rang dang gzhan gyi mchod pa bdag gi bya ba'i dam tshig de gang yin zhe na /
translated: What is the pledge by which one should make offerings to oneself and to others?

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ces bya ba la sogs pa la de bzhin gshegs pa yang yin la thams cad kyang de nyid yin pas na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad de /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ces bya ba la sogs pa la de bzhin gshegs pa yang yin la thams cad kyang de nyid yin pas na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad de /
translated: All the Tathagatas means that they are the Tathagatas and all of them, and so they are all the Tathagatas.

original: 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul phra rab dang mnyam pa'i rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa rnams so //
analyzed: 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul phra rab dang mnyam pa'i rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa rnams so //
translated: They are equal to the atoms in all world systems, and they are Vairocana, etc.

original: de rnams kyi thog ma dang tha ma med pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i thabs kyi ye shes byang chub sems dpa'i lam 'bras bu dang bcas pa'i ngo bo nyid ni mchog tu gsang ba bla na med pa'i theg pa chen po'o //üîΩmchog tu gsang ba yang yin la bla na med pa'i theg ba chen po yang de nyid yin pas na /
analyzed: de rnams kyi thog ma dang tha ma med pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i thabs kyi ye shes byang chub sems dpa'i lam 'bras bu dang bcas pa'i ngo bo nyid ni mchog tu gsang ba bla na med pa'i theg pa chen po'o // mchog tu gsang ba yang yin la bla na med pa'i theg ba chen po yang de nyid yin pas na /
translated: The essence of the perfection of wisdom, which is the knowledge of the means of the beginningless and endless perfection of wisdom, together with the path and the result of the bodhisattva, is the supreme, unsurpassed Great Vehicle.üîΩIt is supreme and secret, and it is the unsurpassed Great Vehicle.

original: mchog tu gsang ba bla na med pa'i theg pa chen po'o //
analyzed: mchog tu gsang ba bla na med pa'i theg pa chen po'o //
translated: Therefore, it is the supreme, unsurpassed Great Vehicle.

original: de las kyang phul du byung bas na theg pa chen po'i yang chen pos te /
analyzed: de las kyang phul du byung bas na theg pa chen po'i yang chen pos te /
translated: And since it is the most excellent of those, it is the Great of the Great Vehicles.

original: de gang gi phyir theg pa chen po des bskal ba grangs med pa gsum gyis sangs rgyas nyid thob bo zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs so //
analyzed: de gang gi phyir theg pa chen po des bskal ba grangs med pa gsum gyis sangs rgyas nyid thob bo zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs so //
translated: Because by that Great Vehicle, Buddhahood is attained in three incalculable aeons, as the Blessed One has said.

original: rdo rje theg pa 'dis @38b ni skye ba 'di nyid la'o zhes bya ba gsungs pa yin no //
analyzed: rdo rje theg pa 'dis @38b ni skye ba 'di nyid la'o zhes bya ba gsungs pa yin no //
translated: But by this Vajra Vehicle, it is in this very lifetime, as has been stated.

original: de la yang rigs lnga'i de bzhin ni rdo rje ste /
analyzed: de la yang rigs lnga'i de bzhin ni rdo rje ste /
translated: And in that, the vajra is the suchness of the five families.

original: de ston par byed pa'i rtse lnga pa ni 'dir rdo rje yin no //
analyzed: de ston par byed pa'i rtse lnga pa ni 'dir rdo rje yin no //
translated: The five-pronged vajra that teaches that is the vajra here.

original: de las byung ba'i rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i theg pa'o //
analyzed: de las byung ba'i rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i theg pa'o //
translated: The vehicle of Vairochana, etc. that arises from that is the vehicle.

original: de nyid nam mkha'i khams thams cad du rtag tu bzhugs pa'i sku gsung thugs kyi rang bzhin dang / de bzhin nyid kyi ngo bo nyid thams cad du 'gro bas na dam tshig chen po'o //
analyzed: de nyid nam mkha'i khams thams cad du rtag tu bzhugs pa'i sku gsung thugs kyi rang bzhin dang / de bzhin nyid kyi ngo bo nyid thams cad du 'gro bas na dam tshig chen po'o //
translated: That itself is the great commitment, because it is the nature of the body, speech, and mind that always exists in all the realms of space, and because it is the reality of thusness that goes everywhere.

original: de'i rnal 'byor ni rgyu mthun pa'i 'bras bus te /üîΩrdo rje dang dril bu 'dzin pa'i bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' ji lta ba bzhin du bshad pa'i mtshan nyid dang ldan pa'o ;
analyzed: de'i rnal 'byor ni rgyu mthun pa'i 'bras bus te / rdo rje dang dril bu 'dzin pa'i bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' ji lta ba bzhin du bshad pa'i mtshan nyid dang ldan pa'o ;
translated: The yoga of that is the natural result.üîΩThe BhagavƒÅn Vajrasattva, holding a vajra and a bell, is just like the one described, endowed with the characteristics.

original: / dam tshig ni thog ma dang tha ma med pa'i chos kyi dbyings las byung ba'i bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa'i sku'i gsang ba gzugs brnyan dang mtshungs par so sor snang ba tsam dam tshig yin te /
analyzed: / dam tshig ni thog ma dang tha ma med pa'i chos kyi dbyings las byung ba'i bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa'i sku'i gsang ba gzugs brnyan dang mtshungs par so sor snang ba tsam dam tshig yin te /
translated: The commitment is the secret of the body of the BhagavƒÅn Vajrasattva, who arises from the beginningless and endless dharmadhƒÅtu, which is a mere appearance of the reflection-like commitment.

original: kun gzhi'i rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin can gyi 'khor ba'i ngo bo ni ma yin no //
analyzed: kun gzhi'i rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin can gyi 'khor ba'i ngo bo ni ma yin no //
translated: It is not the nature of cyclic existence, which is the nature of the store-consciousness.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na zhes bya ba la rgyu gang gi phyir chos kyi dbyings las byung ba'i ngo bo kho na dam tshig yin gyi 'khor ba las byung ba ni ma yin no zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na zhes bya ba la rgyu gang gi phyir chos kyi dbyings las byung ba'i ngo bo kho na dam tshig yin gyi 'khor ba las byung ba ni ma yin no zhe na /
translated: Why is that? The reason is that the essence of the commitment is the essence of what arises from the Reality realm, not what arises from cyclic existence.

original: 'di ltar zhes bya ba la sogs pa la 'di ltar zhes bya ba'i sgra ni gang gi phyir zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: 'di ltar zhes bya ba la sogs pa la 'di ltar zhes bya ba'i sgra ni gang gi phyir zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: In this way, etc. The word ‚Äúin this way‚Äù is a synonym for ‚Äúbecause.‚Äù

original: de'i phyir 'da' bar dka' ba nyid kyi phyir zhes bya ba gsungs so //
analyzed: de'i phyir 'da' bar dka' ba nyid kyi phyir zhes bya ba gsungs so //
translated: Therefore, it is said that ‚Äúit is difficult to transgress.‚Äù

original: gang gis 'da' bar dka' zhe na /
analyzed: gang gis 'da' bar dka' zhe na /
translated: By whom is it difficult to transgress?

original: de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyis kyang //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyis kyang //
translated: Even by all the Tathagatas.

original: zhes bya ba la de bzhin gshegs pa yang yin la kun kyang de nyid yin pas na de bzhin gshegs pa kun te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la de bzhin gshegs pa yang yin la kun kyang de nyid yin pas na de bzhin gshegs pa kun te /
translated: He who is a Tathagata and all of them are just that are all the Tathagatas.

original: 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul phra rab dang mnyam pa'i rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul phra rab dang mnyam pa'i rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'o //
translated: They are Vairochana, etc., equal to the atoms in all world-realms.

original: de dag gis kyang bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa'i thog ma dang tha ma med pa chos kyi dbyings las byung ba'i sku'i gsang ba'i phyag rgya ni 'da' bar dka' ba yin no //
analyzed: de dag gis kyang bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa'i thog ma dang tha ma med pa chos kyi dbyings las byung ba'i sku'i gsang ba'i phyag rgya ni 'da' bar dka' ba yin no //
translated: And they also say that the seal of the body of the Blessed One Vajrasattva, which arises from the beginningless and endless dharmadhƒÅtu, is difficult to transgress.

original: kyang gi sgras ni rdo rje rgyal po la sogs pa'i rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug thams cad gzung ngo //
analyzed: kyang gi sgras ni rdo rje rgyal po la sogs pa'i rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug thams cad gzung ngo //
translated: The word ‚Äúalso‚Äù includes all the lords of yoga such as VajrarƒÅja.

original: 'dis ni don 'di 'chad par 'gyur te /
analyzed: 'dis ni don 'di 'chad par 'gyur te /
translated: This explains the following meaning:

original: gang gi phyir chos kyi dbyings las byung ba'i rdo rje sems dpa' ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis kyang 'da' bar dka' ba de'i phyir dam tshig ces bya ba yin no //üîΩci'i phyir de bzhin @39a * //
analyzed: gang gi phyir chos kyi dbyings las byung ba'i rdo rje sems dpa' ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis kyang 'da' bar dka' ba de'i phyir dam tshig ces bya ba yin no // ci'i phyir de bzhin @39a * //
translated: Because Vajrasattva, who arises from the dharmadhƒÅtu, is difficult to transgress even by all the tathƒÅgatas, therefore he is called ‚Äúcommitment.‚Äù

original: gshegs pa rnams kyis kyang de 'da' bar dka' ba yin zhe na /
analyzed: gshegs pa rnams kyis kyang de 'da' bar dka' ba yin zhe na /
translated: Why is it difficult for the tathƒÅgatas to transgress him?

original: phyag rgya zhes bya ba la sogs pa la ni'i sgra ni ci'i phyir gyi don du'o //
analyzed: phyag rgya zhes bya ba la sogs pa la ni'i sgra ni ci'i phyir gyi don du'o //
translated: In ‚Äúseal‚Äù and so on, the word ‚Äúalso‚Äù has the meaning of ‚Äúwhy.‚Äù

original: gang gi phyir yid kyis gzugs bstan pa nyid kyi phyir phyag rgya kho na dam tshig tu brjod pa de'i phyir /
analyzed: gang gi phyir yid kyis gzugs bstan pa nyid kyi phyir phyag rgya kho na dam tshig tu brjod pa de'i phyir /
translated: Since the seal is taught to be the pledge because of the mind's manifestation as form,

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis kyang 'da' bar dka' ba yin no //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis kyang 'da' bar dka' ba yin no //
translated: therefore it is difficult for all the transcendent lords to transgress.

original: de la rang gi phyag rgya chen por bskyed pas dngos po thams cad la rgyas 'debs pa ni rdo rje sems dpa' nyid du mdzad pa'i phyir phyag rgya ste /
analyzed: de la rang gi phyag rgya chen por bskyed pas dngos po thams cad la rgyas 'debs pa ni rdo rje sems dpa' nyid du mdzad pa'i phyir phyag rgya ste /
translated: Therein, the seal is the great seal generated from oneself, because it is the seal of all things, since it is the nature of Vajrasattva.

original: dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i sku'i gsang ba'i rang bzhin gyi phyag rgya chen po'o //
analyzed: dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i sku'i gsang ba'i rang bzhin gyi phyag rgya chen po'o //
translated: It is the great seal of the nature of the glorious Vajrasattva's body secret.

original: de ltar gzhan du yang shes par bya'o ;
analyzed: de ltar gzhan du yang shes par bya'o ;
translated: One should understand it in the same way in other contexts as well.

original: / dam tshig ni bshad zin to //
analyzed: / dam tshig ni bshad zin to //
translated: The pledge has been explained.

original: de nyid rab tu brjod pa mthar thug pa'i don bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs pa yin no //
analyzed: de nyid rab tu brjod pa mthar thug pa'i don bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs pa yin no //
translated: The BhagavƒÅn Vajrasattva has spoken the ultimate meaning of the expression of reality.

original: yid ces bya ba ni dmigs pa med pa'i thugs rje chen po'i mtshan nyid can gyi thog ma dang tha ma med pa'i chos kyi dbyings ni 'dir yid do//
analyzed: yid ces bya ba ni dmigs pa med pa'i thugs rje chen po'i mtshan nyid can gyi thog ma dang tha ma med pa'i chos kyi dbyings ni 'dir yid do//
translated: The mind here is the beginningless and endless ultimate realm, which has the characteristic of great compassion that is free from objectification.

original: de'i gzugs ni rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgya chen po ste de ni de las byung ngo //
analyzed: de'i gzugs ni rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgya chen po ste de ni de las byung ngo //
translated: Its form is the great seal of Vajrasattva, and that is what arises from it.

original: bstan pa ni sems can dang sems can ma yin pa rnams kyis mi phyed pa nyid de /
analyzed: bstan pa ni sems can dang sems can ma yin pa rnams kyis mi phyed pa nyid de /
translated: The teaching is the indivisibility of sentient beings and non-sentient beings,

original: yid kyis gzugs bstan pa'i rgyu de nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: yid kyis gzugs bstan pa'i rgyu de nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: because of the very cause of the mental manifestation of form.

original: 'dis ni 'di skad 'chad par 'gyur te /
analyzed: 'dis ni 'di skad 'chad par 'gyur te /
translated: This is explained as follows:

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang rigs rnams dmigs pa med pa'i thugs rje chen po las byung bas te /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang rigs rnams dmigs pa med pa'i thugs rje chen po las byung bas te /
translated: Since all the Ones-Gone-Thus and the lineages arise from great compassion that is non-apprehending,

original: de'i phyir rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgya chen po'i gzugs kyis 'dul bya sems can rnams 'dul bar mdzad pa'i phyir /
analyzed: de'i phyir rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgya chen po'i gzugs kyis 'dul bya sems can rnams 'dul bar mdzad pa'i phyir /
translated: therefore, because of taming sentient beings to be tamed through the form of the great seal of Vajrasattva,

original: nges pa nyid du de bzhin gshegs pa dang / rigs thams cad kyis de'i gzugs su gzhug pa yin no //
analyzed: nges pa nyid du de bzhin gshegs pa dang / rigs thams cad kyis de'i gzugs su gzhug pa yin no //
translated: definitely all the Ones-Gone-Thus and the lineages enter into that form.

original: de kho na nyid bsgoms pa tsam nyid kyis chos bdag med pa'i ye shes skye ba yin te /
analyzed: de kho na nyid bsgoms pa tsam nyid kyis chos bdag med pa'i ye shes skye ba yin te /
translated: The exalted wisdom of the objective selflessness of phenomena arises merely through meditating on thatness.

original: de nyid kyis bag chags dang bcas pa'i nyon mongs pa thams cad kyi bud shing sreg par 'gyur te /
analyzed: de nyid kyis bag chags dang bcas pa'i nyon mongs pa thams cad kyi bud shing sreg par 'gyur te /
translated: That very thing burns the fuel of all afflictions together with their predispositions.

original: de bas na chos dang dam tshig gi sgom pa don med pa yin no zhes rnam par brtag pa de'i lan gdab par bya ba'i phyir de la 'di brjod par bya'o zhes bya ba gsungs so //
analyzed: de bas na chos dang dam tshig gi sgom pa don med pa yin no zhes rnam par brtag pa de'i lan gdab par bya ba'i phyir de la 'di brjod par bya'o zhes bya ba gsungs so //
translated: Therefore, this is said in response to the idea that the cultivation of the Dharma and the commitments is meaningless.

original: 'di ci brjod par bya zhe na /
analyzed: 'di ci brjod par bya zhe na /
translated: What is this that is said?

original: ji srid 'khor ba'i zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: ji srid 'khor ba'i zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: It is said, ‚ÄúFor as long as cyclic existence‚Ä¶‚Äù

original: de yang sngar bshad zin to //
analyzed: de yang sngar bshad zin to //
translated: And that has already been explained above.

original: 'di ltar 'chad par 'gyur te shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i @39b sgom pas ni chos thams cad kyi dngos po'i rang bzhin rtogs par 'gyur ba yin te /
analyzed: 'di ltar 'chad par 'gyur te shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i @39b sgom pas ni chos thams cad kyi dngos po'i rang bzhin rtogs par 'gyur ba yin te /
translated: This is how it should be explained: By the cultivation of the perfection of wisdom, one realizes the nature of the reality of all phenomena.

original: des kyang shin tu yongs su mya ngan las 'das par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i skyon du 'gyur ba'i phyir gzhan gyi don gyi thabs su 'byung ba dang / mi gnas pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa sgrub bar byed pa chos dang dam tshig kyang sgom par byed pa yin no //
analyzed: des kyang shin tu yongs su mya ngan las 'das par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i skyon du 'gyur ba'i phyir gzhan gyi don gyi thabs su 'byung ba dang / mi gnas pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa sgrub bar byed pa chos dang dam tshig kyang sgom par byed pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, they cultivate the method for the benefit of others and also cultivate the Dharma and the commitments that establish nonabiding nirvana.

original: byang chub sems dpa' shes rab kyis 'ching ba yin te /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' shes rab kyis 'ching ba yin te /
translated: Bodhisattvas are bound by wisdom

original: yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i mthar thug pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i mthar thug pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: because they have reached the ultimate of complete nirvana.

original: 'khor bar yongs su mthar thug pa nyid kyi phyir thabs kyis kyang 'ching ba yin te /
analyzed: 'khor bar yongs su mthar thug pa nyid kyi phyir thabs kyis kyang 'ching ba yin te /
translated: They are also bound by method because they have reached the ultimate of samsara.

original: byang chub sems dpa' ni 'khor ba la gnas par mi bya /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' ni 'khor ba la gnas par mi bya /
translated: Bodhisattvas should not abide in samsaraüîΩand they should not abide in nirvana.

original: mya ngan las 'das pa la yang gnas par mi bya'o zhes bya bas shes rab dang thabs zung du 'jug par byed de /
analyzed: mya ngan las 'das pa la yang gnas par mi bya'o zhes bya bas shes rab dang thabs zung du 'jug par byed de /
translated: Thus they unite wisdom and method.

original: lam bsgom par bya'o zhes bya ba dang / 'phags pa 'jig rten las 'das pa'i rdo rje las kyang /
analyzed: lam bsgom par bya'o zhes bya ba dang / 'phags pa 'jig rten las 'das pa'i rdo rje las kyang /
translated: The noble Vajra of the Supramundane also says,

original: kye 'phags pa dag stong pa nyid gcig pu'i ting nge 'dzin gyis ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bsgrub par byed cing sdug bsngal mi zad pa skyed par byed la /
analyzed: kye 'phags pa dag stong pa nyid gcig pu'i ting nge 'dzin gyis ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bsgrub par byed cing sdug bsngal mi zad pa skyed par byed la /
translated: ‚ÄúO noble sirs, the meditative absorption of emptiness alone accomplishes the nirvƒÅ·πáa of the ≈õrƒÅvakas and pratyekabuddhas and produces inexhaustible suffering.

original: sangs rgyas 'byung ba rnyed par dka' bar byed pa yin te /
analyzed: sangs rgyas 'byung ba rnyed par dka' bar byed pa yin te /
translated: It makes it difficult to find the appearance of a buddha.

original: de bas na shes rab dang thabs zung du 'jug par byed pa'i lam yin no zhes bya ba'i chos de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa yin no //
analyzed: de bas na shes rab dang thabs zung du 'jug par byed pa'i lam yin no zhes bya ba'i chos de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, the TathƒÅgata has taught that the path is the union of wisdom and method.‚Äù

original: de ma rtogs pa'i sems can de rnams kyi chos bstan pa 'di thos nas mi bzad pa'i sdug bsngal de las grol bar 'gyur ba yin no //
analyzed: de ma rtogs pa'i sems can de rnams kyi chos bstan pa 'di thos nas mi bzad pa'i sdug bsngal de las grol bar 'gyur ba yin no //
translated: When sentient beings who have not realized that hear this teaching, they will be liberated from that terrible suffering.

original: dam tshig 'dis ni mchog bsgrub cing ;
analyzed: dam tshig 'dis ni mchog bsgrub cing ;
translated: By this pledge, one accomplishes the supreme.

original: / zhes bya ba la gzugs brnyan dang mtshungs pa'i dpal rdo rje sems dpa' bsgom pa'i mtshan nyid can gyi dam tshig 'di ste 'das ma thag tu bshad pas /
analyzed: / zhes bya ba la gzugs brnyan dang mtshungs pa'i dpal rdo rje sems dpa' bsgom pa'i mtshan nyid can gyi dam tshig 'di ste 'das ma thag tu bshad pas /
translated: This is the pledge of the glorious Vajrasattva, who is similar to a reflection, the nature of which is the meditation.

original: mchog ni phul du byung ba dpal rdo rje sems dpa' sgrub pa ni rang la rag las par bya ba'o //
analyzed: mchog ni phul du byung ba dpal rdo rje sems dpa' sgrub pa ni rang la rag las par bya ba'o //
translated: The supreme, which is the best, is the practice of the glorious Vajrasattva, which is dependent on oneself.

original: ni'i sgra ni nges par gzung ba la ste bsgrub par bya ba kho na yin no zhes bya'o //
analyzed: ni'i sgra ni nges par gzung ba la ste bsgrub par bya ba kho na yin no zhes bya'o //
translated: The word ni is for the purpose of restriction, meaning that it is to be practiced alone.

original: ci bde ba ni sdug bsngal dang yid mi bde ba thams cad kyi skabs med pa zhes bya'o //
analyzed: ci bde ba ni sdug bsngal dang yid mi bde ba thams cad kyi skabs med pa zhes bya'o //
translated: What is meant by as one likes is that there is no opportunity for any suffering or mental unhappiness.

original: de ltar cir 'gyur zhe na /üîΩnyes par spyad pa dang / sdig pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa la mi rigs par yongs su spyod pa ni nyes par spyod @40a * //üîΩba ste ngan par spyod pa'o //
analyzed: de ltar cir 'gyur zhe na / nyes par spyad pa dang / sdig pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa la mi rigs par yongs su spyod pa ni nyes par spyod @40a * // ba ste ngan par spyod pa'o //
translated: What is the result of that?üîΩ Bad conduct, sin, etc. Bad conduct is improper behavior, as it is said, Sharivat, you have bad conduct.üîΩSin is the cause of suffering, as it is said, Sin is the cause of suffering.

original: ji skad du sh'a ri'i bu khyod kyis nyes par spyad do zhes bya ba gsungs so //
analyzed: ji skad du sh'a ri'i bu khyod kyis nyes par spyad do zhes bya ba gsungs so //
translated: Evil is the cause of the hells, as it is said, Evil is the cause of the hells.

original: lus la sogs pa'i nyes par spyod pa ni sdig pa ste de dag thams cad kyis gnod par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: lus la sogs pa'i nyes par spyod pa ni sdig pa ste de dag thams cad kyis gnod par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: All the evil deeds of body and so forth are sins, and one will not be harmed by any of them.

original: phyag rgya chen po bsgoms pa'i stobs kyis sdig ma thams cad las grol bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: phyag rgya chen po bsgoms pa'i stobs kyis sdig ma thams cad las grol bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that by the power of meditating on the Great Seal, one will be freed from all sins.üîΩNot only will one be freed from all sins, whether committed by oneself, caused to be committed by others, or rejoiced in,

original: byas pa dang byed du bcug pa dang / rjes su yi rang ba'i sdig pa thams cad grol bar 'gyur ba gcig pur ma zad kyi /
analyzed: byas pa dang byed du bcug pa dang / rjes su yi rang ba'i sdig pa thams cad grol bar 'gyur ba gcig pur ma zad kyi /
translated: but also

original: 'dod pa chen po grub par 'gyur //
analyzed: 'dod pa chen po grub par 'gyur //
translated: one will accomplish the Great Desire.

original: zhes bya ba la byang chub chen po'i mtshan nyid can gyi dpal rdo rje sems dpa' ni 'dod pa chen po ste /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la byang chub chen po'i mtshan nyid can gyi dpal rdo rje sems dpa' ni 'dod pa chen po ste /
translated: The glorious Vajrasattva, who has the nature of Great Awakening, is the Great Desire.

original: de yang rnal 'byor pas 'grub par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de yang rnal 'byor pas 'grub par 'gyur ro //
translated: And that will be accomplished by the yogi.

original: ji lta bu zhe na /
analyzed: ji lta bu zhe na /
translated: How so?

original: kun bdag dam tshig dbang phyug ces bya ba ni kun bdag nyid kyang yin la dam tshig dbang phyug kyang yin pas kun bdag dam tshig dbang phyug ste /
analyzed: kun bdag dam tshig dbang phyug ces bya ba ni kun bdag nyid kyang yin la dam tshig dbang phyug kyang yin pas kun bdag dam tshig dbang phyug ste /
translated: The universal lord, the lord of the pledge, is the universal lord himself, and also the lord of the pledge, thus he is the universal lord, the lord of the pledge.

original: thog ma dang tha ma med pa'i chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin dang phyag rgya thams cad bskyed pa'i rgyu'i dbang phyug gtso bo zhes bya ba'i don to //

original: thams cad rdo rje 'dzin rgyal po //
analyzed: thams cad rdo rje 'dzin rgyal po //
translated: The king of all vajra holders.

original: zhes bya ba ni bshad zin to //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni bshad zin to //

analyzed: zhes bya ba las kyi tshogs kyi dngos grub kyis te las rgya'i dngos grub kyis grub par 'gyur ro // ji ltar zhe na /
