original: bdag gzhan thams cad rgyas btab pas //
analyzed: bdag gzhan thams cad rgyas btab pas //
translated: he is the supreme lord of all,

original: zhes bya ba la 'das ma thag tu bshad pa'i dam tshig des rang gi rgyud la rgyas btab pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa gzhan rnams la rgyas btab pas las kyi tshogs kyi dngos grub rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das sgrub pa po la myur du 'grub par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: zhes bya ba la 'das ma thag tu bshad pa'i dam tshig des rang gi rgyud la rgyas btab pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa gzhan rnams la rgyas btab pas las kyi tshogs kyi dngos grub rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das sgrub pa po la myur du 'grub par 'gyur ro //
translated: By this pledge just explained, the seal is impressed on one's own continuum, and by the seal impressed on others, such as the Tathagatas, the powers of the host of deeds are quickly accomplished for the Blessed One, the practitioner.

original: yang na bsgrub bya kun la yang //
analyzed: yang na bsgrub bya kun la yang //
translated: Or, for all those to be accomplished,

original: zhes bya ba la yid bzhin gyi nor bu dang / bum pa bzang po dang / ral gri dang tri sh'u la dang 'khor lo dang rdo rje dang / padma dang / bsgrub bya la sogs pa'i bsgrub bya rnams la ji lta ba bzhin du bshad pa'i bcom ldan 'das bsams na bsgrub bya de rnams 'grub @40b par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: zhes bya ba la yid bzhin gyi nor bu dang / bum pa bzang po dang / ral gri dang tri sh'u la dang 'khor lo dang rdo rje dang / padma dang / bsgrub bya la sogs pa'i bsgrub bya rnams la ji lta ba bzhin du bshad pa'i bcom ldan 'das bsams na bsgrub bya de rnams 'grub @40b par 'gyur ro //
translated: one should imagine the Blessed One as explained, and those to be accomplished, such as the wish-fulfilling gem, the excellent vase, the sword, the trident, the discus, the vajra, the lotus, and those to be accomplished, etc.

original: rgyu gang gis de rnams 'grub par 'gyur zhe na /
analyzed: rgyu gang gis de rnams 'grub par 'gyur zhe na /
translated: By what cause are they accomplished?

original: don yod ces bya ba la sogs pa la gang gi phyir de don yod cing mchog ste thog ma dang tha ma med pa'o //
analyzed: don yod ces bya ba la sogs pa la gang gi phyir de don yod cing mchog ste thog ma dang tha ma med pa'o //
translated: The meaning of successful and so forth is that it is successful, supreme, and without beginning or end.

original: grub pa zhes bya ba ni mngon par 'dod pa'i 'bras bu rdzogs bar mdzad pa'i phyir rdzogs pa'o //
analyzed: grub pa zhes bya ba ni mngon par 'dod pa'i 'bras bu rdzogs bar mdzad pa'i phyir rdzogs pa'o //
translated: The meaning of accomplished is that it is perfect because it accomplishes the desired result.

original: rnal 'byor thams cad rjes su sgrub //
analyzed: rnal 'byor thams cad rjes su sgrub //
translated: It is the yoga of all yogas.

original: ces bya ba ni rnal 'byor dang rjes su rnal 'byor dang / shin tu rnal 'byor rdzogs par mdzad pa'o //
analyzed: ces bya ba ni rnal 'byor dang rjes su rnal 'byor dang / shin tu rnal 'byor rdzogs par mdzad pa'o //
translated: The meaning of yoga of all yogas is that it is the yoga, the subsequent yoga, and the great yoga.

original: dpal ldan zhes bya ba ni brtan pa dang g-yo ba'i dngos po thams cad kyi rang bzhin can gyi dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan pa'o ;
analyzed: dpal ldan zhes bya ba ni brtan pa dang g-yo ba'i dngos po thams cad kyi rang bzhin can gyi dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan pa'o ;
translated: The meaning of glorious is that it is endowed with the perfection of glorious Vajrasattva, who is the nature of all things moving and unmoving.

original: / sdug bsngal kun 'phrog ces bya ba ni 'ching ba la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal thams cad 'phrog par mdzad pa'o //
analyzed: / sdug bsngal kun 'phrog ces bya ba ni 'ching ba la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal thams cad 'phrog par mdzad pa'o //
translated: The meaning of it snatches away all suffering is that it snatches away all suffering, such as bondage, and so forth.

original: dam tshig 'da' bar dka' ba'o //
analyzed: dam tshig 'da' bar dka' ba'o //
translated: It is the pledge that is difficult to transgress.

original: zhes bya ba ni ji lta ba bzhin du bshad pa'i mtshan nyid can gyi dam tshig dngos grub thams cad rdzogs par byed pa la 'da' bar dka' ba yin no //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni ji lta ba bzhin du bshad pa'i mtshan nyid can gyi dam tshig dngos grub thams cad rdzogs par byed pa la 'da' bar dka' ba yin no //
translated: This is the pledge that is difficult to transgress for the sake of perfecting all powers, which has the characteristics as just explained.

original: rdo rje la sogs thob pa 'dzin //
analyzed: rdo rje la sogs thob pa 'dzin //
translated: The vajra, etc., attainment is held.

original: zhes bya ba ji lta ba bzhin du bshad pa'i dam tshig gsum gyi rdo rje la sogs pa thob pa gang yin pa de nyid 'dzin pa ste /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ji lta ba bzhin du bshad pa'i dam tshig gsum gyi rdo rje la sogs pa thob pa gang yin pa de nyid 'dzin pa ste /
translated: The vajra, etc., attainment that is just explained by the three pledges is held.

original: rdo rje la sogs pa thob pa 'dzin pa de nyid las phyag rgya chen po'i dngos grub thams cad las byung ba'i bde ba rnams rdo rje slob mas dkyil 'khor du nyams su myong ba yin no //
analyzed: rdo rje la sogs pa thob pa 'dzin pa de nyid las phyag rgya chen po'i dngos grub thams cad las byung ba'i bde ba rnams rdo rje slob mas dkyil 'khor du nyams su myong ba yin no //
translated: The vajra, etc., attainment is held, and from that very [attainment] the vajra disciple experiences in the mandala the bliss that arises from all the powers of the great seal.

original: ni'i sgras ni nges par gzung ba la brtan pa la sogs pa thob cing gzung ba kho na zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: ni'i sgras ni nges par gzung ba la brtan pa la sogs pa thob cing gzung ba kho na zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The word ‚Äúonly‚Äù [in the root text] indicates that the vajra, etc., attainment is definitely held and obtained.

original: kun du 'bebs pa zhes bya ba ni kun nas 'bebs pa ni kun nas 'bebs pa ste /
analyzed: kun du 'bebs pa zhes bya ba ni kun nas 'bebs pa ni kun nas 'bebs pa ste /
translated: The ‚Äúdescent‚Äù is the descent.

original: rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje rnams rdo rje slob ma'i rgyud la 'jug pa'o //
analyzed: rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje rnams rdo rje slob ma'i rgyud la 'jug pa'o //
translated: The vajra of body, speech, and mind of Vajrasattva, etc. , enter the continuum of the vajra disciple.

original: kun nas 'bebs pa'i rgyud de nyid las dngos grub thams cad kyi bde ba rnams dkyil 'khor du nyams su myong ba ni myong ba yin no //
analyzed: kun nas 'bebs pa'i rgyud de nyid las dngos grub thams cad kyi bde ba rnams dkyil 'khor du nyams su myong ba ni myong ba yin no //
translated: In that very Tantra of Bestowal, the experience of the bliss of all powers in the mandala is experience.

original: ni'i sgra ni gang gi phyir gyi don te /
analyzed: ni'i sgra ni gang gi phyir gyi don te /
translated: The word ni has the sense of ‚Äúbecause.‚Äù

original: gang gi phyir rdo rje slob ma rnams kun du 'bebs pas dngos grub thams cad kyi bde ba rnams dkyil 'khor du nyams su myong ba de'i phyir /
analyzed: gang gi phyir rdo rje slob ma rnams kun du 'bebs pas dngos grub thams cad kyi bde ba rnams dkyil 'khor du nyams su myong ba de'i phyir /
translated: Because the vajra disciples are bestowed with the experience of the bliss of all powers in the mandala, therefore

original: gzengs bstod pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la lung bstan par bya'o zhes bya ba dang sbyar ro //
analyzed: gzengs bstod pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la lung bstan par bya'o zhes bya ba dang sbyar ro //
translated: they should be exhorted and prophesied by all the Tathagatas.

original: kyang gi sgra ni bsdu ba ste /
analyzed: kyang gi sgra ni bsdu ba ste /
translated: The word also has the sense of ‚Äúincluding.‚Äù

original: dam tshig gsum sbyin par bya ba dang / @41a * //
analyzed: dam tshig gsum sbyin par bya ba dang / @41a * //
translated: The bestowal of the three pledges

original: gzengs bstod pa dang lung bstan par bya'o //
analyzed: gzengs bstod pa dang lung bstan par bya'o //
translated: and the exhortation and prophecy should be done.

original: de yang ji ltar bya zhe na /
analyzed: de yang ji ltar bya zhe na /
translated: How is that done?

original: kun zhes bya ba la sogs pa la rin chen 'byung ldan gyi nga rgyal gyis de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 'byung ldan gyi las kyi phyag rgya bcings la /
analyzed: kun zhes bya ba la sogs pa la rin chen 'byung ldan gyi nga rgyal gyis de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 'byung ldan gyi las kyi phyag rgya bcings la /
translated: In all and so forth, one should bind the action seal of Ratnasa·πÉbhava with the pride of Ratnasa·πÉbhava, and

original: rdo rje ming gi ming dbang bskur ba rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la lung bstan par bya'o //
analyzed: rdo rje ming gi ming dbang bskur ba rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la lung bstan par bya'o //
translated: with the consecration of the name of the vajra name, one should prophesy the tathƒÅgatas.

original: ni'i sgra ni nges par bzung ba la bya ste /
analyzed: ni'i sgra ni nges par bzung ba la bya ste /
translated: The word ‚Äúonly‚Äù is to be understood.

original: rdo rje slob ma de rnams de bzhin gshegs pa kho nar lung bstan par bya ste /
analyzed: rdo rje slob ma de rnams de bzhin gshegs pa kho nar lung bstan par bya ste /
translated: One should prophesy those vajra disciples as only tathƒÅgatas,

original: de bzhin gshegs pa ma yin par ni ma yin no zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa ma yin par ni ma yin no zhes bya ba'o //
translated: not as non-tathƒÅgatas.

original: de la 'di zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni go sla'o //
analyzed: de la 'di zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni go sla'o //
translated: In there and so forth, the meaning is easy to understand.

original: mchog tu gsang ba'i cho ga ni dkyil 'khor te /
analyzed: mchog tu gsang ba'i cho ga ni dkyil 'khor te /
translated: The supreme secret rite is the ma·πá·∏çala.

original: der slob ma gang la slob dpon gyis gzengs bstod pas lung bstan par byas na /
analyzed: der slob ma gang la slob dpon gyis gzengs bstod pas lung bstan par byas na /
translated: If the master extols and prophesies a disciple there,

original: de la rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa rnams kyis lung ston par mdzad do zhes bya ba dang sbyar ro //
analyzed: de la rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa rnams kyis lung ston par mdzad do zhes bya ba dang sbyar ro //
translated: it should be applied that Vajrasattva and so forth will prophesy him.

original: rdo rje sems dpa' thog ma gang la yod pa de ni rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: rdo rje sems dpa' thog ma gang la yod pa de ni rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'o //
translated: Vajrasattva is the one who is at the beginning of the Vajrasattva, etc.

original: de dag kyang gang yin zhe na /
analyzed: de dag kyang gang yin zhe na /
translated: And what are they?

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ces bya ba ni rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ces bya ba ni rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'o //
translated: All the Tathagatas means Vairochana, etc.

original: rdo rje 'chang dang bcas pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa la de dang lhan cig pas na rdo rje 'chang dang bcas pa'o //
analyzed: rdo rje 'chang dang bcas pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa la de dang lhan cig pas na rdo rje 'chang dang bcas pa'o //
translated: Together with the Vajradhara, etc. means together with him.

original: byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dang bcas pa'i zhes bya ba ni 'phags pa byams pa dang lhan cig tu bzhugs pas na byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dang bcas pa'o //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dang bcas pa'i zhes bya ba ni 'phags pa byams pa dang lhan cig tu bzhugs pas na byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dang bcas pa'o //
translated: Together with the retinue of the great Bodhisattvas means together with the noble Maitreya.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rang gi dam tshig ni rigs lnga'i dkyil 'khor rnams te /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rang gi dam tshig ni rigs lnga'i dkyil 'khor rnams te /
translated: The pledge of all the Tathagatas is the mandalas of the five families.

original: de dag gi slob dpon rnams ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rang gi dam tshig gi slob dpon rnams so //
analyzed: de dag gi slob dpon rnams ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rang gi dam tshig gi slob dpon rnams so //
translated: The masters of those are the masters of the pledge of all the Tathagatas.

original: rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa de rnams ji lta ba bzhin du bshad pa /
analyzed: rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa de rnams ji lta ba bzhin du bshad pa /
translated: Those Tathagatas, Vajrasattva and so forth, just as they were explained,

original: rigs thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor byed pa'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: rigs thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor byed pa'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: are the makers of the ma·πá·∏çala of all the clans.

original: mnyam par zhes bya ba ni dus gcig tu'o //
analyzed: mnyam par zhes bya ba ni dus gcig tu'o //
translated: ‚ÄúEqually‚Äù means at the same time.

original: de nyid bshad par bya ba'i phyir mgrin gcig tu zhes bya ba gsungs pa yin no //
analyzed: de nyid bshad par bya ba'i phyir mgrin gcig tu zhes bya ba gsungs pa yin no //
translated: In order to explain just that, ‚Äúin one voice‚Äù is stated.üîΩThe one-pointedness of all the Tathagatas, Vajrasattva and so forth, just as they were explained, is the prophecy of unsurpassed perfect complete enlightenment.

original: ji skad bshad pa'i rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis @41b gcig pa nyid du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ston par mdzad do zhes bya ba dad par bya ba'o zhes bya ba dang
analyzed: ji skad bshad pa'i rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis @41b gcig pa nyid du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ston par mdzad do zhes bya ba dad par bya ba'o zhes bya ba dang
translated: This is to be connected with ‚Äúshould be known as the faith.‚Äù

original: sbyar ro // gang gi stobs kyis she na ji lta ba bzhin du bshad pa'i gzengs bstod pa dang phyag rgya chen po'i stobs kyis so //
analyzed: sbyar ro // gang gi stobs kyis she na ji lta ba bzhin du bshad pa'i gzengs bstod pa dang phyag rgya chen po'i stobs kyis so //
translated: By the power of what? By the power of the exaltation and the great seal just as they were explained.

original: mchog tu gsang ba dam pa'i dngos grub kyis byin gyis brlabs so zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: mchog tu gsang ba dam pa'i dngos grub kyis byin gyis brlabs so zhes bya ba la /
translated: The consecration of the supreme secret, the highest spiritual power.

original: mchog tu gsang ba ni ji lta ba bzhin du bshad pa'i dkyil 'khor 'di lta ste /
analyzed: mchog tu gsang ba ni ji lta ba bzhin du bshad pa'i dkyil 'khor 'di lta ste /
translated: The supreme secret is this mandala, which is explained as it is.

original: der dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i sku gsung thugs slob ma'i rgyud la rdzogs pa gang yin pa de ni dngos grub dam pa ste /
analyzed: der dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i sku gsung thugs slob ma'i rgyud la rdzogs pa gang yin pa de ni dngos grub dam pa ste /
translated: The highest spiritual power is the perfection of the body, speech, and mind of glorious Vajrasattva, etc. in the disciple's continuum.

original: gzengs bstod pa'i phyag rgya chen po de nyid kyis 'di byin gyis brlabs pa yin te /
analyzed: gzengs bstod pa'i phyag rgya chen po de nyid kyis 'di byin gyis brlabs pa yin te /
translated: That is consecrated by the very same great seal of exaltation.

original: byin gyis brlabs pa de'i stobs kyis zhes bya ba dang sbyar ro //
analyzed: byin gyis brlabs pa de'i stobs kyis zhes bya ba dang sbyar ro //
translated: It is to be applied with by the power of that consecration.

original: aom 'di ni ngas khyod lung bstan yin //
analyzed: aom 'di ni ngas khyod lung bstan yin //
translated: O·πÉ, this is my prophecy for you.

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i sngags 'di nyid kyis dad par bya ba ni rdo rje slob ma thams cad kyis rtogs par bya ba yin no //
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i sngags 'di nyid kyis dad par bya ba ni rdo rje slob ma thams cad kyis rtogs par bya ba yin no //
translated: This very mantra, This is my prophecy for you, etc. is to be believed by all vajra disciples.

original: de nas zhes bya ba la 'das ma thag tu gang dag dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i cho gas ji lta ba bzhin du bzhugs pa de rnams la /
analyzed: de nas zhes bya ba la 'das ma thag tu gang dag dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i cho gas ji lta ba bzhin du bzhugs pa de rnams la /
translated: Then, those who have been installed just as they are by the ritual of glorious Vajrasattva and so forth,

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'dus pa ste de 'jug pa la sogs pa'i thog mar gang yod pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'dus pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'dus pa ste de 'jug pa la sogs pa'i thog mar gang yod pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'dus pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: all the Tathagatas gather together, and that which is at the beginning of their entry and so forth is the gathering together of all the Tathagatas and so forth.

original: de yang dbugs dbyung ba ni gdul bya rnams la gang gis dga' ba skyed par byed pas na dbugs dbyung ba ste /
analyzed: de yang dbugs dbyung ba ni gdul bya rnams la gang gis dga' ba skyed par byed pas na dbugs dbyung ba ste /
translated: Moreover, the encouragement is that which generates delight in the disciples.

original: de nyid slob ma rnams la slob dpon gyis gsal bar bstan par bya'o zhes bya'o //
analyzed: de nyid slob ma rnams la slob dpon gyis gsal bar bstan par bya'o zhes bya'o //
translated: That should be clearly taught to the disciples by the master.

original: rang gi dam tshig ni yi ge h'um ste /üîΩdes rjes su chags pa ni dkyil 'khor la mngon du phyogs par byas pa'o //
analyzed: rang gi dam tshig ni yi ge h'um ste / des rjes su chags pa ni dkyil 'khor la mngon du phyogs par byas pa'o //
translated: One's pledge is the syllable hum.üîΩBy that, the passion is the facing of the mandala.

original: de nyid kyi dkyil 'khor gyi phyogs bzhir dgug pa ni drangs pa'o //
analyzed: de nyid kyi dkyil 'khor gyi phyogs bzhir dgug pa ni drangs pa'o //
translated: That very mandala is summoned to the four directions.

original: de nyid kyi stobs kyis gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor 'dir de rnams sgo bzhi nas 'jug pa'o //
analyzed: de nyid kyi stobs kyis gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor 'dir de rnams sgo bzhi nas 'jug pa'o //
translated: By the power of that, they enter this secret mandala through the four doors.

original: dbang du byas pa ni de nyid kyi stobs kyis slob dpon gyis rang la rag las par byas pa'o //
analyzed: dbang du byas pa ni de nyid kyi stobs kyis slob dpon gyis rang la rag las par byas pa'o //
translated: Brought under control means that by the power of that, they are made to depend on the master.

original: sgrub pa ni dam tshig gi phyag rgya la sogs pas sgrub pa'o //
analyzed: sgrub pa ni dam tshig gi phyag rgya la sogs pas sgrub pa'o //
translated: Accomplishment means accomplishment by means of the pledge seal, etc.

original: rjes su sgrub pa ni glu dang rol mo'i cho gas so //üîΩrdo rje dbyings thams cad ni dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i @42a * //
analyzed: rjes su sgrub pa ni glu dang rol mo'i cho gas so // rdo rje dbyings thams cad ni dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i @42a * //
translated: Accomplishment of the result means by means of the song and music ritual.

original: sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje rnams so //
analyzed: sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje rnams so //
translated: All vajra realms means the vajra body, speech, and mind of glorious Vajrasattva, etc.

original: de rnams kyi bstan pa nyid ni mi phyed pas te /
analyzed: de rnams kyi bstan pa nyid ni mi phyed pas te /
translated: The teaching of those very things is indivisibility,

original: phyed par bya ba dang phyed par byed pa'i ngo bo nyid med pa des dpal gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor 'dir bstan par gyur pa ste /
analyzed: phyed par bya ba dang phyed par byed pa'i ngo bo nyid med pa des dpal gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor 'dir bstan par gyur pa ste /
translated: because there is no nature of being divided or a divider. By that, they become the teaching in this glorious secret mandala.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje'i rang bzhin rnams kyis 'dir mi phyed par 'gyur ba yin no //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje'i rang bzhin rnams kyis 'dir mi phyed par 'gyur ba yin no //
translated: The nature of all the vajras of the body, speech, and mind of all the Ones-Gone-Thus becomes indivisible here.

original: chos kyi dbyings thams cad ces bya ba la /
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings thams cad ces bya ba la /
translated: In the realm of all phenomena,

original: chos kyi dbyings kyang yin la thams cad kyang de nyid yin pas na chos kyi dbyings thams cad de de nyid do //
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings kyang yin la thams cad kyang de nyid yin pas na chos kyi dbyings thams cad de de nyid do //
translated: it is the realm of phenomena, and it is all of that, thus it is the realm of all phenomena.

original: de kun du ste phyogs bcur kun du 'gro zhing bzhugs pa'o ;
analyzed: de kun du ste phyogs bcur kun du 'gro zhing bzhugs pa'o ;
translated: It is everywhere, pervading the ten directions.

original: / de'i dngos po ni kun du bzhugs pa nyid de /
analyzed: / de'i dngos po ni kun du bzhugs pa nyid de /
translated: Its state is its pervasiveness.

original: de gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor 'dir mtha' yas pa'i sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje rnams kyis kun nas bzhugs pa ni khyab pa yin no //
analyzed: de gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor 'dir mtha' yas pa'i sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje rnams kyis kun nas bzhugs pa ni khyab pa yin no //
translated: It is present in this secret mandala with the infinite vajras of body, speech, and mind.

original: 'dis ni 'di ltar 'chad par 'gyur te /
analyzed: 'dis ni 'di ltar 'chad par 'gyur te /
translated: This is explained as follows.

original: chos bdag med pa'i ye shes dang / de'i 'bras bu de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje'i rang bzhin can gang yin pa des ni thams cad du khyab pa yin pas mtha' yas pa'i rgyud las byung ba'i phyir mtha' yas par gyur pa yin no zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: chos bdag med pa'i ye shes dang / de'i 'bras bu de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje'i rang bzhin can gang yin pa des ni thams cad du khyab pa yin pas mtha' yas pa'i rgyud las byung ba'i phyir mtha' yas par gyur pa yin no zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The wisdom of the selflessness of phenomena and the result of that, which is the nature of the vajra of body, speech, and mind of all the tathagatas, pervades everything, and therefore is infinite because it arises from the infinite tantras.

original: de ltar 'jig rten las 'das pa la rab tu grags pa'i chos kyi dbyings kun du bzhugs pa nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi tshad med pa nyid bstan nas /
analyzed: de ltar 'jig rten las 'das pa la rab tu grags pa'i chos kyi dbyings kun du bzhugs pa nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi tshad med pa nyid bstan nas /
translated: Thus, having taught the immeasurable nature of the Tathagatas by their abiding in the ultimate realm, which is renowned in the world,

original: da ni 'jig rten las rab tu grags pa'i mtha' yas pa nyid bstan par bya ba'i phyir nam mkha'i khams thams cad ces bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te ;
analyzed: da ni 'jig rten las rab tu grags pa'i mtha' yas pa nyid bstan par bya ba'i phyir nam mkha'i khams thams cad ces bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te ;
translated: now, in order to teach their infinitude, which is renowned in the world, he says, the infinitude of the realm of space, etc.

original: nam mkha'i khams kyang yin la thams cad kyang de yin pas na nam mkha'i khams thams cad de /
analyzed: nam mkha'i khams kyang yin la thams cad kyang de yin pas na nam mkha'i khams thams cad de /
translated: Since it is the realm of space and it is all of it, it is the infinitude of the realm of space.

original: 'jig rten la rab tu grags pa'o //
analyzed: 'jig rten la rab tu grags pa'o //
translated: It is renowned in the world.

original: de'i rgya chen po nyid gang yin pa de ni nam mkha'i khams thams cad kyi rgya chen po nyid de phyogs bcu nam mkha'i mtha' yas pa'i dngos po nyid do //
analyzed: de'i rgya chen po nyid gang yin pa de ni nam mkha'i khams thams cad kyi rgya chen po nyid de phyogs bcu nam mkha'i mtha' yas pa'i dngos po nyid do //
translated: The greatness of that is the infinitude of the realm of space, the fact that the ten directions are the infinite extent of space.

original: rgya chen po de nyid kyis gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor 'dir dpag tu med pa'i sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje rnams kyis bzhugs shing /
analyzed: rgya chen po de nyid kyis gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor 'dir dpag tu med pa'i sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje rnams kyis bzhugs shing /
translated: By that greatness, the Tathagatas abide in this secret mandala with immeasurable vajra body, speech, and mind.

original: rab tu bzhugs pa ni shin tu bzhugs pa'o //
analyzed: rab tu bzhugs pa ni shin tu bzhugs pa'o //
translated: The very well is the well of very well.

original: de rnams kyis khyed cag la dbugs dbyung ba mdzad pa yin te /
analyzed: de rnams kyis khyed cag la dbugs dbyung ba mdzad pa yin te /
translated: They have given you relief,

original: de la dang @42b par bya'o zhes bya ba dang sbyar ro //
analyzed: de la dang @42b par bya'o zhes bya ba dang sbyar ro //
translated: and you should be devoted to them.

original: ci mdzad nas she na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ces bya ba la sogs pa la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rang gi dam tshig ni bshad zin to //
analyzed: ci mdzad nas she na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ces bya ba la sogs pa la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rang gi dam tshig ni bshad zin to //
translated: What have they done? All the tathagatas, etc. The own commitments of all the tathagatas have already been explained.

original: de ltar slob dpon ni dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon de la rag las pa ni de'i dbang du gyur pa ste /
analyzed: de ltar slob dpon ni dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon de la rag las pa ni de'i dbang du gyur pa ste /
translated: Thus, the master is dependent on the mandala master, under his control,

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad nyid gdul bya rnams la mngon du mdzad nas /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad nyid gdul bya rnams la mngon du mdzad nas /
translated: and all the tathagatas, having manifested themselves to the disciples,

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon 'di nyid de bzhin gshegs pa yin no zhes byin gyis brlabs pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rang bzhin can gyi dkyil 'khor bstan par mdzad nas /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon 'di nyid de bzhin gshegs pa yin no zhes byin gyis brlabs pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rang bzhin can gyi dkyil 'khor bstan par mdzad nas /
translated: bless this very mandala master of all the tathagatas as being a tathagata, and having revealed the mandala endowed with the nature of all the tathagatas,

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon ni rang gi dam tshig gi slob dpon dang mgrin gcig tu 'da' bar dka' ba'i slob dpon gyi zhal gyis khyed rnams la dbugs dbyung bar mdzad pa yin te /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon ni rang gi dam tshig gi slob dpon dang mgrin gcig tu 'da' bar dka' ba'i slob dpon gyi zhal gyis khyed rnams la dbugs dbyung bar mdzad pa yin te /
translated: The master of the ma·πá·∏çala of all tathƒÅgatas, with one voice, together with your pledge master, has given you all encouragement, which is difficult to obtain.

original: khyed kyis dad par bya ba ni the tshom mi bya'o //
analyzed: khyed kyis dad par bya ba ni the tshom mi bya'o //
translated: You should have faith in that, and not doubt it.

original: mthong ba zhes bya ba ni rdo rje lcags kyu ma nas rdo rje sems dpa'i bar du kha dog dang dbyibs kyi bdag nyid can gyi rten dang brten pa'i dkyil 'khor blta'o //
analyzed: mthong ba zhes bya ba ni rdo rje lcags kyu ma nas rdo rje sems dpa'i bar du kha dog dang dbyibs kyi bdag nyid can gyi rten dang brten pa'i dkyil 'khor blta'o //
translated: ‚Äú Seeing‚Äù means that you should see the ma·πá·∏çala of the support and the supported, which has the nature of color and shape, from Vajra·πÖku≈õƒ´ up to Vajrasattva.

original: rab tu zhugs pa zhes bya ba ni phyi dang gsang ba'i 'jug pas dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor du zhugs par bya'o //
analyzed: rab tu zhugs pa zhes bya ba ni phyi dang gsang ba'i 'jug pas dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor du zhugs par bya'o //
translated: ‚Äú Entering‚Äù means that you should enter the secret ma·πá·∏çala of ≈örƒ´ Vajrasattva through the outer and secret entrances.

original: de gang yin zhe na /
analyzed: de gang yin zhe na /
translated: What is that?

original: gsang ba dam pa'i dkyil 'khor ro //
analyzed: gsang ba dam pa'i dkyil 'khor ro //
translated: The ma·πá·∏çala of the sublime secret.

original: srog gcod pa la sogs pa'i sdig pa thams cad dang bral bas khyed legs par gnas te /
analyzed: srog gcod pa la sogs pa'i sdig pa thams cad dang bral bas khyed legs par gnas te /
translated: You are well situated, free from all sins, such as killing, and so on.

original: dus 'di nas bzung nas byang chub snying po thob kyi bar du sdug bsngal gyi rgyu thams cad dang bral zhing bde ba dang yid bde ba thams cad dang rjes su mthun pa'i lha dang mi'i srid pa la yid dga' bas gnas pas legs par gnas pa'o //
analyzed: dus 'di nas bzung nas byang chub snying po thob kyi bar du sdug bsngal gyi rgyu thams cad dang bral zhing bde ba dang yid bde ba thams cad dang rjes su mthun pa'i lha dang mi'i srid pa la yid dga' bas gnas pas legs par gnas pa'o //
translated: From this time on, until the attainment of the essence of enlightenment, you will be well-placed, free from all causes of suffering, and abiding with a joyful mind in the existence of gods and humans, which is conducive to all happiness and mental pleasure.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: khyed rnams slar yang 'chi ba med //
analyzed: khyed rnams slar yang 'chi ba med //
translated: You will not die again.

original: ces bya ba la sogs pa la dkyil 'khor mthong ba dang de nyid du zhugs pa'i phyir khyed rnams la slar yang shi ba yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: ces bya ba la sogs pa la dkyil 'khor mthong ba dang de nyid du zhugs pa'i phyir khyed rnams la slar yang shi ba yod pa ma yin no //
translated: Because you have seen the ma·πá·∏çala and entered it, you will not die again.

original: bde chen theg pa 'dir zhugs pas //
analyzed: bde chen theg pa 'dir zhugs pas //
translated: Because you have entered this vehicle of great bliss,

original: zhes bya ba ni thar pa chen po'i rang bzhin gyi rdo rje theg pa chen po 'di la zhugs pa'i phyir ro //üîΩde ltar yin pa de'i phyir mi tshugs pa ni theg pa gzhan la @43a * //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni thar pa chen po'i rang bzhin gyi rdo rje theg pa chen po 'di la zhugs pa'i phyir ro // de ltar yin pa de'i phyir mi tshugs pa ni theg pa gzhan la @43a * //
translated: you have entered this Great Vehicle of Vajra, which has the nature of great liberation.üîΩSince that is so, you are unassailable, because

original: 'dod pa'i bsam pas mi mthun pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'dod pa'i bsam pas mi mthun pa'i phyir ro //
translated: you are not assailed by the intention of other vehicles.

original: mi sod pa zhes bya ba ni de nyid kyis bde ba chen po'i theg pa 'di las ltung bar mi 'gyur ba'o //
analyzed: mi sod pa zhes bya ba ni de nyid kyis bde ba chen po'i theg pa 'di las ltung bar mi 'gyur ba'o //
translated: The phrase not to be killed means that one will not fall from this vehicle of great bliss.

original: rol bar gyis zhes bya ba ni rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i dngos grub bsgrub par gyis shig pa'o //
analyzed: rol bar gyis zhes bya ba ni rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i dngos grub bsgrub par gyis shig pa'o //
translated: The phrase play with it means that one should attain the powers of Vajrasattva and so forth.

original: cis kyang 'jigs pa med pa ni srid pa'i sdug bsngal nyid med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: cis kyang 'jigs pa med pa ni srid pa'i sdug bsngal nyid med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The phrase fearless of anything means that there is no suffering of cyclic existence.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /üîΩsrid pa'i sdug bsngal ldog pa ni //
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na / srid pa'i sdug bsngal ldog pa ni //
translated: Why is that?

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la mthong ba dang zhugs pa 'dis 'dod pa'i srid pa la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal mtha' med pa 'di khyed rnams la ldog pa med pa'i phyir ro //üîΩsrid pa shin tu grub pa'i phyir //
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la mthong ba dang zhugs pa 'dis 'dod pa'i srid pa la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal mtha' med pa 'di khyed rnams la ldog pa med pa'i phyir ro // srid pa shin tu grub pa'i phyir //
translated: The phrase the cessation of the suffering of cyclic existence and so forth means that this endless suffering of cyclic existence, such as the desire realm, is not averted for you.

original: zhes bya ba ni mi gnas pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa grub pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni mi gnas pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa grub pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The phrase because of the accomplishment of cyclic existence means that one accomplishes non-abiding nirvana.

original: ston pa mchog tu gyur pa yin //
analyzed: ston pa mchog tu gyur pa yin //
translated: The phrase the supreme teacher means that one becomes the supreme teacher of the world.üîΩ The phrase the supreme bliss means that one becomes the supreme bliss of the world.

original: zhes bya ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi phul du byung ba byed pa yin no //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi phul du byung ba byed pa yin no //
translated: This is the supreme activity of the Tathagatas.

original: shin tu ni phyi ma'i mthar gnas pa'o//
analyzed: shin tu ni phyi ma'i mthar gnas pa'o//
translated: Very means abiding in the future.

original: de gang yin zhe na /
analyzed: de gang yin zhe na /
translated: What is that?

original: srid pa grub pa zhes bya ba ni mi gnas pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i rang bzhin te longs spyod rdzogs pa ni srid pa'i dngos grub rnams so //
analyzed: srid pa grub pa zhes bya ba ni mi gnas pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i rang bzhin te longs spyod rdzogs pa ni srid pa'i dngos grub rnams so //
translated: The accomplishment of existence is the nature of non-abiding nirvana, and the enjoyment is the accomplishments of existence.

original: 'di ltar 'chad par 'gyur te gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor mthong pa dang zhugs pa dag gis sdig pa thams cad dang bral zhing mi gnas pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa thob pa'i snod du gyur pa 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal thams cad dang bral zhing phyir mi ldog par
analyzed: 'di ltar 'chad par 'gyur te gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor mthong pa dang zhugs pa dag gis sdig pa thams cad dang bral zhing mi gnas pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa thob pa'i snod du gyur pa 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal thams cad dang bral zhing phyir mi ldog par
translated: It will be explained like this: Those who see and enter the secret mandala become vessels for attaining all good qualities and non-abiding nirvana, free from all the sufferings of samsara, and irreversible.

original: khyed rnams rdzogs pa yin no zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: khyed rnams rdzogs pa yin no zhes bya ba'o //
translated: You all are complete.

original: 'di zhes bya ba ni 'chad par 'gyur ba'i dam tshig dang sngom pa thugs la gnas pa gsungs pa yin no //
analyzed: 'di zhes bya ba ni 'chad par 'gyur ba'i dam tshig dang sngom pa thugs la gnas pa gsungs pa yin no //
translated: This refers to the vows and commitments that will be explained, which are said to abide in the mind.

original: khyed kyis rtag tu de skad cig ma re re la bsrung ba ni yongs su bskyang ba'o //
analyzed: khyed kyis rtag tu de skad cig ma re re la bsrung ba ni yongs su bskyang ba'o //
translated: You always protect it in every moment, which is to guard it completely.

original: grub pa ni rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i dngos grub stsol bas ni rdzogs pa'o //
analyzed: grub pa ni rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i dngos grub stsol bas ni rdzogs pa'o //
translated: It is perfected by the bestowal of the powers of Vajrasattva and so forth.

original: dam tshig dang sngom pa de yang sangs rgyas kun te ji lta ba bzhin du bshad pa rnams kyis mthun pa ni dus gcig tu mgrin gcig gis gsungs te bstan pa yin no //
analyzed: dam tshig dang sngom pa de yang sangs rgyas kun te ji lta ba bzhin du bshad pa rnams kyis mthun pa ni dus gcig tu mgrin gcig gis gsungs te bstan pa yin no //
translated: And that pledge and vow is the same for all the Buddhas, who speak with one voice and teach it at the same time.

original: bka' ni bka' stsal pa'o //
analyzed: bka' ni bka' stsal pa'o //
translated: The word is the pronouncement.

original: mchog tu rtag pa ni nges pa'i don yin gyi drang ba'i don ma yin no //
analyzed: mchog tu rtag pa ni nges pa'i don yin gyi drang ba'i don ma yin no //
translated: It is of definitive meaning, not interpretable meaning.

original: 'di ltar 'chad par 'gyur te /
analyzed: 'di ltar 'chad par 'gyur te /
translated: It is explained as follows:

original: byang chub sems ni gtang mi bya //
analyzed: byang chub sems ni gtang mi bya //
translated: Do not abandon the Thought of Enlightenment.

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gang zhig de @43b bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis mchog tu rtag pa'i bka' gsungs pa de nyid dam tshig dang sngom pa khyed la rtag tu grub pas bsrung bar bya ba yin no //
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gang zhig de @43b bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis mchog tu rtag pa'i bka' gsungs pa de nyid dam tshig dang sngom pa khyed la rtag tu grub pas bsrung bar bya ba yin no //
translated: That which is spoken by all the Tathagatas as the supreme constant, that very pledge and vow is to be guarded by you always as perfected.

original: byang chub ni rang gi sems ji lta ba bzhin du yongs su shes pa'o //
analyzed: byang chub ni rang gi sems ji lta ba bzhin du yongs su shes pa'o //
translated: Enlightenment is the thorough knowledge of one's own mind just as it is.

original: de nyid bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ste /
analyzed: de nyid bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ste /
translated: That itself is the unsurpassed, perfect enlightenment.

original: de'i rang bzhin can dang de thob pa'i rgyu byang chub kyi sems te smon pa byang chub kyi sems dang / 'jug pa byang chub kyi sems so //
analyzed: de'i rang bzhin can dang de thob pa'i rgyu byang chub kyi sems te smon pa byang chub kyi sems dang / 'jug pa byang chub kyi sems so //
translated: The cause of its attainment is the Thought of Enlightenment, which is of two kinds: the aspirational Thought of Enlightenment and the engaged Thought of Enlightenment.

original: de spang bar mi bya'o //üîΩphyag rgya rdo rje gang yin pa'o //
analyzed: de spang bar mi bya'o // phyag rgya rdo rje gang yin pa'o //
translated: One should not abandon it.üîΩThe vajra seal is the five-pointed vajra of emptiness.

original: zhes bya ba ni gang zhig stong pa nyid kyi rdo rje rtse lnga pa'i phyag rgyas yongs su brtags nas zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du tishtha badzra zhes bya bas bskyed par bya ba yin no //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni gang zhig stong pa nyid kyi rdo rje rtse lnga pa'i phyag rgyas yongs su brtags nas zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du tishtha badzra zhes bya bas bskyed par bya ba yin no //
translated: One should generate it by visualizing the five-pointed vajra of emptiness and then saying ti·π£·π≠ha vajra on top of the moon disk.

original: gang zhig bskyed pa tsam gyis ni //
analyzed: gang zhig bskyed pa tsam gyis ni //
translated: By merely generating it,

original: zhes bya ba la zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du yongs su brtags pa tsam gyis phyir mi ldog pa'i bag chags skyed pas dus gsum na bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang mnyam pa nyid kyis da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas nyid du rnal 'byor
analyzed: zhes bya ba la zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du yongs su brtags pa tsam gyis phyir mi ldog pa'i bag chags skyed pas dus gsum na bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang mnyam pa nyid kyis da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas nyid du rnal 'byor
translated: In this way, by merely imagining the moon mandala, the latent tendencies of irreversibility are generated, and through the sameness of all tathagatas abiding in the three times, the yogi is in the present buddhahood.üîΩ

original: pas shes par bya'o //
analyzed: pas shes par bya'o //
translated: One should know that the yogin is the present Buddha by virtue of being the same as all the Tathagatas dwelling in the three times, because the mere imagination of the syllable a on the moon disc generates the instinct of irreversibility.

original: 'di la the tshom mi bya'o zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: 'di la the tshom mi bya'o zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: One should not doubt this, means that one should not doubt that the yogin is the present Buddha.

original: de ltar gyur pa'i byang chub kyi sems de rnal 'byor pas spang par mi bya'o //
analyzed: de ltar gyur pa'i byang chub kyi sems de rnal 'byor pas spang par mi bya'o //
translated: The yogin should not abandon that thought of enlightenment which is thus generated.

original: dam pa rnams kyi chos ni dam pa'i chos te theg pa gsum du bstan pa'i chos so //
analyzed: dam pa rnams kyi chos ni dam pa'i chos te theg pa gsum du bstan pa'i chos so //
translated: The Dharma of the holy ones is the holy Dharma, the Dharma taught in the three vehicles.

original: de smad par mi bya ba ni 'di chos ma yin te /
analyzed: de smad par mi bya ba ni 'di chos ma yin te /
translated: One should not disparage it, saying, This is not the Dharma,

original: 'dis ci zhig bya zhes brjod par mi bya'o //
analyzed: 'dis ci zhig bya zhes brjod par mi bya'o //
translated: what is the use of this?

original: nam yang spang bar mi bya'o //
analyzed: nam yang spang bar mi bya'o //
translated: One should never abandon it.

original: zhes bya ba ni bdag la 'di dgos pa med pas 'di bdag gis spang bar bya zhes pa'i ngag gam yid kyi rnam grangs gang gis kyang yongs su spang phar mi bya'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni bdag la 'di dgos pa med pas 'di bdag gis spang bar bya zhes pa'i ngag gam yid kyi rnam grangs gang gis kyang yongs su spang phar mi bya'o //
translated: One should not abandon them by any means of speech or thought, such as, I have no need of these, so I will abandon them.

original: theg pa gsum gyi chos yongs su spang bar mi bya'o zhes bya ba ji ltar shes par 'gyur zhe na /üîΩnyan thos kyi theg pa las gsungs pa'am /üîΩrang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa las gsungs pa'am /
analyzed: theg pa gsum gyi chos yongs su spang bar mi bya'o zhes bya ba ji ltar shes par 'gyur zhe na / nyan thos kyi theg pa las gsungs pa'am / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa las gsungs pa'am /
translated: How does one know that one should not abandon the Dharma of the three vehicles?üîΩThe noble Akasagarbhasutra says,üîΩIf one disparages the holy Dharma taught in the Disciple's Vehicle,

original: theg pa chen po las gsungs pa'i dam pa'i chos sun 'byin na dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad 'jig par byed cing /
analyzed: theg pa chen po las gsungs pa'i dam pa'i chos sun 'byin na dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad 'jig par byed cing /
translated: the Solitary Buddha's Vehicle, or the Universal Vehicle, one destroys all the roots of virtue.

original: pham par gyur cing mnar med pa la sogs pa yin no zhes 'phags pa nam mkha'i snying po'i mdo las gsungs pa'i phyir ro //üîΩmi shes pa zhes bya ba ni thos pa'i shes pas @44a * //
analyzed: pham par gyur cing mnar med pa la sogs pa yin no zhes 'phags pa nam mkha'i snying po'i mdo las gsungs pa'i phyir ro // mi shes pa zhes bya ba ni thos pa'i shes pas @44a * //
translated: One is defeated, and is bound for Avici Hell.

original: ma nges pa'o //
analyzed: ma nges pa'o //
translated: Ignorance means not being certain through the knowledge of learning.

original: rmongs pa ni thos pa dang bsam pa dang sgom pa'i rang bzhin gyi shes rab med pas rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i bdag nyid thams cad yongs su ma shes pas theg pa gsum gyi chos la ji ltar bshad pa'i sgrub pa po des smad par mi bya'o
analyzed: rmongs pa ni thos pa dang bsam pa dang sgom pa'i rang bzhin gyi shes rab med pas rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i bdag nyid thams cad yongs su ma shes pas theg pa gsum gyi chos la ji ltar bshad pa'i sgrub pa po des smad par mi bya'o
translated: Since delusion is the absence of the wisdom that arises from hearing, reflection, and meditation, and since one does not fully understand the nature of dependent origination, one should not disparage the practitioner who practices the Dharma of the three vehicles as explained.

original: ; / rang zhes bya ba la phyi'i dngos po yang rang gi sgras brjod pas de rnam par spyad pa'i phyir bdag nyid ces bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: ; / rang zhes bya ba la phyi'i dngos po yang rang gi sgras brjod pas de rnam par spyad pa'i phyir bdag nyid ces bya ba gsungs te /
translated: Since external things are also referred to by the word ‚Äúone‚Äôs own,‚Äù in order to eliminate that, ‚Äúone‚Äôs own nature‚Äù is stated.

original: phung po lnga'i rang bzhin gyi bdag nyid lus dang srog la ltos pa med pa nyid kyis bya ba'i rgyud las gsungs pa'i mi zad pa'i dka' thub bco brgyad po dang / rlung gi yal ga dang lce ba'i zas dang / rnal 'byor gyi gnyen por gyur pa'i bza' ba la sogs pa'i dka' thub rnams kyis yongs su spangs nas gdung bar mi bya'o //
analyzed: phung po lnga'i rang bzhin gyi bdag nyid lus dang srog la ltos pa med pa nyid kyis bya ba'i rgyud las gsungs pa'i mi zad pa'i dka' thub bco brgyad po dang / rlung gi yal ga dang lce ba'i zas dang / rnal 'byor gyi gnyen por gyur pa'i bza' ba la sogs pa'i dka' thub rnams kyis yongs su spangs nas gdung bar mi bya'o //

original: 'o na bdag nyid ji ltar gzung bar bya zhe na /üîΩci bde bar bya zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: 'o na bdag nyid ji ltar gzung bar bya zhe na / ci bde bar bya zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /

analyzed: dka' thub dang dka' ba spyod pa med pa ni ci bde ba ste /

original: byang chub kyi sems ston par byed pa'i dang po'i rdo rje'i rang bzhin can gyi phyag mtshan ni rdo rje'o //
analyzed: byang chub kyi sems ston par byed pa'i dang po'i rdo rje'i rang bzhin can gyi phyag mtshan ni rdo rje'o //
translated: The vajra is the hand implement of the nature of the first vajra that teaches the thought of awakening.

original: dang po'i rdo rjes mtshan pa'i dril bu shes rab ston par byed pa'i sgra rjes su 'gro ba'i phyag mtshan ni dril bu'o //
analyzed: dang po'i rdo rjes mtshan pa'i dril bu shes rab ston par byed pa'i sgra rjes su 'gro ba'i phyag mtshan ni dril bu'o //
translated: The bell is the hand implement that teaches wisdom, which is marked with the first vajra and has the sound that accompanies it.

original: dam tshig dang / chos dang / las dang phyag rgya chen po ni phyag rgya ste /
analyzed: dam tshig dang / chos dang / las dang phyag rgya chen po ni phyag rgya ste /
translated: The pledge, dharma, and karma mudras are the mudras.

original: phyag rgyal sogs pa gsum po 'di dag spang bar mi bya'o //
analyzed: phyag rgyal sogs pa gsum po 'di dag spang bar mi bya'o //
translated: These three, the mudra and so on, should not be abandoned.

original: bsams pa tsam gyis 'di dag thams cad 'grub pa yin te /
analyzed: bsams pa tsam gyis 'di dag thams cad 'grub pa yin te /
translated: All of these are accomplished merely by thinking of them.

original: phyag rgya la sogs pa 'di dag gis ci zhig bya zhes bya ba 'di yongs su spangs na pham par 'gyur ro zhes gsungs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: phyag rgya la sogs pa 'di dag gis ci zhig bya zhes bya ba 'di yongs su spangs na pham par 'gyur ro zhes gsungs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: If one abandons the thought, ‚ÄúWhat is the use of these mudras and so on?‚Äù one will be defeated.

original: gang gis rnal @44b 'byor pa dkyil 'khor du 'jug par byed pa'i slob dpon de la khyod tshul khrims 'chal ba dang brtson 'grus zhan pa dang rmongs pa yin no zhes smod par mi bya'o //
analyzed: gang gis rnal @44b 'byor pa dkyil 'khor du 'jug par byed pa'i slob dpon de la khyod tshul khrims 'chal ba dang brtson 'grus zhan pa dang rmongs pa yin no zhes smod par mi bya'o //
translated: One should not disparage the master who causes the yogƒ´ to enter the ma·πá·∏çala, saying, ‚ÄúYou are immoral, weak in effort, and deluded.‚Äù

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: de ni sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam //
analyzed: de ni sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam //
translated: Because he is equal to all the buddhas.

original: zhes bya ba la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yon tan skyed pa'i rgyu nyid kyi phyir sgrub pa pos ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mnyes par bya ba de bzhin du rang gi dam tshig gi slob dpon yang mnyes par bya ba yin no
analyzed: zhes bya ba la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yon tan skyed pa'i rgyu nyid kyi phyir sgrub pa pos ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mnyes par bya ba de bzhin du rang gi dam tshig gi slob dpon yang mnyes par bya ba yin no
translated: Since he is the cause for generating the qualities of all the tathƒÅgatas, just as one should please all the tathƒÅgatas, so too should one please one‚Äôs samaya master.

original: // de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: // de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: sangs rgyas nyid kyang bcom ldan la //
analyzed: sangs rgyas nyid kyang bcom ldan la //
translated: Because the Blessed One

original: tshe 'di nyid la ster bar byed ;
analyzed: tshe 'di nyid la ster bar byed ;
translated: bestows buddhahood in this very life.

original: / ces bya bas de ni sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam pa yin no //
analyzed: / ces bya bas de ni sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam pa yin no //
translated: Thus, he is equal to all the buddhas.

original: slob dpon la ni gang smod pa //
analyzed: slob dpon la ni gang smod pa //
translated: One should not disparage the master,

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: and so on.

original: gang gis slob dpon la brnyas par byed pa //
analyzed: gang gis slob dpon la brnyas par byed pa //
translated: Whoever insults the master

original: des ni rtag tu sdug bsngal 'thob //
analyzed: des ni rtag tu sdug bsngal 'thob //
translated: will always obtain suffering.

original: ces bya ba 'dis kyang slob dpon la brnyas pa gang yin pa de la yang mi bya'o //
analyzed: ces bya ba 'dis kyang slob dpon la brnyas pa gang yin pa de la yang mi bya'o //
translated: By this also, one should not insult the master.

original: bag med pas gal te byas na de'i tshe slob dpon la zhal zas bstabs la gang dang gang yid du 'ong ba de dang de slob dpon la dbul bar bya'o //
analyzed: bag med pas gal te byas na de'i tshe slob dpon la zhal zas bstabs la gang dang gang yid du 'ong ba de dang de slob dpon la dbul bar bya'o //
translated: If one does so out of carelessness, then at that time one should offer food to the master, and whatever is pleasing to the mind, that one should offer to the master.

original: de ltar na rims la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal rnams de la slar yang 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de ltar na rims la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal rnams de la slar yang 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro //
translated: In this way, the suffering of fever, etc. will not arise again.

original: rtag tu rang gi dam tshig bsrung //
analyzed: rtag tu rang gi dam tshig bsrung //
translated: Always protect one's own commitment.

original: zhes bya ba ni rang gi lhag pa'i lha'i sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje ni rang gi dam tshig ste /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni rang gi lhag pa'i lha'i sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje ni rang gi dam tshig ste /
translated: One's own commitment is the body, speech, and mind vajra of one's own special deity.

original: de rtag tu rnal 'byor pas rang la rag las par bya ba yin no //
analyzed: de rtag tu rnal 'byor pas rang la rag las par bya ba yin no //
translated: That should always be protected by the yogi/nƒ´.

original: rtag tu de bzhin gshegs pa mchod //
analyzed: rtag tu de bzhin gshegs pa mchod //
translated: Always worship the TathƒÅgatas.

original: ces bya ba ni rdo rje mtshon cha ma la sogs pa dang / phyi'i me tog la sogs pa rnams kyis nam mkha' khyab par byas pa la tshogs yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams yang dag par mchod par bya'o //
analyzed: ces bya ba ni rdo rje mtshon cha ma la sogs pa dang / phyi'i me tog la sogs pa rnams kyis nam mkha' khyab par byas pa la tshogs yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams yang dag par mchod par bya'o //
translated: This is the complete assembly of Vajra Weapon and so forth, and the outer flowers and so forth, filling the sky, in order to make a complete assembly, one should make offerings to the Tathagatas Vajrasattva and so forth.

original: tshogs las dngos grub mchog tu 'gyur //
analyzed: tshogs las dngos grub mchog tu 'gyur //
translated: From the assembly, there is the supreme power,

original: zhes 'og nas gsungs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: zhes 'og nas gsungs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is said below.

original: mnyam pa zhes bya ba ni mtshungs pa'o //
analyzed: mnyam pa zhes bya ba ni mtshungs pa'o //
translated: Equal means the same.

original: gang dang mnyam zhe na /
analyzed: gang dang mnyam zhe na /
translated: With what is it equal?

original: dam tshig lha zhes bya ba ni dam tshig kyang yin la lha yang yin pas na dam tshig lha ste rigs lnga'i gsang ba'i phyag rgya'i rang bzhin no //
analyzed: dam tshig lha zhes bya ba ni dam tshig kyang yin la lha yang yin pas na dam tshig lha ste rigs lnga'i gsang ba'i phyag rgya'i rang bzhin no //
translated: With the pledge deities, because they are both pledges and deities, they are the pledge deities, the nature of the secret mudras of the five families.

original: dam tshig gi lha de dag dang mnyam pa'o //
analyzed: dam tshig gi lha de dag dang mnyam pa'o //
translated: It is equal to those pledge deities.

original: di ring @45a * //
analyzed: di ring @45a * //
translated: Today,

original: skye ba ni dkyil 'khor mthong ba dang der 'jug pa'i dus nas brtsams te rang byung sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi dam tshig gi lha gang yin pa de dag dang lhan cig tu khyed rnams mnyam par 'gyur ba yin no //
analyzed: skye ba ni dkyil 'khor mthong ba dang der 'jug pa'i dus nas brtsams te rang byung sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi dam tshig gi lha gang yin pa de dag dang lhan cig tu khyed rnams mnyam par 'gyur ba yin no //
translated: Birth is from the time of seeing the mandala and entering it, you all become equal to those who are the pledge deities of the self-originated Buddhas, the Bhagavans.

original: di ring khyed rnams la gsang ba'i dbang bskur bas dbang bskur ba 'dzin pa yin no //
analyzed: di ring khyed rnams la gsang ba'i dbang bskur bas dbang bskur ba 'dzin pa yin no //
translated: Today, you all are empowered by the secret empowerment, and you are empowered to hold it.

original: gang gis she na /
analyzed: gang gis she na /
translated: By whom?

original: sangs rgyas rdo rje 'dzin bcas pas //
analyzed: sangs rgyas rdo rje 'dzin bcas pas //
translated: By all the Buddhas together with the Vajra Holders.

original: zhes bya ba ni rdo rje sems dpa' dang / rdo rje 'chang chen po dang bcas pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyis so //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni rdo rje sems dpa' dang / rdo rje 'chang chen po dang bcas pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyis so //
translated: This is by all the Buddhas together with Vajrasattva and Great Vajradhara.

original: 'dod pa dang / gzugs dang / gzugs med pa'i khams kyi rang bzhin gyi khams gsum pa'i rgyal srid chen po thob pa'i phyir rgyal po'i bdag po ste /
analyzed: 'dod pa dang / gzugs dang / gzugs med pa'i khams kyi rang bzhin gyi khams gsum pa'i rgyal srid chen po thob pa'i phyir rgyal po'i bdag po ste /
translated: The lord of kings is because of obtaining the great kingdom of the three realms, which have the nature of the desire realm, the form realm, and the formless realm.

original: 'dod pa'i khams kyi dbang phyug gi rgyal po'i bdag po rnams so //
analyzed: 'dod pa'i khams kyi dbang phyug gi rgyal po'i bdag po rnams so //
translated: They are the lords of kings who are the lords of the desire realm.

original: brtan pa ni rtag pas te dkyil 'khor 'dir zhugs nas phyir mi ldog pa'i sa bon bskyed pas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon du byed pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: brtan pa ni rtag pas te dkyil 'khor 'dir zhugs nas phyir mi ldog pa'i sa bon bskyed pas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon du byed pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The firm are the permanent ones, because having entered this mandala, the seed of the stage of non-retrogression is generated, and one realizes perfect complete enlightenment.

original: de bas na /
analyzed: de bas na /
translated: Therefore,

original: de ni bdud las rnam rgyal te //
analyzed: de ni bdud las rnam rgyal te //
translated: it is said, he is victorious over Mara.

original: zhes bya ste bdud las rnam par rgyal zhing gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi grong khyer mchog tu rab tu zhugs pas khyed rnams kyis di ring kho na sangs rgyas nyid thob pa yin no ;
analyzed: zhes bya ste bdud las rnam par rgyal zhing gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi grong khyer mchog tu rab tu zhugs pas khyed rnams kyis di ring kho na sangs rgyas nyid thob pa yin no ;
translated: Because he is victorious over Mara, and because he has entered the supreme city of the secret mandala, today you have attained Buddhahood.

original: / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rang gi dpal dam tshig gi gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor ni 'di nyid do //
analyzed: / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rang gi dpal dam tshig gi gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor ni 'di nyid do //
translated: This is the very secret mandala of the commitment of the glory of all Tathagatas.

original: de la slob dpon slob ma'i mchog dag ni slob dpon dang slob ma'i mchog ste /
analyzed: de la slob dpon slob ma'i mchog dag ni slob dpon dang slob ma'i mchog ste /
translated: There, the master and best of disciples are the master and best of disciples.

original: de dag gi dbugs dbyung ba ni 'di yin te /
analyzed: de dag gi dbugs dbyung ba ni 'di yin te /
translated: Their relief is this.

original: aom sarba yo ga tsittam au p'a da y'a mi zhes bya ba smon pa byang chub kyi sems skyed pa'i rjes thogs nyid byang chub kyi sems dang lhan cig tu bskyed pa yin no //
analyzed: aom sarba yo ga tsittam au p'a da y'a mi zhes bya ba smon pa byang chub kyi sems skyed pa'i rjes thogs nyid byang chub kyi sems dang lhan cig tu bskyed pa yin no //
translated: After generating the thought of enlightenment, which is the aspiration to enlightenment, one should generate the thought of enlightenment together with the seal.

original: gang dang lhan cig tu zhe na /
analyzed: gang dang lhan cig tu zhe na /
translated: With what?

original: byang chub kyi sems bskyed pa'i mtshan nyid can gyi phyir mi ldog pa'i phyag rgya dang lhan cig tu sangs rgyas nyid rtogs par bya ba yin no //
analyzed: byang chub kyi sems bskyed pa'i mtshan nyid can gyi phyir mi ldog pa'i phyag rgya dang lhan cig tu sangs rgyas nyid rtogs par bya ba yin no //
translated: With the seal of non-retrogression, which is characterized by the generation of the thought of enlightenment, one should realize buddhahood.

original: ni'i sgra ni gang gi phyir gyi don to //
analyzed: ni'i sgra ni gang gi phyir gyi don to //
translated: The word ni has the sense of because.

original: rtogs par bya ba ni shes par bya ba'o //
analyzed: rtogs par bya ba ni shes par bya ba'o //
translated: Realization is to be known.

original: de ji lta bu yin zhe na /
analyzed: de ji lta bu yin zhe na /
translated: How is it?

original: mkhas shing mchog tu rtag pa'o //
analyzed: mkhas shing mchog tu rtag pa'o //
translated: It is said, the wise, the supreme, the eternal.

original: zhes bya ba ni buddha ni rtogs pa la bya ste thabs dang shes rab kyi rang bzhin can gyi byang chub chen po rtogs pa nyid kyi phyir mkhas @45b pa'o ;
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni buddha ni rtogs pa la bya ste thabs dang shes rab kyi rang bzhin can gyi byang chub chen po rtogs pa nyid kyi phyir mkhas @45b pa'o ;
translated: Buddha means realization, because one realizes great enlightenment, which is the nature of method and wisdom.

original: / mchog tu rtag pa zhes bya ba ni thog ma dang tha ma med pa'o //
analyzed: / mchog tu rtag pa zhes bya ba ni thog ma dang tha ma med pa'o //
translated: The supreme eternal is without beginning or end.

original: de'i rgyu gang yin zhe na zhes bya ba la rgyu gang gis bdag cag gi bdag nyid thams cad byang chub tu sems bskyed pa nyid kyis mchog tu rtag pa'i sangs rgyas nyid du rtogs par bgyi zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: de'i rgyu gang yin zhe na zhes bya ba la rgyu gang gis bdag cag gi bdag nyid thams cad byang chub tu sems bskyed pa nyid kyis mchog tu rtag pa'i sangs rgyas nyid du rtogs par bgyi zhes bya ba'o //
translated: By what cause should we understand that our entire self, by the mere generation of the Thought of Awakening, is the supreme, eternal Buddhahood?

original: de'i phyir khyed rnams kyi phung po lnga'i rang bzhin can gyi bdag nyid thams cad /
analyzed: de'i phyir khyed rnams kyi phung po lnga'i rang bzhin can gyi bdag nyid thams cad /
translated: Therefore, your entire self, which has the nature of the five aggregates,

original: aom sarba yo ga tsittvam au p'a da y'a mi zhes bya ba 'dis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byang chub kyi sems bskyed pa tsam gyi mthus bsam pa dang bsgom pa dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ro//
analyzed: aom sarba yo ga tsittvam au p'a da y'a mi zhes bya ba 'dis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byang chub kyi sems bskyed pa tsam gyi mthus bsam pa dang bsgom pa dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ro//
translated: by this [formula], Om! All Yoga! Citta! I generate the resolve! by the mere power of generating the Thought of Awakening of all the TathƒÅgatas, you will become irreversible, in order to be free from intention and meditation.

analyzed: de'i phyir nges pa'i phung po la gnas pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges pa nyid kyis ma byon pa'i sangs rgyas dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dang mnyam pa nyid kyis khyed rnams kyis bdag nyid thams cad 'di ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa nyid du rtogs par bya ba yin no //

original: ji ltar byang chub chen po'i sems bskyed pa'i mthus dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dang mnyam pa nyid kyis da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa nyid du rjes su rtogs par bya ba de bzhin du /

translated: in the same way, you should realize that you are the very same as the TathƒÅgata who has not come into the present, by means of the sameness with the TathƒÅgatas of the three times, by the power of generating the mind of great enlightenment.

translated: The supreme permanence is the commitment that is difficult to transgress without a beginning or end, in which the yoga of meditating on the mudra of the body, speech, and mind of glorious Vajrasattva, who resides in the center of the garland of four goddesses, isüîΩüîΩ

translated: If one realizes that, one definitely becomes the vajra body, speech, and mind of all the tathƒÅgatas, the glorious Vajrasattva, through the essence of the complete vajra.

original: 'khor ba'i yang dag pa ma yin pa'i kun du rtog pa'i ngo bo ni ma yin no //

translated: It is not the nature of the false imagination of sa·πÉsƒÅra.

original: de'i phyir na dam tshig 'di 'da' bar dka' ba zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir na dam tshig 'di 'da' bar dka' ba zhes bya ba'o //
translated: Therefore, this commitment is called difficult to transgress.

original: de ltar 'das ma thag tu bshad pa'i tshul gyis dkyil 'khor mthong ba dang der zhugs pa dang / byang chub kyi sems bskyed pa dang rang gi lha'i rnal 'byor bsgoms pa rnams kyis nges pa kho nar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub rtogs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de ltar 'das ma thag tu bshad pa'i tshul gyis dkyil 'khor mthong ba dang der zhugs pa dang / byang chub kyi sems bskyed pa dang rang gi lha'i rnal 'byor bsgoms pa rnams kyis nges pa kho nar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub rtogs par 'gyur ro //
translated: By the method just explained, those who see the mandala, enter it, generate the Thought of Enlightenment, and cultivate the yoga of their deity, will certainly realize supreme, right, perfect enlightenment.

original: de'i phyir da ltar gyi zhes bya ba gsungs so //
analyzed: de'i phyir da ltar gyi zhes bya ba gsungs so //
translated: Therefore, he says, ‚Äúnow.‚Äù

original: ci zhig bya zhe na /üîΩyid ni rab dang rdo rje zhes bya ba la ma dad pa'i dri ma dang bral ba'i sems de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje'i rang bzhin can lha mo bzhi phreng gi dbus na bzhugs pa'i dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i dngos grub rdzogs

translated: What should one do?

original: rang gi dam tshig ni lha mo thams cad kyi tshogs dang bcas pas rdo rje sems dpa'o //
analyzed: rang gi dam tshig ni lha mo thams cad kyi tshogs dang bcas pas rdo rje sems dpa'o //
translated: One‚Äôs pledge is Vajrasattva together with the host of all goddesses.

original: mi zad bde gsol zhes bya ba ni thog ma dang tha ma med pa'i bde ba gsol ba'o //
analyzed: mi zad bde gsol zhes bya ba ni thog ma dang tha ma med pa'i bde ba gsol ba'o //
translated: ‚Äú Requesting imperishable bliss‚Äù means requesting the bliss that is without beginning or end.

original: bsten pa ni sgoms shig pa'o //
analyzed: bsten pa ni sgoms shig pa'o //
translated: ‚Äú Relying‚Äù means meditating.

original: 'gro ba'i bde ba chung ba ni @46b sems can gyi khams la bde ba chung ba'o //
analyzed: 'gro ba'i bde ba chung ba ni @46b sems can gyi khams la bde ba chung ba'o //
translated: ‚Äú The world‚Äôs small bliss‚Äù means the small bliss of the realm of sentient beings.

analyzed: deng ni de lta kho nar sangs rgyas thams cad mtshungs pas te sangs rgyas thams cad dang 'dra ba'o //
translated: ‚Äú Now, just so‚Äù means just as all the buddhas are the same, so are all sentient beings.

original: sangs rgyas thams cad dang mtshungs pa yang de yin la rtag pa yang de yin pas sangs rgyas thams cad dang mtshungs par rtag pas te /
analyzed: sangs rgyas thams cad dang mtshungs pa yang de yin la rtag pa yang de yin pas sangs rgyas thams cad dang mtshungs par rtag pas te /

original: de dag gi dngos po ni rtag pa nyid do //
analyzed: de dag gi dngos po ni rtag pa nyid do //
translated: Their nature is permanence.

original: de khyed rnams kyis thob pa yin no //
analyzed: de khyed rnams kyis thob pa yin no //
translated: You have attained that.

translated: ‚Äú Taste‚Äù and so forth. Taste is the external tastes and the experiences of charm and so forth.

original: bza' ba ni bza' ba dang btung ba la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: bza' ba ni bza' ba dang btung ba la sogs pa'o //
translated: Food is food, drink, etc.

original: spyod pa ni rdo rje gar la sogs pa'i rang bzhin can gyi 'dug stangs dang yid las byung ba rnams so //

translated: Song is the song of the syllable h≈´·πÉ, etc.
